Hangi ubakomeleja, giki batizubuucha mbuukanwa jose-jose ja kuja najo mu nzila, ulu iti nangha duhu. Yaya nuulu shiliwa, nuulu ifulushi, nuulu mbogoshi ya hela.
Aliyo i shilatu bazwale, kwike batizuzwala nghanjo ibili.
Ubawila giki, "Ulu ng'ushikila ha kaya ndebe, ikalagi henaho kushisha ng'winge i lipandi lyenilo.

Hangi ulu ng'ushika ipandi ilebe aliyo bulema u kung'wanukula nuulu kumudegeleka, ingagi. Ulu mulinga i lipandi lyenilo, lukung'unhagi nu lubuubu ulo luli ku mhambala jing'we, koolekeja giki bakugwilwa nsango."
Na nghana bakaja balilomeela, giki a banhu bagaluke.
Bupeeja na masamva mingi, na basaatu bingi bubabila maguta, bubapija.

U ntemi Helode wiyigwa i mihayo yeniyo, nguno i lina lya ng'wa Yesu likakumuka. Bangi bahayaga giki, "Yohana Matiija wajuukile kufuma mu bafu, h'i nguno yene u budula u bose ubu bukutumamaga muli we."
Kwike bangi banghayaga, "Eliya." Bangi giki, "Nghangi, git'umo baali a bahangi ba kale."
Aliyo u Helode aho wigwa uhaya, "Tambala shilanga u Yohana uyo nakamuta ntwe wajuukile!"
Nguno u Helode, hu wei uyo wali walagila uding'wa u Yohana uponyiwa mu jeela, kulwa nguno ya ng'wa Helodia uyo akantoola, aliyo wali nke o ng'wa Filipo ng'wanong'wawe.
U Yohana akanghama u Helode ung'wila giki, "Iti yawiza u bebe u kunsola u nke o ng'wanong'wing'we!"
U mhayo gwenuyo gukansaayicha no u Helodia, umpelanila u Yohana, untungila nhungi; ung'wikanwa kumulaga. Kwike wali waduuma umo iitile.
Nguno u Helode oli ang'ogohile u Yohana, oli andeebile giki oli munhu ntungilija na ng'wela, na luulu oli amaladile. Ahene ozwanganaga ulu ong'wigwa, aliyo ondegelekaga na buyegi.

Kwike nose likigela i likanza, nguno lukashika lushiku lwa kwizukwa kubyalwa kwakwe u Helode. Ubeeja shigukulu, ulaalika banamhala b'ibanza lyakwe na bataale ba bashilikale, hamo na banangwa ba mu Galilaya.
Huna nshike wa ng'wa Helodia wingila kubabinila, unyeja no u Helode, pye na a bageni bakwe. U ntemi ung'wila u ng'waniki giki, "Nilombage shikolo shose-shose nakusambe!"
Niyo ung'wilahilila na kung'wilahilila alihaya giki, "Udugije kunilomba shose-shose, nuulu ikabiza nusu ya butemi bone nakukwinha duhu!"
U ng'waniki ufuma u mu chumba, uukamuja nina giki, "Nalombe ki?" Nanghwe unshokeja, "Ntwe go ng'wa Yohana Matiija!"
Haho na haho u ng'waniki ushoka u kuli ntemi; wiza ung'wila, "Nalitogwa i haha yeniyi unisambe ntwe go ng'wa Yohana Matiija, guli ng'wilangahe!"
U ntemi akazwangana kingi nasho, aliyo iki wali wamala kulahila, niyo hangi ku butongi wa babo wali wabalaalika kwiza ku shiliwa, ulemeelwa u kunemeja.
Nghana haho na haho u ntemi utuma mulagi, ulagila gwenhwe ng'wilangahe u ntwe go ng'wa Yohana; u mulagi uja u mu jeela uukamuta u ntwe.
Ugutuula ng'wilangahe wiza ung'winha u ng'waniki, u ng'waniki nanghwe uukang'winha nina!
Aho bigwa a bahemba ba ng'wa Yohana biza bugusola u mili, buukagujika!
A batung'wa bushoka u kuli Yesu, bibilinga bunsomboolela pyi iyo bakiita, ni yiyo bakalanga.

Huna ubawila, "ubingilagi a banhu tuje kuunu kulembeezu mukifuule ho hado." Nguno a banhu baali bingi no, bizaga lwisi-lwisi; ulu balinga aba bashika bangi haho na haho. Nose yali shilambu nuulu kupandika ng'wanya gwa kulya.
Nghana bingila mu lyato buja kwipandi ilembeezu, uko baali batiko banhu.
Aliyo bamo aho bababona budeeba uko bajaga, bandya kufuma hose-hose u mu mizengo buyupeela lo magulu bajile koi, bubatanga u kushika ko.
Ohayika u Yesu u mu lyato, aho olibona i libita umo lyali u butaale, ubasaatwa. Nguno baali giti ngholo jiti na ndiimi, wandya kubalanga mihayo mingi.
Aho lyandya kubiza lya mhindi bung'wegeela a bahemba bakwe, bung'wila giki, "U ng'wenumu tuli ng'witogolo duhu, niyo ni likanza lyaja.
Hambu-hambu ni wabalaga a banhu baje ku migunda hihi-hihi mu chalo umu bakigulile na shiliwa!"
Aliyo u wei ubashokeja ubawila, "Binhagi a bing'we i shiliwa." Nabo bunshokeja buhaya, "Kolaga hamo shi tuje tukagule migati ya denali magana abili hu twize tubinhe balye?"
Ubabuja, "Muli na migati yinga? Alijagi mukalole!" Aho badeeba bung'wila, "Itano na ndilo ibili."
Huna ubalagila babawile a banhu bigashe mu magele-magele ha si ha maswa, nguno gaali manilizu.
Na nghana bigasha pyi chiza-chiza, mu magele-magele ga kubiza aho bigasha banhu igana, aho makumi atano.

Wisola i migati iyo itano yeniyo, ni ndilo bubili wajo. Ulangamila ng'wigulu ulumba, wimeganya i migati iyo itano yeniyo, ubinha a bahemba bakwe bubagabanhya a banhu. Ni ndilo ijo ibili najo giko, ubagabanhya pye a bose.
Bulya bigeja pye a bose.
Huna bugasoleela a mamenyagulwa, pye na a ga ndilo, bokaja matangwa ikumi na abili.
I lisaabu lya bagosha abo bakalya i migati yeniyo baali shihumbi shitano.
Haho na haho u Yesu ubakomeleja a bahemba bakwe kwingila mu lyato batonge ku nkilo, baje Betisaida; u wei amalije kulilaga i libita lya banhu.
Wahayumala u kubalaga, ulinha mu lugulu kujulomba.
Aho bulingila u bujiku, i lyato lyusangwa lili ku gati-gati ya nyanza, u wei ali iyene ku si nyumu.
Ubabona balikoya u kubuga nguno u nyaga gwabafumiilaga ku butongi. Huna mu madilu mataale ga ngoko ja kwandya, ubasanga ko alishimiza higulya ya nyanza. Wita giti alihaya kubabitiila;
aho bamona alishimiza higulya ya nyanza, bakiganika linghangi buyoganya balilila.
Nguno pye bakamona bogoha kingi nasho! Aliyo u wei ubayombya haho na haho alibawila, "Timbyagi ngholo, mutogohage nali nene."
Huna ulinha nanghwe u mu lyato, goya na koya u kuhuuyemba u nyaga. Bakakumya no bujinjimala,
nguno baali bataali u kuyitegeleja i mihayo ya migati. I myoyo yabo yali itaali midito.
Huna bushika ha ng'walo gwa ku si ya Genesaleti, bukola henaho.
Aho bika u mu lyato haho na haho a banhu bundeeba.
Bandya kupeela kuja hose-hose u mu mapandi genayo; buyubenha a basaatu, abo baali batadugije kushimiza, buyubatuula ha buliili bababuucha babatwala buli kwene uko bang'wigwilaga.

Nguno wajaga hose-hose: ku magunguli, mu mizengo, pyi nu ku matogolo. Akaja na kwigulilu, nu kwene bung'wenhela bingi abo baali na makoye, buyung'wikumbilija bakuumye nuulu ha neno ya shizwalo shakwe duhu. Na nghana buli bene abo bankuumyaga bapilaga.
Huna Bafalisayo na balangi balebe ba shilagilo, ba kufuma Yelusalemu, bibilinga biza aho wali u Yesu.
Bubabona bahemba bakwe bamo na bamo bakulyaga shiliwa na makono masoso, hu kuhaya baali batakalabile kulenganila na shimile isho shalekwa na bataale babo.
(Nguno a Bafalisayo, na a Bayudaya pye a bose, batalyaga shiliwa ulu batakalabile chiza a makono gabo. Biitaga giko kulwa kudima shimile sha kulekwa na bataale babo.

Nuulu benha shikolo shose-shose kufuma kwigulilu, baali batashilyaga aho bataali kushooja tame. Yaliho na mihayo yingi mingi iyo baali bidimile kulwa shimile shenisho: giti mbika ndebe ja koogeje ka shikombe na nungu na mafulila, buyaga na meza!)
Huna luulu a Bafalisayo na a balangi ba shilagilo benabo, bumuja u Yesu giki, "Nibuli a bahemba bako bakulyaga shiliwa na makono masoso, batushimizilaga u mu shimile isho twalekelwa na bataale?"
Nanghwe ubawila, "Bing'we bibeeleja, u Isaya akatungilija u kumuhangila, umo yandikililwe giki, 'A banhu aba banikugije bo ha nomo duhu, aliyo i ngholo jabo jili kule nu nene.
Bakanilamyaga dalali, kunu bulanga malange ga kulagilwa na banhu.'
A bing'we h'abo mushilekile i shilagilo sha ng'wa Mulungu kulwa kudima shimile sha banhu!"
Ongeja kubawila hangi giki, "Niyo a bing'we h'umo muli, nguno mutogilwe kushisundila ha mhelo i shilagilo sha ng'wa Mulungu, giki mudimane na shimile shing'we.
Nguno u Musa ahayile giki, 'Nkujage so na noko,' na giki, 'Uyo unduka ise nuulu nina shing'wigeleelilwe abulagwe!'
Aliyo a bing'we muhayile giki, ulu ose-ose ulinda ung'wila ise nuulu nina giki, 'I shikolo shane ishi ni shakugunaana, kwike shili Kolibani (makulu gaho inongho kuli Mulungu);'
huna nghana mutunzunilija gete ang'witile mhayo gose-gose u ise nuulu u nina!
U mu giko mukagukenaagulaga u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu kulwa kulondeela shimile shing'we, isho mukilekela-lekelaga, niyo iliho mingi i ya mbika jenijo iyo mukayitaga."
Huna u Yesu ulitana hangi i libita lya banhu, ubawila giki, "Bing'we nidegelekagi pye a bose ng'witegeleje.
Shitiho shose-shose isho shili hanze ya ng'wa munhu isho shidugije kunsosohaja ulu shung'wingila, aliyo isho shikanfumaga h'isho shikansosohajaga. [
Uyo ali na matu gakigwaga ni igwage.]"
Aho wabingila a banhu wingila mu kaya, a bahemba bakwe bumuja a makulu ga lusumo lwenulo.
Nanghwe ubawila, "Na a bing'we hu gumo duhu, mutaali u kwitegeleja? Mutamanile giki, buli shikolo isho shili hanze ya ng'wa munhu ulu shung'wingila shitudula u kunsosohaja?
Mutamanile giki shikingilaga mu nda, iti mu moyo gokwe? Ni giki i nghalilo yaho ikabizaga kufuma hanze kwitogolo?" (U mu kuhaya giko akasheeja pyi i shiliwa).
Ongeja kuhaya hangi giki, "Isho shikanfumaga u munhu, hu shene isho shikansosohajaga.
Nguno u mu ngholo ya ng'wa munhu, gakafumaga mo maganiko mabi, bujingi, wibi, bubulagi, bushihani,
kwikumva kwabubi, bubi, bulomolomo, kalolele ka malofu, wilu, busondaguji, wikumilija, buchilu-chilu.
I yose i yabubi yeniyi ikafumaga mu gati ya ng'wa munhu yansosohaja."
Huna ubuuka winga a henaho, uja mhandi ja Tulo. Wingila mu numba, nguno wali atatogilwe munhu ose-ose amane; kwike yali shilambu u kujimilika uko wali.
Litabitile ikanza, nkima nebe wali na nshike wakwe wakoyiagwa isamva; ujiigwa i mhola jakwe, wiza ushikila kungwila mu magulu u Yesu.
U nkima ng'wenuyo wali Nyunani, w'ihanga lya Basulofonisa. Wandya kung'wikumbilija ang'wingije u nshike wakwe i lisamva.
U Yesu unshokeja aling'wila giki, "Lekaga balye tame a baana ba mu kaya bigeje, nguno iti chiza u kushisola i shiliwa shabo ushiponegeja tuwa."
Nanghwe u nkima unshokeja ung'wila, "Na nghana guli chene baba, aliyo nahene nu tuwa nato tukasolelejaga a malagalikwa ayo gakagwaga kwingiila aho baliliila a baana."
U Yesu ung'wila giki, "Kulwa nguno ya mhayo gwenuyo, jaga; lyanfumaga i lisamva u nshike wako."
Aho washoka u ku kaya unsanga u ng'waniki olaalaga ha buliili, lyamalaga kunfuma i lisamva.
Huna u Yesu winga hangi i mhandi ja Tulo, ubitila Sidoni, ushika ku nyanza ya Galilaya, mu si ya Dekapoli.
Bung'wenhela munhu wa kata, hangi gulu. Bung'wikumbilija antuulile makono.
Nanghwe ung'winja a ha banhu, uja nawe ha mhujo iyene. Unkuumya na nzwala u mu matu gakwe, ha numa uswa mate ulukuumya nu lulimi lokwe.
Ulangamila ng'wigulu, ukiima n'ilaka lya koolecha kusaatwa, huna ung'wila u munhu ng'wenuyo giki, "Efata," makulu gaho, "Lugukaga!"
Haho na haho a matu gakwe guluguka, na a kata kinga, wandya kuyomba chiza.
Huna u Yesu ubakomeleja batizung'wila ose-ose. Aliyo nahene a boi bakagukumucha, nuulu iki akabakomeleja batiziita giko.
Banhu bakakumya no; buyuhaya giki, "Akubeejaga chiza buli mhayo, a bagulu akubinhaga kwigwa, na a bashimuumu akubinhaga kuyomba!"
U mu shiku jenijo likibilinga hangi ibita itaale, aliyo baali bati na shiliwa. Huna u Yesu ubitana a bahemba bakwe ubawila giki,
"Nalibasaatwa a banhu nguno i haha jashikaga shiku idatu bali hamo nane, aliyo bati na shiliwa.
Ulu nubalaga baje kaya bali nzala, badugije nuulu kugwa-wesa mu nzila, nguno bangi bazengile kule."
Nabo a bahemba bakwe bunshokeja giki, "U mu matogolo umu, munhu adugije kupandikila hali shiliwa sha kubigela a banhu na wingi aba?"
Nanghwe ubabuja, "Muli na migati yinga?" Buhaya, "Mpungati."
Huna ulagila giki a banhu bigashe ha si. Wisola i migati mpungati yeniyo, ulumba, wimeganya, ubinha a bahemba bakwe bigabanhye, nghana bubagabanhya a banhu.
Baali na tudilo tugehu, nu twene u Yesu ulumba kulwato, ulagila nato tugabanhyiwe.
Bakalya bigeja; aho bagasoleela a masaajiwa, bokaja matangwa mpungati.
Abo bakalya baali giti banhu shihumbi shine, huna ubalaga busambaala.
Haho na haho u wei na a bahemba bakwe, bingila mu lyato buja mhandi ja Dalimanuta.
Huna Bafalisayo bunsanga u Yesu, bandya kung'wihalalija balikooba shimanikijo sha kufuma ng'wigulu.

Nanghwe ukiima n'ilaka lya koolecha kubasaatwa mu moyo; hama uhaya, "Nibuli i shibyalilwe ishi shikukoobaga shimanikijo? Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, i shibyalilwe ishi shitudula kwinhwa shimanikijo na hado yaya."
Ubaleka, wingila mu lyato hangi uja ku nkilo.
Biba kusola migati, bubiza bati na ginhu, ulu iti ngati gumo duhu uyo baali nago u mu lyato.
Kwimanila u Yesu wabahugula alihaya giki, "Ikalagi miso, ng'wilanghane u ku shibimbya sha Bafalisayo ni sha ng'wa Helode."
Aliyo a boi bandya kwilunjalunja, baliwila giki; "Hamo shi iki tuti na migati!"
Aho wadeeba ubawila, "Nibuli muliwila giki, hamo iki muti na migati? Mutaali duhu u kwitegeleja nu kumana? Ni ginehe i ngholo jing'we jitaali ndito giko?
A miso muli nago, aliyo gashi u kubona nduhu! Na a matu muli nago, aliyo u kwigwa yaya! Mutugemaga u kwizukwa nuulu hado gete.
Aho nakimeganya i migati iyo itano kulwa banhu shihumbi shitano, mukokaja matangwa ganga a ga masaajiwa?" Bung'wila, "Ikumi na abili."
"Al'i migati mpungati, iyo baali balya banhu shihumbi shine, aho ng'wagasoleela a masaajiwa ng'wali ng'okaja matangwa ganga?" Bung'wila hangi, "Mpungati."
Huna ubabuja, "Mutaali duhu u kwitegeleja?"
Bushikiila Betisaida, a banhu ba kwene bung'wenhela munhu mboku, bung'wikumbilija ankuumye.
Nanghwe undima nkono u mboku unfunya hanze ya nzengo. Unswila mate u ku miso, untuulila na makono; huna umuja, "Ulibona shose-shose?"
Aho wabuucha u bushu giki alole, uhaya; "Nalibona banhu baliyeela-yeela, aliyo bali giti miti."
Untuulila hangi makono u ku miso gakwe, upila. Aho walola ushibona chiza pyi i shikolo.
U Yesu ung'wila aje kaya, unkomeleja giki, "Niyo utizingila nu mu nzengo."
U wei u Yesu na a bahemba bakwe bugoloola bajile mhandi ja Kaisalia Filipi. Aho bali mu nzila, ubabuja giki, "A banhu bakunihayaga nali nani?"
Bunshokeja balihaya, "Uli Yohana Matiija, aliyo bangi giki uli Eliya, na bangi hangi giki uli umo wa bahangi."
Huna ubabuja nabo giki, "Al'a bing'we mukunihayaga nali nani?" Petelo ung'wila, "Uli Kilisto."
Na luulu ubahana batizung'wila munhu nuulu umo u mhayo gwenuyo.

Huna wandya kubalanga giki, "U Ng'wana wa Munhu shing'wigeleelilwe aluhiwe mu mihayo mingi; na kuleng'wa na banamhala, hamo na bagabiji bataale na balangi ba shilagilo." Na giki, "Akubulagwa, aliyo akujuuka ha numa ya shiku idatu."
U mhayo gwenuyo akaguhaya hape-hape gete. I likanza lyenilo u Petelo umpunja ha mhujo, wandya kunghama.
Aliyo u wei ubagalukila a bahemba bakwe, huna unghama u Petelo aling'wila giki, "Ingaga u ku butongi bone Shetani. Nguno u bebe utiganikaga ya ng'wa Mulungu, uli mu ya banhu duhu!"
Ha numa ulitana i libita hamo na a bahemba bakwe; ubawila giki, "Ose-ose uyo atogilwe kunilondeela nene, shiigelile idalahe wei ng'wenekili, ibuukije nsalaba gokwe, h'anilondeele.
Nguno buli ng'wene uyo atogilwe kubupija bupanga bokwe, akubujimiija, aliyo uyo ubujimiija u bupanga bokwe kulwa nguno yane na kulwa nguno ya Nghulu Jawiza, u ng'wenuyo akubupija.
Angu, u munhu akubiza na solobo ki nuulu akipandika pyi i si, aliyo u bupanga bokwe ubujimiija?
Nuulu hangi u munhu adugije kufunya shikolo ki kulwa kukomoola bupanga bokwe?

Nguno ose-ose uyo unibonela minala u nene ni mihayo yane u mu shibyalilwe isho shitankugije Mulungu na sha shibi ishi, nanghwe u Ng'wana wa Munhu akumonela minala u munhu ng'wenuyo, u ng'wikanza lya kwiza hamo na bamalaika beela, ng'wikujo lya ng'wa Ise."
Hangi ongeja kuhaya, "Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, baliho bamo u mu banhu abo bimiilaga aha batuloja icha na hado yaya, kushisha babubone u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu buliza mu budula."
Ha numa ya shiku itandatu u Yesu ubasola ba Petelo na Yakobo na Yohana, benabo duhu, ubatongeela ajile mu lugulu lulihu, ulinha nabo. Kuhayimanila i lihanga lyakwe lyagaluka balolile.
Ni shizwalo shakwe sheela pe, shiyung'weka-ng'weka; atiho nfuji nuulu umo u mu si uyo adugije kweja giko.
Bubilongela ba Eliya na Musa, bandya kulungalunga nanghwe u Yesu.
Huna u Petelo ung'wila u Yesu giki, "Nangi, yabeelela iki twabiza tuliho aha, i gete tuzenge maheema adatu, limo lyako, limo lya ng'wa Musa, na limo lya ng'wa Eliya."
Bakogoha no, ubbaha uyuhaya mihayo iyo wali atimanaga.
Bahayimanila bafikijiwa ilunde, n'ilaka ligela kufuma u ng'wilunde lilihaya, "Uyu ng'wene Ng'wana wane Ntogwa, ng'wigwagi wei."
Hama hangi bahayimanila haho na haho boya kumona ose-ose, ulu ati Yesu duhu hamo nabo.
Aho balika u mu lugulu, ubahana batizung'wila munhu ose-ose iyo bakibona yeniyo, kushisha aho Ng'wana wa Munhu alajuuke kufuma mu bafu.
Na nghana u mhayo gwenuyo bakagulanghana gubiza gwabo duhu, kwike bakayibuja-buja a makulu ga kujuuka kufuma mu bafu.
Bakiita nose bumuja balihaya, "Nibuli a balangi bakahayaga giki, shiigelile ize Eliya tame?"

Nanghwe ubashokeja alihaya giki, "U Eliya u ng'wene nghana ntongi u kwiza, kulwa kulonja-lonja yose. Al'i gisi nibuli u Ng'wana wa Munhu andikililwe giki, shing'wigeleelilwe aluhiwe no-no-no, na kuleng'wa?
Aliyo nalimuwila giki, u Eliya wamalile u kwiza, niyo bung'witila git'umo batogelilwe; umo andikililwe!"
Aho bashika u ku bahemba a bangi, bubasanga bapindiagwa ibita itaale; baaliho na balangi ba shilagilo bihalalijaga nabo.
A banhu aho bamona bakakumya, aliyo haho na haho bumpeeleela kujungisha.
Nanghwe ubabuja, "Mulihalalija mhayo ki nabo?"
Umo u ng'wibita lyenilo unshokeja alihaya giki, "Nangi, kaka kitunja kane nakwenhelaga, kali n'isamva lya bushimuumu.
Ulu lyakadadila likakagalagajaga, kayufuluuta ifulo duhu, u kunu kaligadaguja a mino, nose kaakaba! Naali nabawila a bahemba bako balipeeje, aliyo balilemeelagwa!"
U Yesu ubashokeja alihaya, "Bing'we shibyalilwe sha butuzunya, nakwikala nali ning'we kushisha nanali? Nakwiyumilija hamo ning'we kushisha nanali? Ng'wenhagi hali nene aha!"
Buntwala a hali Yesu. U nyanda aho wamona duhu u Yesu, lyuntaalika ha si i lisamva, wandya kufuluuta ifulo.
U Yesu umuja u ise o nyanda giki, "Ali na makanza ki gandimile a makoye genaya?" Nanghwe unshokeja, "Kufuma ha bunigini bokwe.
Niyo nghangala ningi likakagwisijaga na mu moto, nuulu mu minzi, giki likabulage. Ulu udugije kwita mhayo gose-gose, tukulilagwe utugunaane!"
Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila, "Giki ulu udugije? Angu pyi i yose idulikanile u kuli munhu wa kuzunya!"
Haho na haho u ise o nyanda ulila alihaya, "Baba nazunije, kwike ningijage u buhana-hani bone!"
U Yesu aho wabona giki i libita lya banhu lyandya kwiza lilipeela nhambo, ulihama i lisamva, uliwila, "Bebe moyo nsoso gwa bushimuumu na bugulu, nalikulagila unfume, niyo utizunshokela hangi."
Lyunghaja hangi u nyanda, wandya kufuluuta ifulo, huna lyunfuma, lyuneka giti waacha, nose a bingi buyiganika giki hamo waacha.
Aliyo u Yesu, undima u nkono gokwe, ungungumula, wimiila.
Huna u wei wingila mu kaya. Aho wasaaga iyene na bahemba bakwe duhu, bumuja giki, "Nibuli a bise twali twalemeelagwa u kulipeeja?"
Nanghwe ubashokeja giki, "I mbika giti iyi itiko kufuma na hado yaya ulu iti mu kulomba."
Aho binga a henaho bubitila Galilaya. U Yesu wali atatogilwe munhu adeebe.
Nguno obalangaga a bahemba bakwe giki, "U Ng'wana wa Munhu akutuulwa mu makono ga babulagi bamulage, aliyo ulu ucha akujuuka ha numa ya shiku idatu."
Kwike batagwitegelegije u mhayo gwenuyo, hama nu kumuja baali bogoha.
Bakiita bushika Kafalanaumu, aho bingila mu kaya ubabuja giki, "U mu nzila ng'walihalalijaga mihayo ki?"
Buhuumula sele, nguno u mu nzila bihalaligijaga mhayo gwa butaale; giki nani u ntaale kubatinda pye a biye.
Aho wigasha ubitana abo ikumi na babili, ubawila giki, "Ulu munhu utogwa kubiza wa kwandya, shiigelile abize ku numa ya bose, na ntumami wa bose."
Huna witana kanigini ukawila kimiila hamo nabo, wanoga ukakumbatila na makono gakwe. Huna ubawila giki,
"Ulu munhu ung'wanukula umo wa banigini git'uyu mu lina lyane, wananukulaga nene. Hama uyo unanukula nene, atananukulile nene duhu, aliyo wang'wanukulaga uyo anitumile."
Kuhayimanila u Yohana wang'wila giki, "Nangi, twali twamonile ng'wing'wana alipeeja masamva mu lina lyako; tunemeja nguno ati umo wise!"
Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila, "Yaya u kunemeja, nguno atiho munhu wa kubeeja mhayo gwa budula mu lina lyane, huna hangi ushoka kunihaya kibi haho na haho.
Uyo ati ng'wilwisha wise, u ng'wenuyo ali ku lwandi lwise.
Nguno buli munhu uyo ung'winha a bing'we minzi ga kung'wa, iki muli ba ng'wa Kilisto, nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, u ng'wenuyo atujimiija i mheela yakwe."

"Na hangi ulu munhu ung'wenheleja kwipama nuulu umo wa bado-bado abo banisanije nene benaba, ikubiza hambu-hambu atungilijiwe u mu nhingo yakwe iwe lya kushela, akaponejiwe mu nyanza shimu, achile ng'wenumo.
Huna luulu, nuulu nkono gwako ulu gukwipamya, gubbutage, ili hambu-hambu wingile u mu bupanga uli nemehazu, kutinda kubiza na makono abili aliyo uponyiwa mu nsango gwa moto gwa buja na buja. [
U ng'wenumo jilimo shagembe jitachaaga, nu moto gwamo gutajimaga.]
Nuulu lupambala lwako ulu lukwipamya lubbutage, ili hambu-hambu wingile u mu bupanga uli gigi, kutinda kubiza na mhambala ibili, aliyo uponyiwa mu nsango gwa moto, [
uko shagembe jabo jitachaaga, nu moto gutajimaga.]
Nuulu liso lyako lyukwenheleja kwipama, likobolage ulyinje ho. Nguno ili hambu-hambu wingile u mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu uli na songo, kutinda kubiza na miso abili aliyo uponyiwa mu nsango gwa moto.
Uko shagembe jabo jitachaaga, nu moto gutajimaga!
Nguno buli ng'wene akubitiwa mu munhu ejiwe u busoso bokwe, git'umo shitambo shikeejiagwa bo kutuulilwa munhu.
Na nghana u munhu guli ng'wiza, aliyo ulu gulinda gusuuka, i gisi mukugutwila ki gusanduke hangi? Na luulu bizagi na munhu u mu bing'we, hu mukwikala muli mhola buli ng'wene na biye."
Huna ubuuka winga a henaho, ukila mongo gwa Yolodani, wingila mu si ya Buyudaya. Mabita mataale gunondeela hangi, wandya kubalanga git'umo witilaga shiku jose.
Bafalisayo balebe bung'wegeela kungema, bumuja giki; "Angu, u ngosha azuniligije u kumpeeja u nke okwe?"
Nanghwe ushosha alibabuja giki, "U Musa amulagilile ginehe?"
Nabo buhaya, "U Musa azuniligije kung'wandikila talaka na kuneka."
Nanghwe u Yesu ubashokeja uhaya giki, "I shilagilo shenisho akang'winha kulwa nguno ya buganghanazu bo ngholo jing'we.
Aliyo a ha wandijo wa kuseema, u Mulungu akabaseema ngosha na nkima.
Nose hu kuhaya u munhu akuneka ise na nina adimane na nke okwe.
U mu bubili wabo bakubiza mili gumo, bati babili hangi, bali mili gumo.
Kulwa nguno yeniyo, abo badimanyiwe na Mulungu, atizigela munhu wa kubalekanya."
Aho ali mu kaya, bumuja hangi a bahemba bakwe i mihayo yeniyo.
Nanghwe ubawila uhaya giki, "Buli ng'wene ulu uneka nke wakwe utoola ungi akubiza alishihya.
Nu nkima ulu uneka ngoshi uukatoolwa kungi, nanghwe akubiza alishihya."
Bung'wenhela na banigini giki abakuumye, kwike a bahemba bubahama.
Aliyo u Yesu aho wabona giko usaaya. Ubawila giki, "Bazunilijagi a baana bize a hali nene, mutabahangijage. Nguno u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu buli wabo a ba mbika yeniyi.
Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, ose-ose uyo atuwanukula u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu giti ng'wana, atiko u kwingila mo na hado yaya."
Ubakumbatila na makono gakwe, hama ubatuulila makono, huna ubinha mbango.

Ha numa ya yeniyo ubuuka ajile. Aho ali mu nzila, kuhayimanila munhu umo washika alimpeeleela, ushikila kuntugija mazwi. Umuja giki, "Nangi wawiza, niite mhayo ki nabize ng'wingiji u mu bupanga bo welelo na welelo?"
Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila, "Nibuli ulinitana wawiza? Atiho wawiza nuulu umo, ulu ati Mulungu wike!
U bebe ushimanile i shilagilo umo shihayilile; i giki, 'Yaya u kubulaga, Yaya u kushihya, Yaya u kwiba, Yaya u kukaanila bulomolomo, Yaya u kunyeecha, Nkujage so na noko.' "
Nanghwe ung'wila giki, "Nangi i yeniyi nidimile pyi kufuma ha buyanda bone."

U Yesu unkalalila mu butogwa butaale, huna ung'wila giki, "Ulileba ho mhayo gumo, jaga ukashijinje i shikolo isho uli nasho ubinhe bahabi, ukubiza na wibikija wa sabo ng'wigulu, huna wize unilondeele."
U wei aho wagwigwa u mhayo gwenuyo, ugwa-loolo u mili, winga ho onzololokaga, nguno wali na sabo ningi.
Huna u Yesu wandya kubalola-lola pye a bahemba bakwe, hama ubawila giki, "Ili shilambu no abo bali na sabo u kwingila u mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu!"
A bahemba bakakumya aho wahaya giko. Nanghwe u Yesu ushosha hangi ubawila giki, "Bing'we baana, ili shilambu no u kwingila u mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu.
Niyo ili shinogu i ngamila u kubita mu kapundu ka lushinge, kutinda u nsabi kwingila mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu!"
A henaho a kakumije kabo kakakilanija. Bandya kwiwila giki, "Yee! Aliyo luulu, nani uyo adugije u kupila?"
U Yesu ubakalalila, huna ubawila giki, "U gwenuyu gutadulikanile u ku banhu, aliyo u kuli Mulungu iti giko, nguno u kuli Mulungu pyi i yose idulikanile."
Huna u Petelo ung'wila, "I gisi angu ulibona giki a bise twaleka pyi i shose kulwa kukulondeela bebe!"

Nanghwe u Yesu uhaya, "Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, atiho nuulu umo uyo waleka numba nuulu baana ba ng'wawe bagosha na bakima, nuulu nina, nuulu ise, nuulu baana bakwe, nuulu malaale kulwa nguno yane na kulwa nguno ya Nghulu Jawiza,

uyo atanukula numba nghangala igana i haha u ng'wikanza ili, na baana ba ng'wawe na balumbuye, na banina, na baana bakwe, na malaale, hamo na buluhi; hama u ng'wikanza ilo liliza akupandika bupanga bo welelo na welelo.
Aliyo baliho bingi abo bali ku butongi, bakubiza ku numa; na a babo bali ku numa, abo bakubiza ku butongi."

Baali mu lugendo, mu nzila ya kulinha kuja Yelusalemu, u Yesu wali ku butongi wabo. Niyo baja balikumya no, hama abo balondeelaga baali bogoha kingi nasho! Huna ubasola abo ikumi na babili ubapunja ha mhujo, wandya kubawila iyo ilang'wilongele.

Uhaya giki, "I haha tulilinha kuja Yelusalemu, u Ng'wana wa Munhu akujutuulwa mu makono ga bagabiji bataale na balangi ba shilagilo, banamule nsango gwa kubulagwa. Ha numa bakuntuula mu makono ga banhu ba mahanga,
bangimbe nyachilu na kunswila mate na kuntula, hama bakumulaga. Aliyo akujuuka ha numa ya shiku idatu."
Kuhayimanila bang'wegeela ba Yakobo na Yohana, a bitunja ba ng'wa Zebedayo, bushika bung'wila giki, "Nangi, tuli na mhayo tutogilwe utwitile."
Nanghwe ubashokeja ubawila, "Mutogilwe nang'witile ki?"
Bunshokeja balihaya, "Lagilaga giki, a bise bubili wise tuligashe nangho u ng'wikujo lyako; umo ku bulyo wako, ungi ku lumoso lwako!"
Nanghwe u Yesu ubawila, "A bing'we angu mutagumanile uyo muligulomba! Mudugije kushing'wa i shikombe isho nalishing'wa u nene? Nuulu mudugije kubatiijiwa u bubatiijiwa ubo nalibatiijiwa u nene?"
Bunshokeja giki, "Tudugije!" Nanghwe u Yesu ubawila, "I shikombe isho nalishing'wa u nene mukushing'wa, nu bubatiijiwa ubo nalibatiijiwa u nene mukubatiijiwa.
Aliyo u gwa kwigasha ku nkono gwane gwa bulyo na gwa lumoso, guti gwa kumuzunilija nene, u gwenuyo guli gwa banhu abo balonja-longejiwe!"
Abo ikumi aho bigwa bakabapelanila a ba Yakobo nu Yohana.
Huna u Yesu ubitana pye a bose; ubawila, "Mumanile giki abo bakanukulagwa na banhu ba mahanga kubiza basugi h'abo bakabalomaga, na giki a bataale mubo h'abo bakabatumamyaga bo nguzu!
U ku bing'we itigeleelilwe ibize giko, aliyo buli ng'wene uyo atogilwe kubiza ntaale u mu bing'we, shing'wigeleelilwe abize ntumami wing'we.
Nu yuyo atogilwe kubiza ntongeeji u mu bing'we abize nsese wa bose.
Nguno nu Ng'wana wa Munhu atizile kutumamilwa, aliyo kutumama na kufunya bupanga bokwe kubiza shikomoolelo kulwa nguno ya bingi."

Nose bushika Yeliko, aho alinga u mu nzengo gwenuyo wali nabo na a bahemba bakwe, hamo n'ibita itaale. Waliho na munhu mboku akasangwa wigashaga haho na nzila alilombeleja; i lina lyakwe witanagwa Batimayo, ng'wana Timayo.
Aho wigwa giki Yesu wa Nazaleti, wandya kuhamuka n'ilaka lya higulya alihaya, "Yesu Ng'wana wa ng'wa Daudi, nikulilagwe!"
Bingi buyunghama giki ahuumule, aliyo u wei hu ongeja u kuhamuka alihaya, "Ka nikulilagwe Ng'wana wa ng'wa Daudi!"
U Yesu wimiila ubawila, "Ng'witanagi." Bung'witana u mboku baling'wila giki, "Timbyaga ngholo, buukaga alikwitana."
Wiponya i kabbuudi yakwe, wikindika ng'wigulya, huna ugangila ajile u kuli Yesu.
U Yesu umuja alihaya, "Utogilwe nakwitile ki?" Nanghwe u mboku unshokeja aling'wila, "Nangi, ka nabone!"
Huna u Yesu ung'wila, "Jaga, u kuzunya kwako kwakupijaga." Na nghana haho na haho, i likanza lyenilo wandya kubona, uja nanghwe u mu nzila alinondeela.
Bahayutumbya Yelusalemu, bubiza bashika Betifage na Betania, ku lugulu lo mizeituni, utuma babili ba bahemba bakwe.
Ubawila giki, "Jagi u mu chalo isho shili ku butongi wing'we shenisho, ulu mulashike mo, haho na haho mukubona nzobe muuga ikungilwe. Itaali kudamhilwa na munhu nuulu umo, italigulilagi muyenhe.
Ose-ose uyo alamuwile giki, 'Nibuli muliita giko?' Hayagi giki, 'Seeba ali na nimo nayo, haha yeniyi duhu akwishosha hangi aha.' "
Aho baja busanga nghana muuga ya nzobe, ikungilwe hanze ya mita, hihi n'ipanda, bandya kwitaligulila.
Bamo ba banhu abo baali bimiila haho hihi nayo bubabuja giki, "Nibuli muliyitaligulila i nzobe?"
Nabo bubashokeja git'umo wali wabawilila u Yesu, bubaleka buja.
Huna bung'wenhela u Yesu i muuga ya nzobe yeniyo, aho bishisha bituulila myenda yabo a ha ngongo, udamhila.
Banhu bingi bandya kuja balamba myenda yabo u mu nzila, bangi buyubbuta matambi mado-mado ga miti kufuma mu malaale, bagaponangija u mu nzila.
Abo baali ku butongi, na a babo bakuubijaga bandya kuhamuka balihaya, "Hosana! Akumilijiwe uyo aliza mu lina lya ng'wa Seeba.
Bukumilijiwe u butemi bo nkulugenji wise Daudi ubo buliza. Akujiwe u Mulungu wa ng'wigulu!"
Aho washika u mu Yelusalemu wingila mu hekalu, wandya kushilola-lola pyi i shikolo isho shalimo. Aliyo iki yali mhindi, ufuma winga nabo abo ikumi na babili, uja Betania.
A ha ntondo yaho, aho balifuma Betania, u Yesu wali atuubile.

Wahayuloleela ntini guli na maduutu, uliga ho kulola ulu ninga guli na matwajo gose-gose. Aliyo aho washika ho atabonile shose-shose, ulu iti maduutu duhu, nguno i likanza lya matwajo ga mitini lyali litaali u kushika.
Uguwila giki, "Kufuma lelo atiho wa kulya matwajo gako hangi nuulu na hado!" A bahemba bakwe nabo bigwa umo akahayila.

Aho bashika i Yelusalemu, u Yesu wingila u mu hekalu wandya kubapeeja abo biitilaga mo byashala ja kujinja na kugula. Ujisalingula ni meza ja bakaabanya ba hela, pye na a masumbi ga bajinja ba mhunda.
Niyo atazuniligije nuulu umo kubita u mu hekalu abuukije shikolo shose-shose sha byashala.
Ubalanga alibawila, "Itandikilwe giki, 'I numba yane ikwitanwa numba y'ilomba kulwa mahanga gose?' Ni ginehe a bing'we ng'wigalukije kubiza ipilinga lya basambo?"
Aho bigwa a bagabiji bataale na a balangi ba shilagilo bogoha, bandya kukooba nzila ya kunyagaja, nguno u bulangi bokwe bukabinha kukumya pye a banhu.
Aho yabiza mhindi, u Yesu na a bahemba bakwe buja hanze ya nzengo.
I ntondo yaho i dilu aho balibita, bugubona u ntini guumaga kwandija ng'witina.
U Petelo wizukwa, huna ung'wila u Yesu giki, "Nangi, aligulolage u ntini uyo ukaguzuma, guumaga!"
Nanghwe u Yesu ushosha ubawila, "Nzunyagi Mulungu Shiyunani shihayile: Bizagi na kuzunya kwa ng'wa Mulungu.'.

Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, munhu ose-ose uyo uluwila nuulu lugulu git'ulu giki, 'Dubbukaga uje ukagwe mu nyanza'; ulu ati na kuhana-hana u mu ngholo yakwe, aliyo ubiza na kusanya giki, uyo aliguhaya gukubiza ho, nghana akushikiligijiwa.
Huna luulu nalimuwila giki, shose-shose isho mukukooba mu nzila ya kulomba, sanyagi giki, ng'wanukulaga; na nghana shikubiza shing'we.
Niyo hangi ulu ng'wimiila kulomba lekejagi ulu muli na mhayo na munhu ose-ose. Ulu ng'wita giko ning'we akumulekeja u busobya wing'we u Sing'we uyo ali ng'wigulu. [
Aliyo ulu mutudula u kulekeja, ning'we atumulekeja u busobya wing'we u Sing'we uyo ali ng'wigulu.]"
Huna bushikiila hangi u mu Yelusalemu, aho alishimiza-shimiza mu hekalu, kwimanila bansanga bagabiji bataale na balangi ba shilagilo, hamo na banamhala.
Bumuja giki, "Bebe, iyo ukwiyitaga yeniyi, ukwiyitaga mu budula ki? Niyo hangi nani uyo wakwinhile u budula bo kwita giko?"
Nanghwe u Yesu ubawila giki, "Nane namubuje mhayo gumo, ulu mulanishokeje nu nene nakumuwila i yeniyi nakwiyitaga mu budula ki.
U bubatiija bo ng'wa Yohana boli bufumile ng'wigulu nuulu ku banhu? Nishokejagi!"
Bandya kwilunjalunja baliwila giki, "Ulu tulahaye boli bufumile ng'wigulu, akutubuja, 'Nibuli luulu mutizunije i mihayo yakwe?'
Hamo tuhaye giki, 'Boli bufumile ku banhu?' " Ni chene bogoha u kuhaya, nguno pye a banhu baali bamanile giki, u Yohana wali nghangi.
Huna bukalila kunshokeja duhu u Yesu giki, "Tutamanile!" Nanghwe ubawila, "Nu nene natumuwilaga i yeniyi nakwiyitaga mu budula ki!"

Huna wandya kubasomboolela lusumo alihaya giki, "Munhu akalima ngunda, uguhamba mizabibu, huna ugupindilija ngitili, usimba mo n'ikamilo lya divai. Ulola uzenga mo na numba ya balanghani, ha numa ugutuula mu makono ga balimi, u wei winga ho.
U ng'wikanza lya matwajo utuma nsese wakwe, giki aje u ku balimi benabo, bakang'winhe matwajo kufuma u mu ngunda.
Aliyo a balimi benabo buukandima buntulagula milangha, buneka uja makono dalali.
U ng'wenekili ngunda utuma nsese ungi, lelo u ng'wene bumelagula nguma, niyo bung'witila ya minala kibi no!
Utuma ungi hangi, u ng'wene bushikila kumulaga! Akatuma na bangi bingi duhu; bamo babo buukatulagulwa, bangi bubulagwa!
Wali ataali nanghwe umo; ng'wana wakwe ntogwa, nose u ku nghalilo yaho untuma ng'wenuyo, u kunu akwiwilaga giki, 'Bakunkuja u ng'wana wane!'
Aliyo a balimi benabo biwila giki, 'Uyu angu hu ng'wene u ng'wingiji gete, tumulagagi bubize wise u wingiji!'
Na nghana bundima, bumulaga, buukamponya hanze ya ngunda!"
"I gisi luulu, u ng'wenekili ngunda akwita mhayo ki? Tuhaya akwiza abakenaagule a balimi benabo, nu ngunda ugutuula mu makono ga balimi bangi!
A bing'we mutaali u kushisoma i shandikwa isho shihayile giki, 'I liwe ilo bakalilema bazengi h'ilo lyabizile lya kwigoloolela i numba
U mhayo gwenuyu gufumile kuli Seeba, niyo guli gwawiza no u mu miso gise?' "
Bakadeeba giki, u lusumo lwenulo akaluhaya kulwa nguno yabo, huna luulu bandya kukooba nzila ya kundima, kwike bubogoha a banhu binga ho, buneka.
Ha numa ya yeniyo, buntumila Bafalisayo balebe, hamo na ban'ikulu ba ng'wa Helode, giki bakangwashe mu kalungalungile.

Bahayushika bung'wila, "Nangi, tumanile giki u bebe ukashimizilaga mu nghana, nguno utibeelejaga kuli munhu ose-ose giki unyeje; na hangi utadililaga banhu mu kulola bushu wabo, aliyo u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu ukagulangaga mu nghana. Angu, izuniligije u kung'winha goodi u Kaisali nuulu yaya? Twikale tutoba i goodi nuulu tooye?"
Aliyo iki wali abumanile u wibeeleja wabo, ubawila giki, "Nibuli mulinigema? Nenhelagi aha hela imo nilole."
Bung'wenhela; hanuma ubabuja, "I suso iyi nu wandike wenubu, sha ng'wa nani?" Bunshokeja, "Sha ng'wa Kaisali."
Huna luulu u Yesu ubawila, "I sha ng'wa Kaisali ng'winhagi Kaisali, ni sha ng'wa Mulungu ng'winhagi Mulungu." Bakankumya no!
Huna Basadukayo, abo bahayile giki butiho bujuuko, bunsanga kumuja; buhaya,
"Nangi, u Musa atwandikilile giki, ulu ndugu uzumalika uneka nke aliyo atalekile ng'wana, ng'wanong'wawe akung'wingila u nkima ng'wenuyo, amyalile baana u nduguye.
Ali luulu, baaliho bagosha mpungati ba shikulu na shizuna. U tang@i wabo akatoola, aliyo ucha atalekile bubyile.
U wa kabili ung'wingila u nkima ng'wenuyo, nanghwe ucha atalekile bubyile, nu wa kadatu giko duhu.
Kushisha bushila pye a bose mpungati; batalekile bubyile. Aho bakalika, nose nu nkima ucha!
I gisi luulu, u ng'wikanza lya bujuuko, ulu bujuuka, akubiza nke o ng'wa nani, iki pye a bose mpungati baali bantoola?"
U Yesu ubawila, "A bing'we ahene mutuhubilaga kulwa kubiza mutashimanile i shandikwa nu budula bo ng'wa Mulungu?
Nguno ulu bujuuka kufuma mu bafu batubiza ba kuyutoola nuulu kutoolwa, bakubiza giti bamalaika ba ng'wigulu.

Niyo u mhayo gwa bafu gwenuyu giki bakujuuka, mutaali u kusoma u mu shitabo sha ng'wa Musa, umo Mulungu akang'wilila aho wali h'isaka; i giki, 'U nene nali Mulungu wa ng'wa Abulahamu, na Mulungu wa ng'wa Isaka, na Mulungu wa ng'wa Yakobo?'
Mulihubila hataale no, nguno u wei ati Mulungu wa bafu, ali Mulungu wa bapanga."
Umo wa balangi ba shilagilo akiza, ubigwa baliyomba nanghwe, ubona giki u Yesu wabashokeja umo ili. Huna umuja giki, "I shilagilo i shitaale kutinda shose ni shili kinehe?"
Nanghwe u Yesu unshokeja giki, "I shilagilo i shitaale shene shiishi, 'Igwaga Isilaeli, u Seeba Mulungu wise ali Seeba umo wike,
huna luulu, ntogagwe u Seeba Mulungu wako na ngholo yako yose, na bupanga wako bose, na maganiko gako gose, na nguzu jako jose.'
I sha kabili nasho shiishi, 'Ntogagwe nzenganwa ng'wiyo git'umo witogelilwe bebe ng'wenekili.' Shitiho shilagilo shingi sha kushiheeba i shenishi."
U nangi wa shilagilo ng'wenuyo, ung'wila, "Watungilija Nangi, wahaya gwa nghana i giki u Mulungu ali umo wike, niyo atiho ungi ulu ati we wike.

Na nghana u munhu shiigelile antogwe na ngholo yose, na maganiko gose, na nguzu jose, hangi shiigelile antogwe nu nzenganwa ng'wiye git'umo itogelilwe wei ng'wenekili. U gwenuyu guli gwawiza kutinda kufunya manongho nuulu shitambo sha mbika yose-yose."
U Yesu aho wamona washosha na witegeleja ung'wila giki, "U bebe uti kule nabo u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu." Atigelile hangi ungi wa kugima kumuja mhayo nuulu na hado yaya.
Huna u Yesu aho alilanga mu hekalu, ubabuja uhaya giki, "Nibuli a balangi ba shilagilo bakahayaga giki u Kilisto ng'wana o ng'wa Daudi?
U Daudi ng'wenekili akatongeelwa na Moyo Ng'wela kuhaya giki, 'U Seeba akang'wila u Seeba wane, Igashaga ku nkono gwane gwa bulyo kushisha nabatuule a banishi bako ha silili ya mhambala jako.'
U Daudi ng'wenekili alinghaya giki Seeba, nose adugije kubiza ng'wana wakwe hangi mu ginehe?" I libita lya banhu lyandegelekaga na buyegi no.
U Yesu aho alibalanga akabawila na giki, "Bilanghanagi a balangi ba shilagilo, abo batogilwe kugishiwa na kuja buyeela mu magulilu bazwalile nghanjo.
Nu mu masinagogi batogilwe kwigasija masumbi g'ikujo, hama nuulu bulaalikwa kuja ku shigukulu, nu kwene bakakuubilijaga ha magele ga bakujiwa.
Hangi bakalyaga sabo ja bakima bachilwa, banhu ba kalombele kalihu kulwa kwiyoolecha. A benabo bakupandika nsango ntaale kutinda!"
Huna u Yesu wigasha alolelile h'ibikilo lya sabo, ayugalola a mabita ga banhu batuulaga manongho gabo u ng'wibikilo lya sabo, a basabi batuulaga mo shingi.
Kuhayimanila wiza na nkima nchilwa, niyo nghabi; nanghwe utuula mo hela jakwe ibili.
Huna u Yesu ubitana a bahemba bakwe ubawila, "Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, u nkima u nchilwa na nghabi ng'wenuyu watuula shingi u ng'wibikilo lya sabo, kutinda pye abo batuulaga mo.

Nguno pye a bangi balituula kufuma mu bushiigo bo sabo jabo, lelo u nkima ng'wenuyu nuulu iki ali na makoye, aliyo nahene watuula mo pyi isho wali nasho; pye gete i shiigunaanilo sha mu bupanga bokwe."
Huna ufuma u mu hekalu, aho alija, umo wa bahemba bakwe ung'wila giki, "Nangi, uligabona umo gali a mawe genaya na a manumba aya!"
Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila giki, "Uligabona umo gali u butaale a manumba genaya? Litiho iwe a henaha ilo likulekwa higulya y'iwe lichalyo, ilo lituholomolelwa ha si!"
Huna uukigasha mu lugulu lo mizeituni, ulolela u ku hekalu, ba Petelo na Yakobo hamo na Yohana na Andelea baali nanghwe boi duhu; bumuja balihaya,
"Alituwilage, i yeniyi ikubiza ho nanali, na hangi shikubiza ho shimanikijo ki ulu yegeela kushikiila pyi i yose?"
Huna luulu u Yesu ubawila giki, "Ilanghanagi, munhu ose-ose atizumulemba-lemba.
Nguno bingi bakuyiza mu lina lyane balihaya giki, 'U nene hu nali ng'wene!' Niyo bakuhubya banhu bingi no.
Hama ulu ng'wandya kwigwa mabulugu na nghulu ja mabulugu, yaya u kufung'wa ngholo, nguno i yeniyo shiigelile ibize ho; aliyo i ngelelo ikubiza itaali u kushika.
Nguno bukubiza ho wiyubukiji ha gati y'ihanga n'ihanga, na butemi ku butemi. Jikuyudinghima nyahinga, na kwilonga nzala mu mapandi mingi. I yeniyi ili giti wandijo duhu wa kulung'wa busungu."
"Kwike a bing'we ilanghanagi, nguno bakuyumutwala ku mabanza, hangi mukuyutulilwa na mu masinagogi. Mukubita na kushishiwa ku butongi bo basugi na batemi kulwa nguno yane, bubize ho bukaaniji kubo.
I Nghulu Jawiza shiigelile jilomeelwe tame hose pyi u mu mahanga.
Ulu bamudima kumutwala, yaya u kwandya kwiganika-ganika umo mulasomboolele, aliyo gose-gose uyo ng'winhwa u ng'wikanza lyenilo guhayagi. Nguno mutubiza mukuhayaga bing'we; u ng'wenuyo Moyo Ng'wela.
Munhu akunodeela kubulagwa nuulu ng'wanong'wawe, nu namhala akunodeela nuulu ng'witunja wakwe. Hama a baana bakuyubatalukila a babyaji babo bababulaga!
Niyo pye a banhu bakumukolwa kulwa nguno ya lina lyane; aliyo uyo wiyumilija kushisha ku ngelelo akupila."
"Huna luulu ulu ng'ushibona i sha malofu i shikenaaguji shimiila h'ipandi ilo shitigeleelilwe, (uyo alisoma ni itegelejage), a henaho abo bali mu si ya Buyudaya, ni bapeelelage ku ngulu.
Uyo usangwa ali kwigulya ya numba atizika, giki ingile mu kaya yakwe kusola shose-shose kufuma moi.
Nu yuyo ali ku malaale atizushoka ku numa, kusola shizwalo shakwe.
U mu shiku jenijo, bakubiza mu makoye mataale no abo bakusangwa bali nda, na a babo bakubiza bakonhyaga.
Lombagi u mhayo gwenuyo gutizubiza mu shiku ja mbeho ya mu shiyaga.
Nguno u mu shiku jenijo, bukubiza ho buluhi butaale no, ubo butaali kwilonga kufuma ha wandijo wa buseemi aho Mulungu akaseema, kushisha haha, na butalabiza ho hangi na hado yaya!
Niyo ulu ni iti kugehiwa na Seeba i shiku jenijo, atiho wa kupila nuulu umo. Aliyo i shiku jenijo, ajigehije kulwa nguno ya basolwa, abo abasolile."
"Huna luulu ulu munhu ose-ose umuwila giki, 'Lolagi uuy'aha u Kilisto,' nuulu giki, 'Lolagi uko,' yaya u kuzunya.
Nguno bakwilonga bakilisto balomolomo, na bahangi balomolomo; niyo bakuyoolecha maleeba na mihayo ya kukamaaja, giki ulu yudulika, babahumbuule na a basolwa.
Huna luulu chagukagi, u nene namuwilaga pyi i yose kuko itaali kwilonga."
"Aliyo u mu shiku jenijo ulu bubita u buluhi wenubo, i liimi likwitilwa giiti, nu ng'weji gukoya ukufunya u bupe wago.
Ni sonda jikuyumodoka kufuma u kwilunde, nu budula bo ng'wigulu bukutinginyiwa.
Huna bakumona u Ng'wana wa Munhu ali mu malunde, aliza na budula butaale n'ikujo.
Ha numa ya henaho akutuma bamalaika baje hose-hose u mu si bakubabilingaga a basolwa bakwe, kufuma wandijo wa si kushisha ku bugelelo w'igulu."
"I haha u mhayo gwenuyu gwilangilagi ku ntini. A matambi ga nti gwenuyo ulu gandya kusonga na kufuluma maduutu managana, mukamanaga giki gwegeelaga u ng'waka.
Ni mihayo yeniyi ili giko. Ulu ng'ubona yandya kwilonga managi giki, ali hihi, nuwe wegeelaga ali ha nyango.
Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, i shibyalilwe ishi shitubita aho itaali kushikiila pyi i yose iyi.
I ligulu ni si shikubita, aliyo i mihayo yane itiko kujimiila na hado yaya!"
"Kwike atiho uyo alumanile u lushiku lwenulo, ni likanza; nuulu a bamalaika ba ng'wigulu batamanile, pyi nu Ng'wana, ulu ati Baba wike.
Ali luulu, ilanghanagi ng'wikale nzugulu-matu, nguno mutalimanile i likanza lili nanali.
Ili giti namugi kwinga ha ng'wakwe uja lugendo, wileka i kaya yakwe ililanghanwa na batumami bakwe, buli ng'wene ung'winha nimo gokwe. U nanghani o ha mita unkomeleja kwikala nzugulu-matu!
Huna luulu ikalagi nzugulu-matu, nguno mutamanile aho alizile u ng'wenekili kaya. Adugije kudila, hamo wiza bujiku ha gati, hamo dilu mu mahila ngoko, nuulu hamo adugije kwanguha.
Langhanagi atiziza akang'wisanganija mulaalile.
Iyo nalimuwila bing'we hu nalibawila pye a bose, ikalagi nzugulu-matu!"
Aho jasaaga shiku ibili ishike pasaka na shigukulu sha migati iti na shibimbya, a bagabiji bataale na a balangi ba shilagilo, bandya kukooba nzila ya kundima u Yesu mu nyasala-sala bamulage.
Aliyo bakiwila giki, "Yaya u ng'wikanza lya shigukulu, batiziita nsambo a banhu."

Aho ali Betania akigasha kulya shiliwa mu numba ya ng'wa Simoni, munhu wa mbiji. Kuhayimanila wiza nkima abuukije jubba ya alabasta, yali na maguta ga mpango ntaale ga nalido. Ushika wibela, ung'witiila u Yesu ku ntwe a maguta genayo.
Bamo busaaya no, bandya kung'ung'uula balihaya, "Al'u bukenaaguji bo maguta ubu nabo bofuma he hangi?
Nguno a maguta genaya gaali gashikile kujinjiwa, jilonga denali ja kukila ha magana adatu, bugabanhyiwa bahabi!" Akabapelanya no u nkima ng'wenuyo.
Aliyo u Yesu ubawila giki, "Nekagi u mayu ng'wenuyu, nibuli mulinkoya? U nimo uyo wanibeegeja nene gwenuyu gwawiza.
Nguno a bahabi a bene muli nabo gwa-gwa-gwa, ikanza lyose-lyose mudugije kubiitila i yawiza ulu ng'utogwa, aliyo u nene natubiza hamo ning'we shiku jose.
U wei wagwita uyo agudugije, wagubila maguta u mili gone kulwa ikanza lya kujikwa.
Niyo nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, hose-hose u mu si uko jikulomeelwa i Nghulu Jawiza, nu mhayo uyo wagwita gwenuyu gukuhayiwa kulwa kung'wizukwa."
Huna u Yuda Isikaliote, uyo wali umo wa babo ikumi na babili, uja ku bagabiji bataale, uukabawila umo alaboolekegeje bandime u Yesu.
Aho bigwa buyega no, bung'wisagija kung'winha hela nuulu: shipande sha feza.'. Huna wandya kukooba ng'wanya gwa kuboolekeja balandime.
A ha lushiku lo kwandya lo migati iti na shibimbya, ulo lwali lwa kusinzwa shitambo sha pasaka, a bahemba bakwe bakamuja giki, "Utogilwe kwiliila hali i pasaka tuje tukilonja-lonje?"
Huna ubatuma babili ba bahemba bakwe; ubawila giki, "Jagi u mu nzengo, ulu mulashike mo mukumona ngosha aseselile shisaabo sha minzi, nondeelagi.
Aho alakingile, mukushika mung'wile u ng'wenekili kaya, 'U Nangi alibuja giki: Shili hali i chumba shane umo nakuliila pasaka hamo na bahemba bane?'
Akung'oolekeja ku golofa, shiliko chumba shitaale shigolanije nghana-nghana, tulonja-longejagi ng'wenumo."
A bahemba benabo aho baja u mu nzengo busanga git'umo akabawilila, nghana bilonja-lonja i pasaka.
Yahayubiza mhindi, wiza nabo abo ikumi na babili,
ushika wigasha hamo nabo. Aho bandya kulya, u Yesu uhaya, "Nalimuwila go nghana giki, a bing'we abo mulilya hamo nane, umo wing'we akunilodeela !"
Bakapinihala no buyumuja; buli ng'wene wahaya, "Hamo nene?"
Nanghwe u Yesu uhaya, "Umo wing'we abo ikumi na babili, niyo alikoja nanghwe i nhonge jakwe umo nalikoja u nene!
U Ng'wana wa Munhu ajile git'umo andikililwe, aliyo ali mu kwihiga kutaale no u munhu uyo alinodeela u Ng'wana wa Munhu. Yali hambu-hambu u munhu ng'wenuyo ulu ni oli atabyalilwe!"
Huna luulu aho balilya, usola ngati. Ulumba huna ugumeganya, ubinha kunu alihaya giki, "Anukulagi mulye, u gwenuyu mili gwane."
Usola na shikombe, aho wamala kulumba ubinha bushing'wela pye a bose.
Huna ubawila giki, "A genaya gene mininga gane g'ilagane, ayo galidika kulwa nguno ya banhu bingi.
Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, natalang'wa hangi sha kufuma mu matwajo ga nzabibu na hado yaya kushisha mu lushiku lo kung'wa shipya mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu."
Aho bamala bimba lyimbo, huna bufuma hanze buja ku lugulu lo mizeituni.
Huna u Yesu ubawila giki, "Pye a bose mukunipeela, nguno gwandikilwe giki, 'Nakuntula u ndiimi, jibbalasane i ngholo!'
Kwike ulu najuuka, nakutonga kuja Galilaya, namutange u kushika ko."
Aliyo u Petelo ung'wila giki, "Nuulu bakakuleka pye a bangi, u nene ng'wene ngilo !"
U Yesu ung'wila, "Nalikuwila gwa nghana giki, u bujiku wenubu, aho nghungulume itaali kwishokeela kuhila, u bebe ukubiza onilemaga nghangala idatu!"
Aliyo u Petelo ongeja kuhaya giki, "U nene nuulu yunigeleelwa kucha nangho, natiko u kukulema!" Na a bangi pye buhaya giko.
Aho bashika h'ipandi litanagwa Getisemani, u Yesu ubawila a bahemba bakwe giki, "Igashagi aha, u nene nakalombe."
Huna ubasola ba Petelo na Yakobo na Yohana, ugwilwa bupina budito buminya no.
Ubawila giki, "I ngholo yane ili na bupina budito no bo kushisha mu kucha. Lembeelagi henaha ng'wikale miso."
Uja ha butongi ho hado, uukiponeja ha si, ulomba giki ulu yudulika, i likanza lyenilo limitiile.
Uhaya, "Aba, Baba, pyi i yose idulikanile u kuli bebe, ningijage i shikombe shenishi, kwike it'umo natogelilwe nene, aliyo umo utogelilwe bebe!"
Wahayushoka aho baali, ubasanga balaalaga, ung'wila u Petelo giki, "Simoni, olaalaga? Olemeelwa u kwiyumilija kwikala miso nuulu ikanza lya sa imo duhu?
Ikalagi miso mulombe mutizingila mu kugeng'wa, nguno u moyo gukalalilwe, aliyo u mili ng'winogolelwa!"
Uja hangi uukalomba alihaya mihayo h'i yeniyo duhu.
Aho washoka ni hangi ubasanga balaalile, nguno a miso gabo gaali gadidoha; bulemeelwa nu mumo bang'wilile.
Wahayushoka hangi lukangala lo kadatu ubawila, "Ni haha mutaali mulaalile mukwigoloolaga duhu? Ng'wigejaga luulu. Lyashika i likanza, u Ng'wana wa Munhu atuulwe mu makono ga banhu ba shibi.
Buukagi tuje, angu mulibona giki wegeela u nodeeji wane!"

U Yesu aho ataali uyomba giko, kuhayimanila haho na haho washika u Yuda, uyo wali umo wa babo ikumi na babili. Wiza n'ibita lya banhu babuukije mapanga na milangha, bafumile ku bagabiji bataale na balangi ba shilagilo, na banamhala.
U nodeeji oli obinha shimanikijo; ubawila giki, "Uyo nalambipe hu ng'wene, ndimagi muntwale munkalaganile!"
U Yuda aho oshika, haho na haho ung'wegeela u Yesu kunu alihaya, "Nangi!" Huna umbipa.
Na nghana bundima na makono gabo, bunghaja!
Umo wa babo baali nu Yesu oli na lilushu, ulisopoola; ulihubenga lyubitila gutu go ntumami o ngabiji ntaale, gutinika!
Huna u Yesu ubawila a banhu benabo giki, "Ng'wiza kunidima mubuukije mapanga na milangha giti nali nsambo?
Iki ng'wali mutunidimaga a makanza ayo naludilaga nigashaga mu hekalu buli lushiku nakulangaga! Kwike leka shishikilijiwe i shandikwa!"
Huna bumpeela pye a bahemba, buneka!
Sumba nebe unkuubija igumiilile kache-mbeho, bundima nanghwe.
Kwike ubipuluka upeela; uja ali duuhu, wileka i kache-mbeho!
Huna luulu buntwala u Yesu ku ng'wa ntaale wa bagabiji. Pye a bagabiji bataale, na a banamhala na a balangi ba shilagilo baali bibilingila henaho.
Nu Petelo unkuubija ali ka kule ho, kushisha nanghwe ushika nose a ha ng'wa ntaale wa bagabiji. Wingila u mu gwalugwa, wigasha na batumami wandya koota moto, gwaligimaga!
A bagabiji bataale ni libanza i lyose, buyukooba-kooba bukaaniji, giki bapandike nzila ya kumulaga u Yesu, aliyo batapandikile.
Bakaaniji bingi balomolomo buyunkaanila, kwike u bukaaniji wabo walemaga u kulenganila.
Nose bimiila banhu balebe, bunkaanila mu kunembekeja balihaya,
"U ng'wing'wana ng'wenuyu twang'wigwile alihaya giki, 'I hekalu ya kubeejiwa na makono yeniyi nakwisambagula, ha numa ya shiku idatu nabize naazengile yingi, iyo iti ya kubeejiwa na makono!' "
Aliyo na a bene hu gumo, u bukaaniji wabo butalenganilile.
Kwimanila u ntaale wa bagabiji wimiila u ng'wibanza; umuja u Yesu, "Nibuli utushoshaga nuulu mhayo u mu yose iyo balikukaanila a benaba?"
Aliyo u Yesu akikala ahuumulile sele duhu, atashokije nuulu hado. U ntaale wa bagabiji umuja hangi alihaya giki, "U bebe, h'uli Kilisto ng'wana wakwe u nkumilijiwa?"
U Yesu uhaya, "Nali ng'wene, niyo nalimuwila giki, mukumona u Ng'wana wa Munhu igashije ku nkono gwa bulyo gwa budula, aliza na malunde ga ng'wigulu."
U ntaale wa bagabiji utandula nghanjo yakwe kunu alihaya giki, "Tutaali na nguno ki hangi nabo a bakaaniji?
Angu ng'wawigwa u bugimu bokwe! I gisi luulu mulibona ginehe?" Pye a bose bunamula giki, wigeleelagwa kucha.
Bamo babo bandya na kunswila mate, na kuyunkundikija u ku miso, bantula kunu baling'wila giki, "Manijaga!" Huna a balanghani ba hekalu bunsola, bukalinhya kuntula mapi!
U Petelo aho ali ha si u mu gwalugwa ng'wenumo, kwimanila nkima wiziila hoi; wali umo wa batumami ba ha ng'wa ntaale wa bagabiji.
Wahayumona u Petelo aloota moto unkalalila, huna ung'wila giki, "Tuhaya nu bebe walikalaga nanghwe u Yesu, u muna Nazaleti!"
Ulema no; kunu alihaya, "Bebe mayu, u nene natugumanaga uyo uliguhaya, niyo natugwitegelejaga nuulu hado!" Ufuma winga a henaho, uja ku gwalugwa ya ku butongi, (nghungulume yuhila).
U ntumami nkima ng'wenuyo umona hangi; wandya kubawila abo baali bimiila hihi henaho giki, "Nu ng'wenuyu ali umo wabo!"
Aliyo ni hangi ulema usheshanila! Aho kabita kakanza kado, nabo abo baali bimiila haho nanghwe, bung'wila giki, "I gete nghana nu bebe ng'wing'wana uli umo wabo, angu niyo nu bebe uli muna Galilaya!"
A henaho luulu wandya kuzuma na kwilahila; akuhayaga giki, "U nene nataamanile gete u munhu uyo mulikala ng'unghaya ng'wenuyo!"

Haho na haho yishokeela kuhila i nghungulume. Nanghwe u Petelo ugwizukwa u mhayo uyo Yesu wali wang'wila giki, "I nghungulume aho itaali kwishokeela kuhila, u bebe ukubiza wanilemaga nghangala idatu!" Wahayugwideedenghanya ulila!

Huna aho wela i dilu, haho na haho ligasha ibanza: baaliho bagabiji bataale na banamhala, hamo na balangi ba shilagilo, niyo lyaliho pyi i libanza i lyose; bizunilija kuntunga u Yesu. Buntongeja bantwalile kuli Pilato.
U Pilato umuja giki, "U bebe hu uli ntemi o Bayudaya?" Ushosha ung'wila giki, "H'umo ulihayila!"
A bagabiji bataale bandya kumuula mihayo mingi.
Nanghwe u Pilato umuja hangi giki, "Nibuli utushoshaga nuulu mhayo? Hu kuhaya utuyigwaga pyi iyo balikubuula?"
Aliyo u Yesu atashokije mhayo gungi gose-gose, u Pilato uyukumya duhu!
U mu shiku ja shigukulu u Pilato wali na shimile sha kubataligulila ntungwa umo, uyo bunomba.
Waliho nkenaaguji nebe, witanagwa Balaba, wali watungwa hamo na biye kulwa kwenheleja nsambo; u wei ubulaga u mu nsambo gwenuyo.
Huna luulu a banhu bung'wegeela u Pilato kunomba abiitile git'umo oli obamaniligija.
Nanghwe ubabuja giki, "Mutogilwe hamo namutaligulile u ntemi o Bayudaya?"
Nguno wali amanile giki, a bagabiji bataale baali bantuula u Yesu mu makono gakwe kulwa wilu.
Niyo a bagabiji bataale benabo baali babasoosela a banhu, giki banombe abataligulile Balaba.
Huna luulu u Pilato ubabuja hangi giki, "Mutogilwe nang'wite ginehe uyo mukung'witanaga ntemi o Bayudaya?"
Nabo buhoolanija n'ilaka lya higulya giki, "Nkomage ha nsalaba!"
U Pilato aho wababuja giki, "I gete witile bubi ki?" Bongeja kuhoolanija duhu n'ilaka lya higulya balihaya, "Nkomage ha nsalaba!"
Nose u Pilato ubona giki hambu-hambu abayeje a banhu, na luulu ubataligulila nghana u Balaba. Aho wamala kuntula mbooko u Yesu, untuula mu makono gabo, giki akakong'we ha nsalaba.
Huna a bashilikale buntwala u Yesu ng'wibindo lya numba ya h'ikulu (litanagwa plaetolio), biyitana ibita igima, bung'wihoolekela.
Bunzwalikija nghanjo ya nzulunge. Bubeeja na ngikili ya minghwa, nayo bunzwalikija u ku ntwe.
Huna bandya kungimba nyachilu, buyung'wila giki, "Kulaga uhangame ntemi o Bayudaya!"
Buyuntula na nangha u ku ntwe, kunu bakunswilaga na mate, biita bantugija mazwi kunamya!
Aho bamala u kungimba nyachilu giko, bunzuuja i nghanjo i ya nzulunge bunzwalikija i shizwalo shakwe, huna buntwala hanze kujunkoma ha nsalaba!
Munhu umo, muna Kilene, Simoni ise o ba Isikanda na Lufo, akasangwa alifuma ku ngunda, bunghadikija amuukije u nsalaba gokwe.
Huna buntwala u Yesu, buukanshisha h'ipandi likitanagwa Goligota, (makulu gaho, "Ipandi lya lupanga.")
Bung'winha divai isangije bugota bo ngazu, giki ang'we; aliyo atayanukulile.
Huna bunkoma ha nsalaba, i shizwalo shakwe bushigabanha bo kushesela mbale, babone buli ng'wene akubuucha ki!
Aho balinkoma ha nsalaba lyali ikanza lya sa idatu.
Na wandike bo kubuulwa kwakwe butuulwa ho, boli buhayile giki, "NTEMI O BAYUDAYA."
Na basambo babili bukong'wa hamo nanghwe, buli ng'wene ha nsalaba gokwe, umo ku bulyo bokwe, ungi ku lumoso. [
Shubiza shashikiila i shandikwa isho shihayile giki, "Akabalanijiwa hamo na bagomi."]
Abo babitilaga haho hihi bansondagulaga kunu bakushingishaga mitwe yabo balihaya giki, "Haho luulu ng'wing'wana o kusambagula hekalu na kumala kwizenga mu shiku idatu.
Alik'ipijage shi luulu, winge ho a ha nsalaba!"
Na a bagabiji bataale bandya kwiyineenelegeja boi bike, hamo na balangi ba shilagilo. Buyuhaya giki, "Walupijaga bangi duhu gashi niyo, u wei ng'wenekili walemeelagwa u kwipija!
Angu nanghwe Kilisto, ntemi wa Bayudaya i giko, ni ikage ho a ha nsalaba i haha, tubone tuzunye!" Na a babo baali bakong'wa hamo nanghwe nabo buyumbyeedeleja!
I liimi aho lyashika ntwe-gati, shubiza ho giiti; shikundikija pyi i si, kushisha sa kenda.
Mu sa kenda u Yesu ulila n'ilaka itaale alihaya, "Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?" U kushomelejiwa kwaho giki, "Mulungu wane, Mulungu wane, nibuli wanilekaga?"
Bamo babo abo baali bimiila henaho aho bigwa buhaya, "Bing'we, ong'witana Eliya!"
Huna umo wabo upeela kujusola ibbupyo, ulilobya mu siki ulitunga kwidete, wiza ung'winha ang'we; kunu alihaya, "Leka tulole ulu akwiza u Eliya ang'wiche!"
Aliyo u Yesu ufunya ilaka itaale, uzumalika!
Huna i lisenge lya mu hekalu lyutanduka kufuma kwigulya kushisha ha si, lyulekana habili.
U ntaale o bashilikale igana, uyo oli wimiila haho hihi, aho wabona waacha giko uhaya; "Bing'we, u munhu ng'wenuyu nghana oli Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu!"
Ka kule ho hado, baaliho bakima biloleelaga. U mu benabo baalimo ba Malia Magadalena, Salume, nu Malia u nina o ng'wa Yakobo u ndo na Yosefu.
A bakima benabo bajaga bunondeela u Yesu kungunaana aho wali Galilaya. Baaliho na bakima bangi bingi, abo baali banondeela u Yesu kwiza i Yelusalemu.
U lushiku lwenulo lwali lwa kulonja-lonja, nguno a ha ntondo yaho yali sabato. Huna luulu aho yabiza mhindi,
Yosefu, muna Alimataya utimbya ngholo, uja u kuli Pilato, uukanomba u mili go ng'wa Yesu. U munhu ng'wenuyo oli namhala w'ibanza nkujiwa, niyo nanghwe ol'abulindiilile u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu.
U Pilato akakumya aho wigwa giki u Yesu omalaga kucha. Ung'witana u ntaale o bashilikale igana uyo onanghanaga u Yesu, umuja ulu nghana omalaga kucha.
Aho wamana u kufuma u kuli munhu ng'wenuyo giki ili chene, ung'winha u Yosefu u mimba.

Huna aho wagwicha u mimba a ha nsalaba, uukagula ng'wenda gwawiza gwa kitaani, ugulingiila u mimba, ugulaaja mu shigila, shali shisimbilwe ng'wiwe git'ihalo. A ha nyango gwa shigila upilingitija ho iwe, lyuchiba.
A ba Malia Magadalena nu Malia u nina o ng'wa Yosefu, bubona aho akalaajiwa.
Aho yabita i sabato, u Malia Magadalena nu Malia u nina o ng'wa Yakobo, hamo na Salume, bugula bugota bo ng'waso nsoga, giki balaaje bakagubile u mili go ng'wa Yesu.
I dilu makingo u lushiku lo kwandya nyuma, bubuuka bajile u ku shigila. Aho lilifuma i liimi nabo balishikiila hoi.
Kwike bandya kwibuja giki, "Nani akulipilingitya i liwe, atwingije a ha nyango go shigila?"
Nguno lyali itaale no! Aliyo aho baponya a miso, bulibona i liwe lyamalaga kupilingitiwa lyinjiagwa ho.
Aho bingila u mu shigila bibakila no, bujinjimala. Nguno bakabona sumba azwalile nghanjo yape, igashije ku lwandi lo nkono gwa bulyo.
Ubawila giki, "Mutibakilage, tuhaya mulinkooba Yesu u muna Nazaleti uyo wali wakomilwe ha nsalaba! Atiho a henaha, ojuukaga. Nzugi mulole aho baali banaagije.
Huna luulu, jagi mukabawile a bahemba bakwe, pyi nu Petelo; giki watongaga kuja Galilaya, h'uko mukujumona git'umo akamuwilila!"
Aho binga a ha shigila, bandya kupeela kunu bakudetemaga, niyo babbahaga. Bulemeelwa nuulu kuwila munhu mhayo gose-gose, nguno baali bogoha no! [
Aho wajuuka u Yesu, i dilu ya lushiku lwenulo u lwa kwandya mu nyuma, uyo akang'wilongela kwandya wali Malia Magadalena, uyo wali wang'wingija masamva mpungati.
U nkima ng'wenuyo, aho oja kubawila abo bikalaga nu Yesu, ubasanga bataali mu bupina bakulilaga nghungu.
Na luulu nuulu aho bigwa giki wamonaga ali mpanga, batazunije.
Hama hangi akiita ubilongela babili babo ali mu suso yingi, a bene bashimizaga bajile ku malaale.
Nabo aho bashoka u ku bichabo bubawila, aliyo batabazuniligije.

Ha numa ya henaho ubilongela a bahemba abo ikumi na umo, bakulyaga. Ubahugula kulwa butuzunya na buganghanazu bo ngholo jabo. Nguno baali batazunije iyo bakawilwa na a babo baali batonga u kumona aho wajuuka.
Huna ubawila giki, "Jagi hose pyi u mu si, ng'ujilomeela i Nghulu Jawiza ku banhu bose.
U wa kuzunya ubatiijiwa akupila, u wa kulema akugwilwa nsango.
I shimanikijo ishi shikubiza hamo nabo a bazunya: bakuyupeeja masamva na kulungalunga mu ndimi jingi, mu lina lyane.
Bakudima nuulu nzoka na makono gabo, niyo nuulu bung'wa shikolo isho shidugije kubulaga, shitubakenaagula. Na a basaatu bakuyubatuulila makono bapila."
Huna luulu u Seeba Yesu aho wamala u kubawila, wanukulwa ng'wigulu. Wigasha ku nkono go bulyo go ng'wa Mulungu.
Aliyo a boi bandya kuja hose-hose bakulomeelaga, nanghwe u Seeba uyutumama hamo nabo, mu koolecha shimanikijo kulwa kuguguzuhya u mhayo.]
Banhu bingi bifunije kwandika busombooji bo mihayo iyo yashikilijiwe mu bise,
kulenganila nu mumo baatuwililile a batumami, abo bakujikumuchaga i Nghulu jeniji; a bambona bayo i mihayo kufuma aho ikandija.
Huna luulu baba nkujiwa Teofilo, nu nene naabonile ikubeelela nakwandikile pyi i yose mu bugaliili, nguno nigisiligije chiza mu welwa-ngholo, kufuma ha wandijo wayo.
Ikubeelela ubumane u bunghana wayo i mihayo iyo wawililwe yeniyo.
Mu shiku ja ng'wa Helode aho ali ntemi wa Buyudaya, waliho ngabiji witanagwa Zakalia, o ng'wigele lya ng'wa Abia. Oli antoolile Elizabeti, umo wa bakima ba mu luganda lo ng'wa Alooni.
A bose bubili wabo, baali batungilija u kuli Mulungu. Hangi u mu kashimizile kabo baali bashidimile pyi i shilagilo sha ng'wa Seeba; nu mu katongeelele kakwe baali bati na shisembo.
Kwike baali bati na ng'wana, nguno u Elizabeti oli ngumba, nose ugiguluha, nu Zakalia unamhaala.
Ali luulu, i ligele lya ng'wa Zakalia likapandikwa ludiima, wandya kutumama nimo gwa bugabiji ku butongi bo ng'wa Mulungu.
Huna usolwa bo mbale, git'umo shali shimile sha bugabiji, wingila mu hekalu ya ng'wa Seeba kuzuukija ngazu.
U ng'wikanza lya kuzuukija ngazu lyenilo, pye a banhu a bangi baali hanze bakulombaga.
Kuhayimanila wilongelwa na malaika o ng'wa Seeba; wimiila ku lwandi lo bulyo lo ng'walilo go kuzuukija ngazu.
U Zakalia aho wamona wibakila, ugwilwa booba butaale no!
Aliyo u malaika ung'wila giki, "Utogohage Zakalia, nguno u kulomba kwako kwigwiwe; u nke wako u Elizabeti akukubyalila ng'wana ngosha, i lina lyakwe ukung'wilika Yohana.
Ukuyega na kusangabala, na banhu bingi bakukuyegela u kubyalwa kwakwe,
nguno akubiza ntaale u ku butongi bo ng'wa Seeba. Akwizujiwa na Moyo Ng'wela kufuma mu nda ya ng'wa nina. Huna luulu, ati wa kung'wa divai nuulu shikoji shose-shose na hado yaya.
Baisilaeli bingi akubiita bangalukile Seeba Mulungu wabo.

Akutonga ku butongi bo ng'wa Seeba mu moyo na nguzu ja ng'wa Eliya, kwiza kugalucha ngholo ja babyaji babadilile baana babo, na bashitiigwa bagalukile witegeleja na butungilija. Hu ng'wene uyo akubeeja nimo gwa kubalonja-lonja banhu babize bamaliilile kulwa ng'wa Seeba."
U Zakalia unshokeja u malaika ung'wila giki, "Nakugumana ginehe u mhayo gwenuyu? Iki u nene nali namhala giki, nu nke one ngikulu o shiku ningi!"
U malaika unshokeja ung'wila alihaya, "U nene nali Gabulieli, nakimiilaga ku butongi bo ng'wa Mulungu. Natumagwa nize nahoye nangho, nakwinhe i Nghulu Jawiza jeniji.
Ali luulu iki utuyizunyaga i mihayo yane, aliyo hu shiigelile ishikilijiwe ng'wikanza lyayo, ukubiza shimuumu. Utudula u kuyomba kushisha lushiku ulo ikushikiila."
Nose a banhu abo baali hanze banindiilile u Zakalia buyukumya, nguno akadila u kufuma u mu hekalu.
Aliyo aho wafuma walemeelagwa u kuyomba, budeeba giki wali wabona sha koolechiwa u mu hekalu. Huna wandya kuyubagemeelela bo makono duhu, nguno akabiza shimuumu.
Jahayukwindanha i shiku ja butumami bokwe, uja ku ng'wakwe.
Shiku jitabitile ningi, u nke wakwe u Elizabeti ubiza nda; aho wabona giko ubiza wa kwikala wibisaga mu kaya duhu, kushisha yubita myeji itano. Nguno akahaya giki,
"Nose nane wanibona u Seeba u mu shiku iji, wanibeegeja mhayo gwa kuningija budalahwa mu banhu!"
''Mu ng'weji gwa katandatu, u malaika Gabulieli utung'wa na Mulungu kuja Galilaya, ku nzengo gwitanagwa Nazaleti;
kuli munhya nebe ng'wilindu, lina lyakwe Malia, wali alunjiwe na ngosha witanagwa Yosefu, wa luganda lwa ng'wa Daudi.
U malaika aho washika ungisha; huna ung'wila giki, "Yegaga u bebe nguno wilukilagwa mbango; u Seeba ali hamo nangho!"
U munhya ng'wenuyo uzwangana, wandya k''wiganika akwibujaga giki, "U bugishiwa wenubu buli na makulu ki!"
U malaika ung'wila, "Utogohage Malia, nguno wilukilagwa mbango ja ng'wa Mulungu.
Ukubuucha nda ubyale ng'wana ngosha, ung'wilike i lina lyakwe Yesu.
Akubiza ntaale, nguno akwitanwa Ng'wana wakwe uyo ali higulya no. U Seeba Mulungu akung'winha i lisumbi lya nkulugenji wakwe Daudi.
Akubiza nsugi wa numba ya ng'wa Yakobo welelo na welelo, niyo u butemi bokwe buti bo kushila ho."
U Malia unshokeja u malaika giki, "U mhayo gwenuyu gukudulikana ginehe, iki u nene nataali kutoolwa?"
U malaika unshokeja ung'wila giki, "Moyo Ng'wela akukwikiila, huna u budula bokwe uyo ali higulya no bukukukundikija. Na luulu uyo alabyalwe akubiza Ng'wela, Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu.
Nu'' nduguyo u Elizabeti'', nanghwe ali nda ya ng'wana ngosha mu bugikulu bokwe; munhu uyo wali amanikile giki ngumba. Niyo u gwenuyu ng'weji gokwe go katandatu.
Nguno gutiho mhayo nuulu gumo, uyo gutadulikanile u kuli Mulungu."
Huna u Malia uhaya, "U nene nali nkima nsese o ng'wa Seeba; ni gushikiilage git'umo waniwilila." Huna u malaika winga ho, uneka.
U mu shiku jenijo u Malia atadilile, ubuuka wangu uja ku si ya Buyudaya, ku nzengo gumo gwa ku magulya ga kwenuko.
Wahayushika ko wingila u mu ng'wa Zakalia kungisha u Elizabeti.
U Elizabeti aho waliigwa i lilaka lya kugisha kwa ng'wa Malia, ubina u ng'wana uyo oli mu nda yakwe, huna okajiwa na Moyo Ng'wela.
Uhamuka n'ilaka lya higulya alihaya giki, "U bebe ufuuhilwe mbango kutinda pye a bakima. Nu ng'wana uyo ali mu nda yako nanghwe afuuhilwe mbango.
Wilukilwa ki nabo ubu, giki u nina wa ng'wa Seeba wane wiza kunigisha u nene!
Nguno i lilaka lya kugisha kwako aho lyashika duhu u mu matu gane, haho na haho obina na buyegi u ng'wana uyo ali mu nda yane!
Niyo ali na mbango u wa kuzunya giki ikushikilijiwa iyo wawililwe kufuma kuli Seeba."
Huna u Malia uhaya giki, "I ngholo yane ilinyegela Seeba,
nu moyo gwane gulinkumilija Mulungu, Mpija wane.
Nguno wabubonile u budalahwa wa nsese wakwe nkima, iki kufuma haha pyi i shibyalilwe, shikunibala giki nali nfuuhwa.
Nguno u wa budula wanibeegegije mitaale; lina lyakwe lili lyeela.
Shigongo shakwe shiliho kulwa, shibyalilwe na shibyalilwe sha banhu abo bang'ogohile we.
Iyo wabeegije na makono gakwe ili mitaale, wababbalasanije abo bakigunguhyaga mu maganiko ga ngholo jabo.
Wabingije batemi ha masumbi, ubagunguhya a bidohya.
A batuubile wabigutije shizeeze, lelo a basabi ubapeeja makono dalali.
Wangunaanile u ntumami wakwe u Isilaeli, kulwa kwizukwa shigongo shakwe;
git'umo kuli kwisagija kwakwe ku bakulugenji bise; kwandija kuli Abulahamu na bubyile wakwe, kushisha welelo na welelo."
U Malia akalenda nu Elizabeti ikanza lya myeji giti idatu, huna ushoka kaya.
Aho lyashika i likanza lya kubyala kwa ng'wa Elizabeti, ubyala ng'wana ngosha.
A bazenganwa biye na a baduguye aho bigwa, bakayega no hamo nanghwe na kunkumilija Seeba, kulwa kunchila shigongo.
Aho lwashika lushiku lo kanaane, buntwala u ng'wana kujusaalwa. Buhaya kung'winha i lina lya ng'wa ise Zakalia.
Aliyo u nina ulema uhaya, "Yaya; akwitanwa Yohana."
Nabo bunshokeja baling'wila: "Hama iki atiho nuulu umo uyo akitanagwa lina lyenilo u mu luganda lwako!"
Huna bumuja u ise o ng'wana, bo kungemeelela na makono, i lina ilo wali atogilwe kung'witana.
Ubalomba lubbawa lo kwandikila; wandika giki, "Akwitanwa Yohana." Bukumya pye.
Haho na haho utungulilwa; u nomo gokwe nu lulimi shudula u kuyomba, wandya kunkumilija Mulungu!
Pye a bazenganwa bugwilwa idedebaja; niyo pye a banhu u mu magunguli ga Buyudaya buyikala bakwihoyelaga i mihayo yeniyo.
Buli bene ulu biyigwa bituulaga mu moyo, pyi buyuhaya, "I gete u ng'wana ng'wenuyu akubiza wa mbika ki?" Nguno u nkono go ng'wa Seeba gwali hamo nanghwe!
Huna u Zakalia, u ise o ng'wana, okajiwa nguzu ja ng'wa Moyo Ng'wela, wandya kuhanga alihaya,
"Akumilijiwe u Seeba Mulungu wa Baisilaeli. Nguno watugenihile, wenhile butungulwa ku banhu bakwe.
Watubuukigije mhembe ya bupiji, kufuma mu numba ya ntumami wakwe Daudi.
H'umo wahayila kwingiila kale na kale, kubitila mu milomo ya bahangi bakwe beela.
Giki tupile kufuma mu makono ga banishi bise; mu makono ga bose abo batukolilwe.
Wabakulililwe a bakulugenji bise, hangi walizukilwe i lilagane lyakwe i lyeela.
U wilahiji ubo akang'wilahilila nkulugenji wise Abulahamu, giki akutwitila,
kutupija kwinga mu nkono go ng'wanishi, tudule kuntumamila we tuti na booba;
mu wela na mu butungilija shiku jise jose.
U bebe nangho ng'wana, ukwitanwa uli nghangi wakwe uyo ali higulya no; nguno ukubiza ku butongi bo ng'wa Seeba, umeeja-beegeje nzila yakwe.
A banhu bakwe ubamanikije bupiji, kulwa kulekejiwa kwa shibi shabo.
U Mulungu wise watusaatilwe na kutuchila shigongo; Isana lyutugeniha kufuma kwigulya,
kulwa kubaakila abo bakwikalaga mu giiti, na mu nengeeji gwa lufu; na kutongeela mhambala jise mu nzila ya mhola."
Huna luulu u ng'wana ukula, ubiza na nguzu ja moyo. Uja ku matogolo uukikala kwenuko, kushisha lyushika i likanza lya koolechiwa kwakwe ku Baisilaeli.
U mu shiku jenijo shikafunyiwa shilagilo na Kaisali Augusto, giki pye a banhu u mu si bandikwe.
U wenubo bukabiza wandikwa bo kwandya aho Kilenio ali nsugi wa Sulia.
Huna luulu pye a banhu buja kwandikwa, buli ng'wene ku nzengo go ng'wawe.
U Yosefu nanghwe ubuuka i Galilaya, kufuma mu nzengo gwa Nazaleti. Ulinha kuja Buyudaya ku nzengo go ng'wa Daudi, gwitanagwa Betelehemu, nguno wali wa numba ya ng'wa Daudi na bubyile bokwe.
Uja akandikwe hamo nu Malia uyo wali anungije, u mu shiku jenijo u Malia usangwa ali nda nhaale.
Aho bali kwenuko lyushikiila i likanza lyakwe lya kubyala.
Ubyala ng'wana ngosha; tang@i wakwe. Unkumba myenda ya sheleele, huna unaalikija ng'wiliilo lya mitugo, nguno bakagayiwa u ng'wanya u mu numba ya bageni.
I mhandi jenijo baaliho badiimi ba ngholo baali lugundiiga; baali ku matogolo bakulanghanaga madale ga ngholo jabo makanza ga bujiku.
Bahayimanila malaika o ng'wa Seeba obilongela, bupindiwa na bupe w'ikujo lya ng'wa Seeba, bogoha na kogohele kataale no!
Aliyo u malaika ubawila giki, "Mutogohage, nguno nang'wenhela Nghulu Jawiza, ijo jikubiza ja buyegi butaale ku banhu bose.
I lelo yeniyi, u mu nzengo go ng'wa Daudi ng'wabyalilagwa Mpija, Kilisto Seeba.
I shimanikijo shing'we shili giki, mukumona Ng'wana ng'weleele alingiililwe myenda ya sheleele, alaajiwe ng'wiliilo lya mitugo!"
Kuhayimanila lilonga ibita itaale lya ng'wigulu, nu malaika ng'wenuyo wisanja nabo. Bunkumilija Mulungu balihaya giki,
"Ikujo libize kuli Mulungu higulya no, nu mu si ibize ho mhola u ku banhu abo banyegije."
A bamalaika aho binga baja ng'wigulu, a badiimi benabo biwila giki, "Tujagi i Betelehemu tukagubone u mhayo uyo gwilongaga gwenuyu, uyo watoolekeja u Seeba."
Nghana bihuuta bajile ko, buukansanga u Malia nu Yosefu, hamo nu Ng'wana alaalile ng'wiliilo lya mitugo.
Aho bamona u Ng'wana bisomboola i mihayo yakwe, git'umo baali bawililwa.
Pye abo bakigwa iyo bakawilwa na a badiimi bukumya no.
Aliyo u Malia wisumbya pyi i mihayo yeniyo, wibika mu ngholo yakwe, uyuyideedenghanya.
A badiimi aho bibona pyi i yeniyo, bushoka balinkumilija Mulungu, na kungongoola. Nguno iyo baali bawilwa bakibona i yose, giki yali git'umo baali bigwila.
U Ng'wana aho washisha shiku inaane bunsaala, bung'winha i lina lyakwe i lya Yesu, ilo wali winhwa na malaika kuko ataali nuulu kutungilwa nda.
Jahayushika i shiku ja kwejiwa kwabo, buntwala Yelusalemu kujuntuula ku butongi bo ng'wa Seeba, git'umo shihayilile shilagilo sha ng'wa Musa.
H'umo yandikililwe mu shilagilo sha ng'wa Seeba, giki, "Buli ng'wana ngosha u wa kuhangula nda ya ng'wa nina, akwitanwa ali ng'wela kuli Seeba."
Bufunya na shitambo git'umo shilagilo sha ng'wa Seeba shihayilile: nghuulu ibili, nuulu nghune ibili ja mhunda.
U mu Yelusalemu walimo ngosha witanagwa Simioni, munhu ntungilija na wa logohano. Wali akulindiilile u kulungujiwa kwa Baisilaeli; nu Moyo Ng'wela wali hamo nanghwe.
Niyo u Moyo Ng'wela wali wamanikija giki, atucha aho ataali kumona Kilisto Shiyunani Kilisto: Shihebulania Masiya; lina h'i limo.' o ng'wa Seeba.
Huna u Moyo utongeela u munhu ng'wenuyo kuja ku hekalu, uukingila mo. Aho bang'wenha a babyaji bakwe u Ng'wana u Yesu, kwiza kwitilwa git'umo shali shimile sha shilagilo, u munhu ng'wenuyo
ung'wanukula u Ng'wana mu makono gakwe. Huna unkumilija Mulungu alihaya giki,
"Seeba, i haha luulu wanzunilija u nsese wako kwinga, aje mu mhola git'umo ukahayila.
Nguno a miso gane gabubona u bupiji wako,
ubo ubalonja-longegije banhu bose.
Isana lya kwakila mahanga, n'ikujo kulwa banhu bako a Baisilaeli."
U ise nu nina wa Ng'wana bakikumya iyo ikahayiwa kulwakwe.

Huna u Simioni ng'wenuyo ubafuuha mbango. U nina u Malia u ng'wene ung'wila, "Managa giki, u Ng'wana ng'wenuyu ahelelilwe nimo uyo gukwenheleja banhu bingi u mu Baisilaeli kugwa, na bangi kugungumuka; hama akubiza shimanikijo sha kwihalalijiwa.
Hangi maganiko ga ngholo ja banhu bingi gakutendwa ha ng'wape; niyo nu bebe u bupanga boko bukuching'wa lilushu!"
Waliho na nghangi nkima, Ana ng'wana Fanueli; ngikulu o shiku ningi, o luganda lo ng'wa Asheli. A ha bunhya bokwe wali watoolwa, wikala nu ngoshi ikanza lya myaka mpungati,
uchilwa! Huna wikala giko duhu atatoolilwe, kushisha myaka makumi anaane n'ine. Wali atingaga u mu hekalu, wikalaga ng'wenumo liimi ji na bujiku pe; nimo gokwe kulomba na kufunga.
Nanghwe i likanza lyenilo wiza hoi, ubawila i mihayo ya Ng'wana ng'wenuyo, pye a bana Yelusalemu abo baali balindiilile bupiji.
Aho bimala pyi i myanya git'umo shali shihayilile i shilagilo sha ng'wa Seeba, bushoka Galilaya ku nzengo gwabo gwa Nazaleti.
U Ng'wana ukula, ubiza na nguzu, na a masala ukwija, hama ni mbango ja ng'wa Mulungu jali hamo nanghwe.
Buli ng'waka a babyaji bakwe bajaga Yelusalemu, ku shigukulu sha pasaka.
Na a haho washisha myaka ikumi n'ibili, bulinha bajile ko git'umo shali shimile sha shigukulu.
Aho jang'wa i shiku ja shigukulu, bubuuka kushoka kaya. Aliyo u ndinha u Yesu usaaga Yelusalemu, kwike a babyaji bakwe baali batamanile.
Bushimiza lugendo lwa lushiku lugima, baliganika giki nanghwe alimo duhu u ng'wibita lya banhu. Bahayungayiwa, bandya kunkooba u mu badugu nu mu bimane babo.
Aho baduuma u kumona, bushoka i Yelusalemu bakunkoobaga.
Jubita shiku idatu, bahayuja ku hekalu buukansangila mo, wigashaga na balangi, alibadegeleka na kuyubabuja mabujo.
Pye abo bang'wigwaga babukumyaga u witegeleja bokwe, na a mashosho gakwe.
A babyaji bakwe aho bamona budedebala! U nina ung'wila giki, "Bebe Ng'wana, nibuli watwitilile mhayo guli giko? U nene nu so watupinihagije no, tukukukoobaga!"
Nanghwe ubashokeja ubawila, "Nibuli mulinikooba? Mutamanile giki shinigeleelilwe kubiza mu numba ya ng'wa Baba?"
Kwike batagwitegelegije u mhayo uyo akabawila gwenuyo.
Aliyo ushoka nabo, butulumenha bajile i Nazaleti, uyubigwa mu yose. U nina wibika mu ngholo yakwe pyi i yeniyi.
U Yesu ukula, ongeja u mu witegeleja, nu mu kunyeja u Mulungu, na a banhu.

Mu ng'waka gw'ikumi n'itano gwa busugi bo ng'wa Kaisali Tibelio, u nsugi wa Buyudaya wali Pontio Pilato. U ntemi wa Galilaya wali Helode, u Filipo u ng'wanong'wawe wali ntemi wa Itulea na Tulakonio; Lisania nanghwe wali ntemi wa Abilene.
U nimo gwa bugabiji butaale gwali ha silili ya ng'wa Anasi na Kayafa. U mu shiku jenijo u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu gung'wiziila Yohana, u ng'witunja o ng'wa Zakalia, u ku matogolo uko wikalaga.
Wandya kuja akulomeelaga pye a hose u mu si ja mbalama ya mongo gwa Yolodani. Walomeelaga ya bubatiijiwa kulwa kugaluka na kwingila mu kulekejiwa kwa shibi.
Git'umo gwandikilwe mu shitabo sha mihayo ya nghangi Isaya giki, "Ilaka lya munhu alihamuka mu matogolo, beeja-beejagi ikuuwa lya ng'wa Seeba, goloolagi nzila jakwe.
Buli longa lukufukiilwa, i ngulu jikutubijiwa, ni migunguli i yose; hama i nzila ijo jiigomagomile jikugoloolwa, ni ja magagala-gagala jikulenganijiwa.
Ha numa ya henaho pye a banhu bakububona u bupiji bo ng'wa Mulungu."
Mabita mataale ga banhu gakayiza u kuli Yohana kubatiijiwa, aliyo uyubahugula alibawila giki, "Bing'we bubyile wa shipili, nani wamuchagulile giki mugupeele u nsango uyo guliza?

Ali luulu, twajagi matwajo kulwa koolecha bukaaniji bo kugaluka kwing'we. Mutizandya kwiwila giki, 'Tuli na nkulugenji wise Abulahamu.' Nguno nalimuwila nuulu kufuma mu mawe git'aya, u Mulungu adugije kumukija baana u Abulahamu.
Niyo i haha iliho mbasa ituulilwe nghana-nghana a ha matina ga miti. Hu kuhaya buli nti uyo gututwaja matwajo gawiza, gukubbutwa, guponyiwe mu moto."
Huna a mabita ga banhu guyumuja galihaya, "I gisi luulu twite ginehe?"
Nanghwe ubashokeja ubawila giki, "Uyo ali na nghanjo ibili ang'winhe uyo ati nayo, nu yuyo ali na shiliwa iite chene."
A batobisha ba goodi nabo biza u kuli we giki ababatiije. Aho bamuja, "Nangi, al'a bise twite ginehe?"
Nanghwe ubawila, "Ng'ushikilija u kwita iyo mulagililwe, kwike yaya u kukilanija."
Na bashilikale bumuja giki, "A bise nise twite ginehe?" Nanghwe ubashokeja, "Oyagi u kubiboneela a banhu, nu kubalembekeja, niyo muyufujiwa ni mishahala ying'we."
Pye a banhu baali balindiila mu kwisagilwa, kunu bakwideedenghanyaga u mu ngholo jabo ulu giki u Yohana hu wali ng'wene u Kilisto.

Aliyo u wei ng'wenekili u Yohana akabashokeja pye a bose ubawila giki, "U nene nghana nalimubatiija na minzi, aliyo aliza uyo anikilile u budula, uyo natigeleelilwe u nene nuulu kutaligula matungijo ga shilatu shakwe; u ng'wenuyo h'uyo akumubatiija na Moyo Ng'wela na moto.

U luhungo lokwe ali nalo mu nkono gokwe wei ng'wenekili, hama u lubuuga lokwe akulupyagula alweje pe. U busiga akubukuminga chiza abutuule ng'wiluuli lyakwe; aliyo a meela akugapemba mu moto guti gwa kujima!"
Niyo akabalomeela na kubahugula a banhu mihayo mingi ya mbika na mbika.
Nu ntemi Helode unghugula kulwa nguno ya ng'wa Helodia uyo wali nke wa ng'wanong'wawe, na kulwa mihayo yingi-yingi i yabubi iyo wiyitaga.
Aliyo u Helode akamponya u Yohana mu jeela, ubiza ongeja gwabubi gungi a higulya ya mibi i yose!
Bahayubatiijiwa pye a banhu, nu Yesu ubatiijiwa; aho alilomba, kuhayimanila i ligulu lyaluguka.
Moyo Ng'wela wika ali mu mili giti gwa nghuulu izile a hali we; n'ilaka liza kufuma u ng'wigulu lilihaya giki, "U bebe uli Ng'wana wane Ntogwa, uyo nakuyegelile hataale no."
U Yesu aho alandya kutumama wali na myaka giti makumi adatu, wiganikilagwa giki oli ng'witunja o ng'wa Yosefu, uyo oli ng'wana Eli;
ng'witunja o ng'wa Matati, o ng'wa Lawi, o ng'wa Meliki, o ng'wa Yanai, o ng'wa Yosefu.
O ng'wa Matatia, o ng'wa Amosi, o ng'wa Naumu, o ng'wa Hesili, o ng'wa Nagai.
O ng'wa Maati, o ng'wa Matatia, o ng'wa Semei, o ng'wa Yosefu, o ng'wa Yuda.
O ng'wa Yonani, o ng'wa Lesa, o ng'wa Zelubabeli, o ng'wa Salatieli, o ng'wa Neli.
O ng'wa Meliki, o ng'wa Adi, o ng'wa Kosamu, o ng'wa Elimadamu, o ng'wa Eli.
O ng'wa Yoshwa, o ng'wa Eliezeli, o ng'wa Yolimu, o ng'wa Matati, o ng'wa Lawi.
O ng'wa Simioni, o ng'wa Yuda, o ng'wa Yosefu, o ng'wa Yonamu, o ng'wa Eliakimu.
O ng'wa Melea, o ng'wa Mena, o ng'wa Matata, o ng'wa Nasani, o ng'wa Daudi.
O ng'wa Yese, o ng'wa Obedi, o ng'wa Boazi, o ng'wa Salimoni, o ng'wa Naasoni.
O ng'wa Aminadabu, o ng'wa Lamu, o ng'wa Esilomu, o ng'wa Falesi, o ng'wa Yuda.
O ng'wa Yakobo, o ng'wa Isaka, o ng'wa Abulahamu, o ng'wa Tela, o ng'wa Naholi.
O ng'wa Selugi, o ng'wa Leu, o ng'wa Pelegi, o ng'wa Ebali, o ng'wa Saala.
O ng'wa Kainamu, o ng'wa Alifakisadi, o ng'wa Shemu, o ng'wa Noa, o ng'wa Lameki.
O ng'wa Matusela, o ng'wa Enoka, o ng'wa Yaleti, o ng'wa Mahalaleeli, o ng'wa Kainamu.
O ng'wa Enosi, o ng'wa Seti, o ng'wa Adamu, o ng'wa Mulungu.
Huna luulu u Yesu winga i Yolodani okajiwe na Moyo Ng'wela; h'uyo untongeela kuja ku matogolo,
uukamala ko shiku makumi ane, akugemagwa na Shetani. U mu shiku jenijo atalyile shose-shose; aho jashila utuuba.
I likanza lyenilo, u Shetani ung'wila, "Ulu uli Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu lilagilage i liwe ili libize shiliwa."
Nanghwe u Yesu unshokeja, "Yandikilwe giki, 'U munhu atudula kubiza mpanga kulwa shiliwa duhu.' "
Ha numa u Shetani untongeela kulinha kwigulya, uukang'oolekeja pye a mabusugi ga mu si ng'wikanza ido.
Huna ung'wila giki, "Nakukwinha bebe pyi u budula wenubu ni likujo lyamo, nguno namala kwinhwa nene, nadugije kung'winha ose-ose uyo nutogwa.
Na luulu u bebe ulu unilamya, shikubiza shako pye."
Nanghwe u Yesu unshokeja ung'wila, "Gwandikilwe giki, 'Namyage Seeba Mulungu wako, na untumamile wei duhu!' "
Huna untongeela kuja Yelusalemu, uukantuula higulya ya hekalu; ung'wila, "Ulu uli Ng'wana o ng'wa Mulungu iponejage ha si kufuma aha!
Nguno gwandikilwe giki, 'Akulagila bamalaika bakwe kulwako, bakulanghane.
Na bakukubuucha mu makono gabo, utizipama lupambala lwako h'iwe.' "
Nanghwe u Yesu unshokeja ung'wila, "Guhayiwe giki, 'Yaya u kungema u Seeba Mulungu wako.' "
U shetani aho wamala pyi u bugemi, uneka kakanza ho.
U Yesu ushoka i Galilaya ali mu budula bo ng'wa Moyo; u lukumo lokwe lusambaala pye a mapandi genayo.
Buyunkumilija pye a banhu ulu olanga u mu masinagogi gabo.
