Ubuuka, wikindika; wandya kushimiza. Wingila nabo u mu hekalu akushimizaga kunu usata-sata na kunkumilija Mulungu!
Pye a banhu bumona alishimiza, kunu akunkumilijaga Mulungu.
Bung'witegeleja giki, hu ng'wene uyo wikalaga igashije akwilombelejaga ha nyango gwa hekalu uyo gukitanagwa Nsoga. Bakakumya no, gubajinjimaja u mhayo uyo gukang'wilongela gwenuyo.
Uyo akapijiwa kufuma mu bulemehazu ng'wenuyo, akikala abadimile a ba Petelo nu Yohana, nose bushika ng'wibindo litanagwa lya ng'wa Solomoni. A banhu bakakumya no, pye a bose buyupeela bajile mo.

U Petelo aho wababona a banhu ubawila giki, "Bing'we bababa Baisilaeli, nibuli muligukumya u mhayo gwenuyu, nuulu nibuli mulitukalalila a bise giti twagwitaga na budula wise, nuulu giki u munhu ng'wenuyu twang'winhaga budula bo kushimiza kulwa wela wise?

U Mulungu wa ng'wa Abulahamu na Isaka na Yakobo; u Mulungu wa bakulugenji bise, wangunguhije u Ntumami wakwe u Yesu, uyo mukanodeela, na kunema ku butongi bo ng'wa Pilato, nuulu iki u Pilato ng'wenekili wali wamala kulamula giki antaligule.
Aliyo a bing'we ng'unema u Ng'wela na Ntungilija, ng'ulomba kwinhwa munhu mulagi.
Lelo u Ng'winhi wa bupanga ng'umulaga, aliyo u Mulungu wanjuukije kufuma mu bafu, hama a bise hu tuli bakaaniji bakwe.

Huna luulu, kulwa kulizunya i lina lya ng'wa Yesu, u munhu uyu muumanile na kale ng'wenuyu mulimona waguzuhiagwa mu lina lyenilo. U mhayo gwa kulizunya i lina lyenilo hu gwene uyo gwang'winhaga mhola nshikanu giki ku butongi wing'we!
Kwike badugu bane, namanile giki a bing'we na a batongeeji bing'we ng'wiyita i yeniyo mu butumana.
Aliyo u mu giko gukashikiila u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu, u gwa kuluhiwa kwa ng'wa Kilisto wakwe, git'umo wali wahayila kufuma kale, mu nzila ya bahangi bose.
Ali luulu, galukagi ng'winge u mu shibi shing'we, shijimanguchiwe; makanza ga kwifuujiwa gize kufuma kuli Seeba.
Antume u Yesu Kilisto, uyo ahelilwe kulwa nguno ying'we kufuma kale na kale,

uyo shing'wigeleelilwe kwikala ng'wigulu kushisha gashike a makanza ga shikolo shose kugaluchiwa shibize hangi git'umo shaali na kale; umo Mulungu ahayilile kufuma kale, mu nzila ya bahangi bakwe beela.
Nguno u Musa akahaya giki, 'U Seeba Mulungu wing'we akumubuukija kufuma mu badugu bing'we nghangi wa kubiza giti nene; u ng'wenuyo shiigelile mung'wigwe mu yose iyo alamuwile.
Munhu ose-ose uyo atung'wigwa u nghangi ng'wenuyo, akukenaagulwa injiwe gete u mu banhu.'
Pye a bahangi, kufuma kuli Sang'weli, na a babo bakalondeela ha numa yakwe, bajihayaga na kujikumucha i shiku jeniji.
A bing'we muli baana ba bahangi, na ba bulagane ubo Mulungu akabeeja na bakulugenji bise; git'umo akang'wilila Abulahamu giki, 'Pyi i ng'anda ja mu si jikwilukilwa mbango mu nzila ya bubyile wako.'
U Mulungu aho wanjuucha u Ntumami wakwe akantuma ku bing'we tame, giki anekeje na kung'winha mbango buli ng'wene uyo alagaluke kwinga mu shibi shakwe."
A ba Petelo nu Yohana aho bataali bubalomeela a banhu, kuhayimanila babasanga ho bagabiji na Basadukayo, hamo na ntaale wa balanghani ba hekalu.
Baali bapembeka na bupelanu kibi no, nguno babalangaga a banhu na kubalomeela mhola ja bujuuko bo bafu, mu lina lya ng'wa Yesu.
Aho bashika bubadima; kwike iki yali mhindi buukabalugalila giki balanghanwe kushisha ntondo yaho.
Aliyo abo bakagwigwa u mhayo gwabo bakazunya, i lisaabu lya bagosha lyushika giti shihumbi shitano.
Aho wela i ntondo yaho i dilu, a basugi na a banamhala na a balangi ba shilagilo bibilinga u mu Yelusalemu.
(U ntaale wa bagabiji, u Anasi, waliho; nu Kayafa, na Yohana na Isikanda; pye a ba luganda lwa ntaale wa bagabiji).
Aho babenha bubimilija, huna bubabuja giki, "U mhayo gwenuyo mukagwita mu budula ki, na mu lina ki?"
U Petelo ubashokeja kunu okajiagwa na Moyo Ng'wela; ubawila giki, "Bing'we basugi ba banhu, na a bing'we banamhala,
i lelo yeniyi ulu tuligisilijiwa kulwa nguno ya mhayo gwawiza uyo witililwe u munhu uyo wali nemehazu, giki wapijiwe ginehe;

a bing'we pye a bose managi, na a Baisilaeli a bose bamane, giki u munhu uyo imiilile ku butongi wing'we ng'wenuyu, ali mpanga wa gili-gili mu lina lya ng'wa Yesu Kilisto wa Nazaleti, uyo mukankoma ha nsalaba; aliyo u Mulungu wanjuukije kufuma mu bafu.
Huna ng'wene uyo ali Iwe ilo mukalidalaha a bing'we bazengi, ilo lyabizile lya kwigoloolela i numba.
Niyo butiho bupiji muli munhu ungi ose-ose, nguno nduhu lina lingi hangi pye a hose a ha silili y'igulu ilo binhwa a banhu, giki shitwigeleelilwe kupijiwa mulyo."
Aho babubona u bugimu bo ng'wa Petelo nu Yohana, budeeba ni giki baali banhu batalangilwe, bakakumya no; aliyo bubitegeleja giki bikalaga hamo na Yesu.
Bakagayiwa u gwa kuhaya, nguno bamonaga nu munhu uyo wali wapijiwa, imiilile hamo nabo a ba Petelo nu Yohana.
Huna bubalagila kufuma hanze, binga u ng'wibanza; a boi buguhoyela u mhayo gwenuyo bu maasaga.
Buhaya giki, "I gete tubiite ginehe a banhu benaba? Nguno pye a bana Yelusalemu bamanile hape giki baabeegije shimanikijo shitaale, isho tutadugije kushijimangucha?
I gete tubalemejagi u kuyomba na munhu ose-ose u mu lina lyenili, u mhayo gwenuyu gutizongeja kusambaala mu banhu bose."
Huna bubitana bubalemeja batizulihaya nuulu hado i lina lya ng'wa Yesu, nuulu ni kulanga duhu u mu lina lyenilo yaya!
Nabo a ba Petelo nu Yohana bubashokeja buhaya giki, "Lamulagi bing'we benekili, ulu gutungiligije u kuli Mulungu u gwa kung'wigwa bing'we kutinda kung'wigwa Mulungu.
Nguno a bise dutudula u kuleka u kwisomboola iyo twamalile kwibona na kwiyigwa."
Bongeja kubakanga, huna bubalekela buja, aliyo batabonile nzila ya kubinha nsango, kulwa nguno ya banhu, iki pye a bose bankumilijaga Mulungu kulwa mhayo uyo gwali gwilonga gwenuyo.
Nguno u munhu uyo wali witilwa i shimanikijo shenisho wali ntaale, wa myaka ikilile ha makumi ane.
Aho balekelwa buja u ku bichabo, buukabawila iyo bakawilwa na a bagabiji bataale na a banamhala.
Aho bigwa, pye a bose bumuukija Mulungu a malaka gabo buhaya giki, "Seeba, hu bebe uli nseemi walyo i ligulu ni si, pye na a manyanza, ni shose isho shilimo.

Bebe ng'wenekili ukalungalunga mu nguzu ja ng'wa Moyo Ng'wela kubitila mu nomo go ng'wa siswe Daudi, u ntumami wako; ukahaya giki, 'Nibuli a mahanga gakupelanaga, na a banhu bakulyaga gwinda ya dalali?
A batemi ba mu si bakulomanaga; na a basugi bakwibilingaga mabanza mabanza giki bilwishe nu Seeba, hamo nu Kilisto wakwe!'
"Nguno nghana u Helode nu Pontio Pilato, na a Baisilaeli, bakikuminga u mu nzengo uyu, hamo na banhu ba mahanga, buniila gwinda u Ntumami wako ng'wela, u Yesu, u Milwa-maguta.
Bung'witila iyo bebe ng'wenekili wihelile na nkono gwako kufuma kale giki ikubiza ho.
Ali luulu Seeba, galolage a makango gabo i haha, a batumami bako ubinhe bugimu wa kugusomboola u mhayo gwako.
Gugoloolage u nkono gwako kulwa kupija, na koolecha shimanikijo; mihayo ya kukumya ibeejiwe mu lina lya ng'wa Yesu, u Ntumami wako ng'wela."
Aho balomba giko, i lipandi lyenilo aho baali lyutinginyiwa, pye a bose bokajiwa na Moyo Ng'wela. Bugulomeela mu bugimu u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu.
U ng'wibita lya bazunya, pye a bose baali na ngholo imo, na moyo gumo; wali atiho nuulu umo wabo wa kuhaya giki i sabo iyo wali nayo yali yakwe ya ng'wenekili. Aliyo pyi i shikolo shali sha busangi.
A batung'wa baali na nimo ntaale gwa kubukaanila u bujuuko bo ng'wa Seeba Yesu. Pye a bose baali ha silili ya mbango ja ng'wa Seeba.
Wali atiho nuulu umo wabo uyo wakoyiagwa makoye ga bugayiwa, nguno abo baali na numba nuulu migunda bakayujinja bajenha i sabo ijo bapandikaga,
biza bajituula ku butongi wa batung'wa jagabanhyiwa; buli ng'wene wapandika kulenganila na makoye gakwe.
Waliho munhu umo lina lyakwe Yosefu; wa luganda lo Balawi, muna Kupulo. A batung'wa baali bang'wilika lina lya Balinaba, makulu gaho nunguja wa banhu.
U munhu ng'wenuyo wali na ngunda, ugujinja; isho akapandika pyi i shose ushenha, wiza ushituula ku butongi wa batung'wa.
Aliyo waliho munhu nebe, lina lyakwe Anania na nke okwe Safila; u ng'wene ohayujinja u ngunda gokwe,
ulekeela ibudika lya sabo iyo akapandika, giki inonghe wei ng'wenekili, nu nke ubiza amanile! I libudika ilo likasaaga ulisola ulitwala ku batung'wa.
Aliyo u Petelo ung'wila giki, "Bebe Anania, nibuli u Shetani okalaga u mu ngholo yako, nose wabisaga ibudika lya sabo iyo wapandikile u mu mpango gwa ngunda, giki unembe u Moyo Ng'wela?
I sabo yeniyo, aho yali mu nkono gwako yali iti yako? Na a haho wijinja yali iti mu budula wako? Nibuli wabisaga mhayo guli giko u mu ngholo yako? Utalembile banhu, wanembaga Mulungu!"
U Anania aho wigwa i mihayo yeniyo ugwa, ucha! Abo bakigwa bakagwilwa booba butaale no.
Basumba bubuuka bungolanya, bunfunya hanze, buukanjika.
Aho lyabita ikanza lya sa giti idatu, wiza nu nke, nanghwe wingila; kwike usangwa ataali u kwimana iyo yagwaga.
U Petelo ung'wila nanghwe giki, "Bebe aliniwilage, i sabo yeniyi, h'iyo ng'wapandikile aho ng'wagujinja u ngunda?" Nu ng'wene uhaya, "Alichene, h'i yene!"
U Petelo ung'wila, "Aliyo nibuli ng'walomanaga kungema u Moyo wa ng'wa Seeba? Managa giki a ha nyango henaho, galiho magulu ga banhu bajaga kunjika u ngoshi wako, nu bebe bakukubuucha!"
Nanghwe i likanza lyenilo ugwa ha si u ku magulu ga ng'wa Petelo, ucha! Bahayingila a basumba bunsanga waacha; bumucha nanghwe buukanjika, bung'wiheja nu ngoshi wakwe.
I kanisa i yose yugwilwa booba butaale, pye na a bangi abo bakayigwa i yeniyi!
A batung'wa bakayubeeja na makono gabo shimanikijo na mihayo mingi ya kukumya u mu banhu; a bose bibilingaga na moyo gumo ng'wibindo lya ng'wa Solomoni.
Aliyo u mu bangi wali atiho nuulu umo wa kugima kwisangija nabo; kwike ahene a banhu babakumilijaga.
Hama a bazunya bakongeja u kukwila; nguno mabita ga bagosha na bakima gakayungalukila Seeba.
Nose a banhu buyubenha na basaatu bababuukije ha buliili nuulu ha shilago, biza babatuula hihi na nzila, giki ulu alibita u Petelo guyubakuumya bamo babo nuulu nengeeji gokwe duhu.
Bangi buyufuma na ku mizengo yingi, iyo yali hihi-hihi na Yelusalemu, balibenha bababuukije a basaatu na a babo bakoyiagwa masamva; pye bapilaga.
Huna u ngabiji ntaale ubuuka osaayaga kingi nasho, hamo na a b'igele lya Basadukayo abo baali nanghwe.
Bushika bubadima bo hape-hape a batung'wa, buja buukabasoosela mu jeela.
Aliyo i bujiku wiza malaika o ng'wa Seeba, ugulugula u nyango gwa ha jeela. Ubatongeela abafunije kuja hanze, huna ubawila giki,
"Jagi u mu hekalu mukabalomeele a banhu pyi i mihayo ya bupanga wenubu."

Aho bigwa giko nghana bubuuka dilu makingo, buja u mu hekalu buukandya kulanga. U ngabiji ntaale aho wiza na a babo baali nanghwe, bulibilinga i libanza, na a basugi ba Baisilaeli a bose bubiza ho; huna butumija u ku jeela giki bakenhwe a batung'wa.
Aliyo a bashilikale aho bashika ko batabasangile u mu jeela, bushoka biza bujifunya i mhola.
Buhaya giki, "I jeela twisanga ilugalile chiza no, na a balanghani bimiilaga a ha milyango, kwike twahayulugula tutasangile mo munhu u mu gati!"
U ntaale wa balanghani ba hekalu na a bagabiji bataale aho bagwigwa u mhayo gwenuyo buzwangana, buyiganika giki himba bakubiza bagwilagwa mhayo ki!
Wiza munhu nebe ubawila giki, "Alibalolagi abo ng'wali ng'wabatuulile mu jeela, babo bali mu hekalu bimiilaga balibalanga banhu!"
Huna uja u ntaale wa bashilikale na balanghani ba hekalu, buukabenha; kwike iti bo nguzu, nguno bakogoha giki a banhu bakubaponda mawe.
Aho babenha, bushikila kubimilija u ng'wibanza. Huna u ntaale wa bagabiji ubabuja

alihaya giki, "Bing'we, tutamulemegije tumuwila giki yaya u kulanga hangi u mu lina lyenilo? Hama iki hu mulibona luulu giki i haha pyi i Yelusalemu ng'wiyokajaga mamihayo ging'we ayo mukulangaga, nose a mininga gakwe u munhu ng'wenuyo mulihaya kutubilija bise!"
Huna u Petelo na a batung'wa biye bushosha giki, "A bise itwigeleelilwe tung'wigwe Mulungu kutinda banhu.
U Mulungu wa bakulugenji bise wanjuukije u Yesu uyo mukamulaga bo kunungeleja ha linti.
U Mulungu wangunguhije u Munhu ng'wenuyo, i haha ali ku bulyo wakwe, Ntemi na Mpija kulwa kubinha a Baisilaeli budula bo kugaluka na kulekejiwa shibi shabo.
A bise tuli bakaaniji bayo i mihayo yeniyi, nu Moyo Ng'wela uyo Mulungu akubinhaga buli bene abo bung'wigwa."
Aho bigwa giko, buching'wa u mu ngholo jabo, bubona giki bababulage.

Aliyo u ng'wibanza ng'wenumo walimo Nfalisayo nebe, nangi wa shilagilo, lina lyakwe Gamalieli. U munhu ng'wenuyo baali bankugije pye a banhu. Huna wimiila ulagila bafunyiwe hanze a banhu benabo kakanza kado.
Uliwila i libanza giki, "Bing'we bababa Baisilaeli, ilanghanagi umo mulihaya kubiitila a banhu benaba.

Nguno aho jitaali u kushika i shiku jeniji, akilonga munhu nebe; Teuda, uyuja akwigimba-gimbaga giki shadiima. Na nghana akapandika bahemba: bagosha ba kushika giti magana ane; aliyo akabulagwa, na a bahemba bakwe pye a bose busalanghana, gugaya nu yuyo wagwitaga.
Aho wabita u ng'wenuyo, wigela hangi ungi u mu shiku ja banhu kwandikwa; wali Yuda muna Galilaya. Nanghwe uduta banhu, aliyo nu ng'wene akayagala, abo baali bang'wigwile busalanghana pye a bose.
Nose u nene nalimuwila i haha giki, lekanagi nabo gete a banhu benaba, ng'ooye u kwikala mukubakuubilijaga. Nguno i liganiko lyenili nuulu u nimo gwenuyu ulu gubize gufumile ku banhu gukucha duhu.
Aliyo ulu gufumile kuli Mulungu, mutudula u kugukenaagula na hado yaya; ilanghanagi mutizubiza mukwilwishaga na Mulungu!" Nghana bung'wigwa.
Huna bubitana a batung'wa, bubatula mbooko; hama bubalemeja u kulihaya i lina lya ng'wa Yesu, bubalekela buja.
A batung'wa binga u ng'wibanza bayegaga no, nguno bakabona bisaabagwa giki bigeleelilwe kugoolwa kulwa lina lya ng'wa Yesu.
Bakongeja kuyuja buli lushiku u mu hekalu kulanga, hama batooyile nu kuja hose-hose u mu kaya ja banhu bakulomeelaga ya ng'wa Kilisto Yesu.

U mu shiku jenijo aho bakwila a bahemba, bukilonga budugumi. A Bayudaya ba Shiyunani buyubadugumila a Bayudaya ba Shihebulania, nguno a bachilwa babo bakayubitiilwa u kugunaanwa u mu mihayo ya buli lushiku.
Huna luulu ab'ikumi na babili bubitana pye a bahemba buhaya giki, "Iti yawiza a bise tuguleke u nimo gwa kugulanga u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu, tuyulonja mihayo ya shiliwa.
A bing'we badugu solanhyagi banhu mpungati u mu bing'we, tubatuule a ha nimo gwenuyu. Babize bakukaanilagwa giki bokajiwe na Moyo, hangi bali na witegeleja.
Lelo a bise bene tukomeeje u kugwita u nimo gwa kulomba na kugulomeela u mhayo."
I liganiko lyenilo lyubayeja pye a badugu; bunsola Stefano, munhu wa kuzunya na okalile Moyo Ng'wela, na Filipo na Pilokolo na Nikanola na Timona na Palimena na Nikolao, nghembekwa wa Antiokia.
A banhu benabo bubenha u ku batung'wa, bubalombela na kubatuulila makono.
Ha numa ya henaho, u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu gongeja u kuja gukusambaalaga; ni lisaabu lya bahemba u mu Yelusalemu lyongeja u kukula, na bagabiji bingi buyugwanukula u kuzunya kwenuku.
Huna u Stefano kulwa kokajiwa nguzu na budula, uyubeeja mihayo ya kukumya na shimanikijo shitaale u mu banhu.
Kwimanila bigela banhu balebe ba ng'wisinagogi litanagwa lya Wiyabi, na bana Kilene na Isikandelia, na bana Kilikia, na bana Asia; buyung'wihalalija u Stefano.
Kwike batawimilile u witegeleja bo kasomboolele kakwe, nu Moyo uyo wali muli we.
Banoga nose bukobya banhu bubahana; bahaye giki, "U ng'wenuyu twang'wigwile alinsondagula u Musa nu Mulungu!"
Bubabipya a masala a banhu na a banamhala, pye na a balangi ba shilagilo; biza bundima u Stefano buntwala kwibanza.
Butuula bakaaniji balomolomo; buhaya giki, "U munhu ng'wenuyu alemile gete u koya u kulisondagula i lipandi lyeela ili, ni shilagilo.
Nguno twang'wigwile alihaya na giki, angu u Yesu wa Nazaleti ng'wenuyu akulikenaagula i lipandi lyenili, ajigaluche ni nhungwa ijo twalekelwa na Musa!"
Pye abo baali bigashije u ng'wibanza aho banola u Stefano, bububona u bushu bokwe bobizaga giti bo ng'wa malaika.
U ntaale o bagabiji umuja, "Angu, i mihayo yeniyi ili chene?"
Nanghwe uhaya giki, "Bing'we bagosha, badugu bane na bababa, nidegelekagi! U Mulungu akiyoolecha kuli Abulahamu aho ali Mesopotamia, ataali nuulu kusaamila Halani.
Ung'wila giki, 'Fumaga u mu si yako nu mu banhu ba luganda lwako; uje ku si iyo nalakoolekeje.'
Winga nghana u mu si ya Bakalidayo, uja Halani uukazenga kwenuko. Aho ali kwenuko uzumalika u ise, huna usaamijiwa u mu si yeniyi mukwikalaga i haha.

Aliyo u Mulungu atang'winhile wingiji moi, nuulu ni katogolo kado duhu ka lupambala lumo. Kwike akang'wisagija giki akung'winha ibize ya wingiji bokwe, hamo na bubyile bokwe, nuulu iki wali ataali kubyala ng'wana ose-ose.
Hama hangi u Mulungu uhaya giki, a banhu ba bubyile bokwe balabiza bageni mu si ya banhu bangi, baliitwa kubiza basese kushisha ikanza lya myaka magana ane.
Aliyo u Mulungu uhaya giki, 'I lihanga ilo lilabiita kubiza basese lyenilo nalalinha nsango, ha numa ya yeniyo bafume bize u ng'wipandi ili bayunilamya nene.'
Huna ung'winha bulagane bo kusaalwa; aho wamyala u Isaka unsaala ha lushiku lo kanaane. U Isaka nanghwe umyala Yakobo, nanghwe u Yakobo ubabyala a bakulugenji bise abo ikumi na babili.
"A bakulugenji bise benabo bunjinja u Yosefu nguno bakamonela wilu; utwalwa Misili. Aliyo u Mulungu wali hamo nanghwe.

Umpija u mu makoye gakwe pye a gose, hama ung'winha masala na kwanukulwa u ku butongi bo ng'wa Falao, uyo wali ntemi wa Misili. U ntemi ng'wenuyo ung'wita kubiza ntaale wa si yose ya Misili, hamo ni kaya yakwe i yose.
Huna yugwa nzala nhaale u mu si ya Misili ni Kanaani; a bakulugenji bise bumala i shiliwa, bubiza na makoye mataale.
U Yakobo wigwa giki shiliko shiliwa i Misili, ubatuma a bakulugenji bise, buja koi lukangala lwa kwandya.
Bahayushoka koi u lwa kabili, u Yosefu uukimanicha u ku baduguye; u luganda lo ng'wa Yosefu lumanika u kuli Falao.
Huna u Yosefu ubatuma buukang'witana u ise u Yakobo, na a banhu bakwe pye a bose; u bukumi wabo baali banhu makumi mpungati na batano.
Nghana u Yakobo utulumenha kuja Misili; uukachila kwenuko, pye na a bakulugenji bise.
Kwike bakabuuchiwa buukajikilwa Shekemu, mu shigila isho Abulahamu wali wagula ku bitunja ba ng'wa Hamoli, mu Shekemu ng'wenumo."
"Aho lyegeela i likanza lya kushikilijiwa kwa wisagija ubo Mulungu wali wang'winha Abulahamu, a banhu busangwa bibyala bakwila no u mu si ya Misili.
Wanoga utema ntemi ungi u mu Misili, uyo wali ataamanile u Yosefu.
U munhu ng'wenuyo wandya kubiitila nyasala-sala a banhu ba luganda lwise, uyubaluhya na kubahadikija a babyaji kuyubaponya ku matogolo a baana a beleele, baachila kwenuko.
U mu shiku jenijo ubyalwa Musa; ng'wana wawiza u kuli Mulungu, ulanghanwa mu kaya ya ng'wa ise ikanza lya myeji idatu.
Aho wafunyiwa hanze kujulekwa ku matogolo, nshike o ng'wa Falao unsola unela, ung'wita kubiza ng'witunja wakwe.
U Musa akalangwa pyi u bumani bo mu Misili, ubiza na budula u mu kalungalungile, nu mu katumamile."
"Aliyo aho washisha myaka makumi ane, lyung'wiziila iganiko lya kujubalola a baduguye a Baisilaeli.
Umona umo wabo aliboneelwa, ungunija; untula u muna Misili umulaga.
U wei wiganikaga hamo a baduguye bakwitegeleja, giki u Mulungu atogilwe kubinha bupiji kubitila mu nkono gokwe, aliyo batitegelegije.
Ha lushiku lwa ntondo yaho ubasanga babili babo bizwanjaga, ugema kubayangula giki bigwindanye; ubawila, 'Bing'we bagosha, nibuli mulikenya aliyo muli ba ludugu lumo?'
Kwike uyo wang'wiboneelaga ng'wiye umpama u Musa, kunu alinfikilija uhaya giki, 'U bebe i gete nani wakutuulile butaale na kubiza namuji wise?
Utogilwe kunibulaga nu nene git'umo ukamulagila muna Misili igolo?'
U mhayo gwenuyo gung'wenheleja u Musa kupeela, uja uukikala mu si ya Midiani; aho ali kwenuko ubyala bitunja babili.
Yubita myaka makumi ane ali kwenuko, lwise lumo wilongelwa na malaika o ng'wa Seeba mu nzila ya ndali ja moto ng'wisaka, kwitogolo lya ku lugulu lo Sinai.
U Musa aho ogubona u mhayo gwenuyo akakumya no; wahayihamba kwegeela giki alole chiza, ligela ilaka lya ng'wa Seeba, lilihaya giki,
'Nali Mulungu wa bakulugenji bako, Mulungu wa ng'wa Abulahamu na Isaka na Yakobo.' U Musa ogoha uyudetema, ulemeelwa u kulola.
U Seeba ung'wila giki, 'Injaga i shilatu shako u ku mhambala jako, nguno aho wimiilaga henaha lil'ipandi lyeela.
Naalolile ko i Misili nububona u buluhiwa wa banhu bane, ni nghungu yabo nayigwile. Ali luulu, nikaga kubakomoola, i haha nzugu nakutume uje ko i Misili.'

"U Musa uyo bakanema balihaya giki, 'Nani wakutuulile butaale na kubiza namuji?' hu ng'wene uyo akatung'wa na Mulungu mu nkono go ng'wa malaika uyo akang'wilongela ng'wisaka, ung'wita kubiza ntongeeji na nkomooji.
U munhu ng'wenuyu h'uyo ubiza ntongeeji wabo, ubafunya u mu Misili; wita shimanikijo na mihayo ya kukumya u mu si yeniyo, nu ku Nyanza Yaza, na haho bali ng'witogolo ikanza lya myaka makumi ane.
U Musa ng'wenuyu hu ng'wene uyo akabawila a Baisilaeli giki, 'U Seeba akung'winha nghangi wa kubiza giti nene, wa kufuma mu badugu bing'we.'
Hu ng'wene uyo wali nayo i kanisa u ku matogolo, hamo nu malaika uyo akayomba nanghwe ku lugulu lo Sinai, uyo wali hamo nabo a bakulugenji bise abo bakanukula mihayo ya bupanga; giki batwinhe nise.
"Hu ng'wene uyo bakalema u kung'wigwa a bakulugenji bise; bumpamila ku mhelo, bushoka Misili u mu ngholo jabo.
Bung'wila Alooni giki, 'Tubeegejage bamulungu bayututongeela, nguno u Musa uyo watwingije Misili ng'wenuyu tutamanile iyo yang'wilongelile.'
Na nghana u mu shiku jenijo bubeeja shiikolile sha ndama; lishiikolile buyulifunija shitambo, buyegela milimo ya makono gabo!

Nanghwe u Mulungu ugaluka, ubalekanija bubiza balamya ba mabita ga kwilunde, git'umo gwandikilwe mu shitabo sha bahangi; giki, 'Bing'we numba ya Isilaeli, i likanza lya myaka makumi ane aho ng'wali ku matogolo, ng'wanifunijaga shitambo u nene, nuulu shakwinha shose-shose?
Tuhaya ng'wabuuchaga iheema lya ng'wa Moloki, na sonda ya ng'wa mulungu wing'we Laifani duhu, mashiikolile ayo ng'wali ng'wibeegeja giki muyugalamya! Nakumuponya muje kule gukila Babuloni!'
"A bakulugenji bise aho bali ku matogolo baali n'iheema lya kubeejiwa git'umo wali walagiilila uyo akang'wila Musa kulibeeja, libize git'umo shaali i shigemelo isho akashibona.

A bakulugenji bise bulyanukula i liheema lyenilo, bulyenhanija aho baliza na Yoshwa ng'wikanza lya kudima wingiji mu mahanga, ayo Mulungu akagapeeja gubingila. Baali nalyo kushisha mu shiku ja ng'wa Daudi,
uyo akilukilwa mbango ku butongi bo ng'wa Mulungu. Nose ubuja ulu adugije kunzengela wikalo u Mulungu wa numba ya ng'wa Yakobo.
Kwike u nzengi wayo i numba yeniyo akabiza Solomoni.
Aliyo nahene uyo ali higulya no, atikalaga mu numba ja kuzengwa na makono; git'umo ahayilile u nghangi giki,
'I ligulu lyene isumbi lyane, lelo i si buli butuulo bo mhambala jane; nose mukunizengela numba ki u nene, nuulu ipandi ki lya kwifuulila? Alihaya Seeba!
Angu, u nkono gwane gutashibeegije pyi i shose ishi?'
"Bing'we ba mitwe midiimu, ba maganiko masoso na matu gatigwaga, bilwisha ba ng'wa Moyo Ng'wela ba shiku jose na jose! Umo baali a basing'we na a bing'we h'umo muli.
I gisi nghangi ki uyo batanuhije a basing'we? Iki bababulagaga abo balomeelaga nghulu ja kwiza kwakwe u Ntungilija, uyo ng'wabizile balodeeji na babulagi bakwe a bing'we!
Angu niyo a bing'we hu muli bene a banukuji ba shilagilo mu nzila ya bamalaika, aliyo hu mutashidimile!"
Aho biyigwa i yeniyo buching'wa u mu ngholo jabo, bung'wilumila nghaya.
Aliyo u ng'wene wali akalalilile ng'wigulu kunu okalaga Moyo Ng'wela, ulibona i likujo lya ng'wa Mulungu, nu Yesu wimiilaga ku nkono gwa bulyo go ng'wa Mulungu.
Huna uhaya, "Lolagi nalilibona i ligulu lyakundukaga, nu Ng'wana wa Munhu wimiilaga ku nkono gwa bulyo go ng'wa Mulungu."
Buyoganya n'ilaka lya higulya, bichibija a matu gabo; pye a bose bubuuka bung'wihoolekela.
Bunfunya hanze ya nzengo buukamponda mawe. A bakaaniji butuula i shizwalo shabo mu magulu ga sumba umo witanagwa Saulo.
U Stefano aho balimponda mawe, ulomba alihaya, "Seeba Yesu, gwanukulage u moyo gwane."
Utuja mazwi ulila n'ilaka itaale giki, "Seeba utizubabalila i shibi shenishi." Aho wamala u kuhaya i giko ugwa, ulaala!

U Saulo akayega no u kubona giki, obulagwa nghana. U mu lushiku lwenulo i kanisa ya Yelusalemu ikagwilwa buluhiwa butaale no, pye a bose busambaala, buja uko na uko u mu si ya Buyudaya ni ya Samalia; bulekeelwa duhu a batung'wa.
Banhu ba logohano kuli Mulungu bumucha u Stefano bukanjika; bakaanila hataale niyo no!
Aliyo u Saulo hu ulinhya kwikenaagula i kanisa, uyuja akwingilaga mu buli kaya wabadutanja pye bagosha na bakima, kubatwala mu jeela!
Huna, abo bakasambaala, baja bakugulomeelaga u Mhayo.
U Filipo utulumenha ajile, uukashika ku nzengo gwa Samalia, wandya kubalomeela ya ng'wa Kilisto.
Mabita na mabita ga banhu gikuminga na moyo gumo, kudegeleka iyo wihayaga u Filipo. Aho bashibona i shimanikijo isho wabeejaga budilila kutinda.
Nguno bingi abo baali na masamva guyubafuma galilila n'ilaka itaale, hama bingi abo baali na busaatu wa kuuma buhaama nuulu bulemehazu buyupila.
Niyo bubiza buyegi butaale no u mu nzengo gwenuyo.

Walimo na munhu nebe u mu nzengo gwenuyo witanagwa Simoni, wali na maleeba ga nyalogi kufuma kale; na luulu wali wabakamaaja pyi u ng'wihanga lya Basamalia, kulwa kwigimba-gimba giki u wei hu wali magaatala!
Pye a banhu, bado na bataale, baali bang'ogohile; nguno bahayaga giki, "U munhu ng'wenuyu hu ng'wene uyo ali budula bo ng'wa mulungu, ubo bukahayiagwa 'Budula Butaale!' "
Na nghana baali bang'ogohile no, nguno wali wabahehenaja ikanza ilihu kulwa maleeba gakwe ga nyalogi.
Aliyo u Filipo aho wabalomeela mhola ja butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu na lina lya ng'wa Yesu Kilisto, bagosha na bakima bakayuzunya babatiijiwa.
Nu wei u Simoni uzunya ubatiijiwa, niyo uyikala adimanile nu Filipo; uyukumya no u kushibona i shimanikijo isho shabeejiagwa mu budula butaale, pyi ni yingi i ya kukamaaja.
Aho bigwa a batung'wa i Yelusalemu giki ni Samalia yagwanukulile u Mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu, bubatuma ko ba Petelo na Yohana.
Bahayushika ko bubalombela bang'wanukule u Moyo Ng'wela;
nguno wali ataali kwikiilwa nuulu umo wabo, iki baali babatiijiwa mu lina lya ng'wa Seeba Yesu duhu.
Huna bubatuulila makono, bung'wanukula u Moyo Ng'wela.
U Simoni aho wabona bang'wanukula Moyo Ng'wela mu nzila ya kutuulilwa makono ga batung'wa, ufunya hela giki abinhe.
Uhaya, "Ninhagi nu nene u budula wenubu; nane buli ng'wene uyo nalantuulilage makono ayung'wanukula u Moyo Ng'wela!"
Aliyo u Petelo unshokeja ung'wila, "Jiliilaga uko na hela jako ukache najo kwenuko; nguno gashinaga u bebe uliganika, i shakwinha sha ng'wa Mulungu shikapandikagwa bo hela.
U bebe uti na ngabo gete, hangi uti na fiilu nuulu hado u mu mhayo gwenuyu; nguno u moyo gwako gutatungiligije u kuli Mulungu.
Ali luulu, galukaga winge u mu bubi wako wenubu, unombe u Seeba, ulu yudulikana akulekeje a maganiko ayo gali mu ngholo yako.
Nguno nalibona uli n'isubi lyabubi no giti ndulu yokalile busungu, niyo uli mu butungwa bo mihayo iti ya butungilija!"
Nanghwe u Simoni ushosha uhaya giki, "Nilombelagi a bing'we u kuli Seeba, gutizunigwila nuulu gumo u mu yeniyo ng'wihaya!"
Bahayumala kufunya u bukaaniji na kugulomeela u mhayo go ng'wa Seeba, bushoka Yelusalemu, buja bakulomeelaga mu magunguli mingi ga Basamalia.
Aliyo u Filipo uwilwa na malaika o ng'wa Seeba giki, "Buukaga uje dakama; ubitile i nzila ya ng'witogolo i likalamuku, iyo itulumenhile kufuma Yelusalemu kuja Gaza."
Nghana ubuuka uja; waliho ngosha asoloolilwe, muna Esiopia, nanghani wa sabo jose ja ng'wa Kantake, ntemi nkima wa si ya Esiopia; u munhu ng'wenuyo wali waja Yelusalemu kujulamya.
I likanza lyenilo akasangwa alishoka kaya, igashije ng'wigogoteni lyakwe akusomaga mu shitabo sha nghangi Isaya.
Huna u Moyo ung'wila u Filipo giki, "Egeelaga ho uje hamo nalyo i ligogoteni lyenilo."
U Filipo upeela ajile ho, ung'wigwa alisoma mu shitabo sha nghangi Isaya; umuja giki, "Uliyitegeleja iyo uliyisoma yeniyo?"
Nanghwe uhaya, "Nadugije ginehe u kwiyitegeleja ulu munhu atanilangile?" Ung'wikumbilija u Filipo ulinha mo wigasha hamo nanghwe.
I libudika lya shandikwa ilo wasomaga lyali ili; "Akatwalwa giti ngholo ya kusinzwa, nuwe atafunije nuulu ilaka lyakwe, wali sele giti ngholo kuli munhu akwibbutilaga booya.
Kulwa kudalahwa atalamulilwe mu butungilija; nani uyo adugije kwisomboola i mihayo ya shibyalilwe shakwe? Nguno u bupanga bokwe bukinjiwa u mu si!"
U nsoloolwa ng'wenuyo ung'wila u Filipo giki, "Nalikwikumbilija uniwile, u nghangi alihaya mihayo ya ng'wa nani? Alihaya wei ng'wenekili, nuulu alinghaya munhu ungi?"
U Filipo wandija h'ipandi lyenilo u mu shandikwa, unomeela ya ng'wa Yesu.
Aho bajile u mu nzila, bahayimanila bashika h'ipandi galiho minzi; u nsoloolwa uhaya giki, "Gaya minzi aha, i gisi ki i sha kunilemeja natizubatiijiwa?" [
Nanghwe u Filipo ung'wila, "Ulu ulizunya na moyo gwako gose idulikanile." U nsoloolwa ushosha uhaya, "Nazunyaga giki u Yesu Kilisto ali Ng'wana o ng'wa Mulungu."]
Huna ulagila lyimichiwa i ligogoteni; u Filipo nu nsoloolwa bika bubili wabo, buja u mu minzi uukamatiija.
Aho balifuma u mu minzi, Moyo wa ng'wa Seeba unghwehula u Filipo; u nsoloolwa atamonile hangi, aliyo aho ali mu nzila waja okalaga buyegi.
U Filipo akiita ubonelwa Azota, wajaga akulomeelaga hose-hose u mu mizengo, nose uukashika Kaisalia.
Aliyo u Saulo wali ataali afuulile maleewe kulwa bupelanu na kubilumila nghaya a bahemba ba ng'wa Seeba, huna uja kuli ngabiji ntaale.
Uukalomba nyaluba ja kuja ku masinagogi ga Damasko, giki ulu alabapandike ko bose-bose abo balimo u mu Nzila yeniyi, bagosha na bakima, abadime abatunge na kubatwala Yelusalemu.
Huna aho ajile, ohayegeela i Damasko, kwimanila bupe bung'weku bo kufuma ng'wigulu bong'wikiila bumpindije.
Ugwa ha si pu; wigwa ilaka liling'wila giki, "Saulo Saulo, nibuli uliniluhya?"
Ubuja, "Uli nani Seeba?" Nanghwe ushosha, "Nali Yesu uyo uliniluhya!
Aliyo buukaga ushikiile u mu nzengo, ukujuwilwa ng'wenumo uyo gukwigelile ugwite."
A banhu abo washimizaga nabo bimiila badedebalile, nguno i lilaka baliigwaga aliyo batamonile munhu!
U Saulo aho wabuuka a ha si, wahayuloleecha a miso gakwe, atabonile nuulu hado; bundima nkono bunshikilija u mu Damasko.
Akamala shiku idatu atubonaga, hama nduhu kulya nuulu kung'wa shose-shose.
U mu Damasko ng'wenumo walimo nghemba nebe witanagwa Anania, u Seeba ung'witana mu koolechiwa, "Anania;" nanghwe uhaya, "Naliho Seeba."
Huna u Seeba ung'wila, "Buukaga uje u kwikuuwa ilo likitanagwa igololoku, ulu ulashike ko ubuje ha ng'wa Yuda. Aliho hoi munhu akitanagwa Saulo, muna Taso, alilomba.
Wamonaga mu koolechiwa munhu umo akitanagwa Anania, alingila na kuntuulila makono giki abone."
Nanghwe u Anania ushosha uhaya, "Seeba u munhu ng'wenuyo nayigwile mingi i mihayo yakwe iyo akubiitilaga a beela bako i Yelusalemu.
Na a henaha ali na budula winhilwe kufuma ku bagabiji bataale, giki abatunge pye abo bakulikumilijaga lina lyako!"
Nanghwe u Seeba ung'wila, "Jaga ko duhu, nguno u munhu ng'wenuyo ali shitumamilo shane shisolwa, kulwa kulitwala lina lyane ku mahanga na batemi, na ku Baisilaeli.
Nakung'oolekeja mingi iyo shiigelile aluhiwe muyo kulwa lina lyane."

Huna u Anania uja nghana; aho wakingila u mu numba, untuulila makono, uhaya giki; "Ndugu Saulo, u Seeba Yesu uyo wali wakwilongelile mu nzila aho uliza, wanitumaga. Ali luulu, anukulaga budula bo kubona; niyo okajiwe na Moyo Ng'wela."
Haho na haho gulagala kufuma u ku miso gakwe, maginhu ga kubiza giti magambala, wandya hangi u kubona, ubuuka ubatiijiwa.
Huna ulya shiliwa, upandika nguzu. I Damasko akashinga ikanza lya shiku ndebe, ali hamo nabo a bahemba.
Atadilile wandya kuyulomeela u mu masinagogi; giki, "U Yesu hu ng'wene u Ng'wana o ng'wa Mulungu."
Pye abo bang'wigwaga buyukumya balihaya, "Tuhaya u ng'wenuyu h'uyo walubaluhyaga i Yelusalemu abo bakulilamyaga i lina lyenili, nu kuunu wizile kubatunga abatwale ku bagabiji bataale?"
Aliyo u Saulo ongeja kubiza na nguzu, a Bayudaya ba Damasko uyubahuumuja hape-hape, ulu aliboolekeja giki u Yesu hu ng'wene u Kilisto.
Aho jabita shiku ningi, a Bayudaya busigana mhayo gwa kumulaga!
Buyudila balanghanile mu welwa-ngholo a ha mita liimi na bujiku, giki balandime bamulage! Kwike u Saulo ubumana u busigani wabo.
Huna a bahemba bakwe buntuula mu shigabbu makanza ga bujiku, bunsheepeleja ng'widilisha lya mu ndugu, bung'wicha.
Aho washika i Yelusalemu ugema u kwisangija u mu bahemba, aliyo pye a bose bung'ogoha, batazunije i giki wali nghemba nghana.

Kushisha nose Balinaba unsola, untwala u ku batung'wa, uukabawila umo akamonela u Seeba aho ali mu nzila, na giki u Seeba akayomba nanghwe; pyi ni ya kulomeela na bugimu mu lina lya ng'wa Yesu aho wali Damasko.
Huna bung'wanukula u mu busangi wabo i Yelusalemu, wandya kuyingila na kufuma hamo nabo; nu kulomeela uyulomeela hape-hape mu lina lya ng'wa Seeba.
Akayudila akubasomboolelaga a Bayudaya ba Shiyunani, na kwihalalija nabo; nose bandya kukooba nzila ya kumulaga.
Aliyo aho bagumana a badugu, buntwala Kaisalia; buukanumbulija kuja Taso.

Huna luulu i kanisa yubiza yalembeela hose pyi u mu Buyudaya ni Galilaya, ni Samalia. Yongeja kukula na kubiza na nguzu, kunu ikushimizilaga mu logohano lwa ng'wa Seeba, na kulungujiwa na Moyo Ng'wela.
Makanza malebe u Petelo wandya kuja akubitaga buli ipandi, nose uukashika ku beela bikalaga Luda.
Unsanga koi munhu umo, lina lyakwe Ainea; wali na myaka inaane ali mu buliili kulwa busaatu bo mangwisha.
U Petelo ung'wila giki, "Ainea, u Yesu Kilisto wakupijaga, buukaga ububeeje u buliili wako." Nghana ubuuka haho na haho.
Aho bamona pye a bazengi ba Luda na Shaloni, bungalukila Seeba.

Waliho nghemba mu Yopa, lina lyakwe Tabiza, makulu gaho Dolika I lina lya Dolika (Shiyunani) lili limo ni lya Tabiza (Shialamayo); a makulu galyo "Laala" (i ndimu).'; u nshike ng'wenuyo wali akangiligije u mu shitwa i shawiza, hangi wali ng'wiza-ngholo kalalamba!
U mu shiku jenijo usaata, uzumalika. Aho bamala u kung'ooja, buntuula ku chumba sha ku golofa.
I Luda yali hihi ni Yopa, na luulu iki a bahemba baali bigwa giki u Petelo wali kwenuko, butuma koi banhu babili, buukang'wikumbilija balihaya, "Utizudila u kwiza uko tuli."

U Petelo ubuuka, uja nabo. Aho washika ko, buntonga u ku chumba sha ku golofa, pye a bachilwa bimiila bampindije, balilila kunu baling'oolekeja u Petelo i shizwalo ni myenda iyo wali wabeeja u Dolika aho wali ataali hamo nabo.
U Petelo ubafunya hanze pye a bose. Huna utuja mazwi ulomba, aho wamala ugugalukila u mili uhaya, "Tabiza, buukaga!" Uloleecha a miso gakwe; aho wamona u Petelo wigasha.
Nanghwe undima nkono ungungumula, ubitana a beela na a bachilwa ung'winha kubo, wapilaga.
U mhayo gwenuyo gukumuka pye a hose u mu Yopa, bunzunya Seeba.
U Petelo wikala makanza malihu u mu Yopa ng'wenumo, ha ng'wa Simoni nkomi wa makunza.
Waliho ngosha umo mu Kaisalia witanagwa Kolinelio, ntaale wa bashilikale igana; w'ibita litanagwa lya Italia.
U munhu ng'wenuyo wali ntungilija, ni kaya yakwe i yose, hangi wali ang'ogohile Mulungu; niyo wali ng'wiza-ngholo no u ku banhu, na wanombaga Mulungu gwa-gwa-gwa.
Lwise lumo makanza giti ga sa kenda ya liimi, u munhu ng'wenuyo umona malaika hape-hape mu koolechiwa. Akingila u mu ng'wakwe; ushika ung'witana, "Kolinelio."

U Kolinelio unkalalila kunu ogohaga; wanoga nose uhaya, "Ni ginehe Seeba!" Ung'wila giki, "U kulomba kwako nu wiza-ngholo wako shanukulilwe nuulu: shalinhile.' kwigulya, kubiza shizukijo kuli Mulungu.
Ali luulu, i haha tumaga banhu baje Yopa, bakang'witane aliko koi Simoni akitanagwa Petelo.
Alendile ha ng'wa Simoni nkomi wa makunza, numba yakwe ili hihi na nyanza!"

Aho winga u malaika uyo wayombaga nanghwe, u Kolinelio ubitana babili ba batumami ba ha ng'wakwe, na nshilikale umo, uyo wali ng'wishigwa mu kulamya, umo wa bashilikale abo bikalaga hamo nanghwe gwa, kulwa kuntumamila.
A banhu benabo ubasomboolela pyi i mihayo yeniyo, huna ubatuma i Yopa.
U ku ntondo yaho aho balija, bahayugwegeela u nzengo, u Petelo nanghwe usangwa walinha kwigulya ya numba mu makanza ga kulomba, giki akalombe kwenuko; yali giti sa itandatu.
Aliyo iki wali watuuba, wandya kwiganika mhayo gwa shiliwa, kwike baali bataali buzugija; wahayimanila wahweelwa.
Huna ubona i ligulu lyakunduka, na shikolo sha kubiza giti nguto gwa ng'wenda ntaale gulichiwa ha si, gudimililwe ku mhembeelo jago ine.
U mu gati jalimo shiinu ja buli mbika: ja magulu ane, ni ja kwigwesa ha si, na noni ja kulala ja buli mbika.
Lyung'wiziila n'ilaka lilihaya giki, "Petelo, buukaga usinze ulye."
Nanghwe u Petelo uhaya, "Yaya Seeba; u nene nataali kulya shikolo sha sagala nuulu shisoso."
I lilaka lyung'wiziila hangi lukangala lwa kabili lilihaya, "Isho wamalaga kusheeja Mulungu, utashihayage u bebe giki shili shisoso."
U mhayo gwenuyo gushokeelwa nghangala idatu, huna haho na haho i shiseme shenisho shudutwa kulinhyiwa ng'wigulu.
U Petelo aho ataali akwibuja-bujaga a makulu ga mhayo uyo akagubona gwenuyo, a banhu abo baali batung'wa kufuma ku ng'wa Kolinelio kwiza kwikooba i numba ya ng'wa Simoni, bushika bimiila ha mita.
Bubuja ulu aliho hoi Simoni uyo akitanagwa Petelo.
U wei u Petelo akasangwa ataali aligwideedenghanya u mhayo gwenuyo, huna u Moyo ung'wila giki, "Baliho banhu badatu balikukooba.
Buukaga wike uje hoi ukababone, utizususanya nguno nabatumile nene."
Wika nghana u Petelo uja aho baali a banhu benabo; ushikila kubabuja giki, "Angu mmho mulinikooba nene, muli na mhayo ki?"

Nabo bung'wila, "Kolinelio wawililwe na malaika ng'wela, giki akwitane uje ku ng'wakwe ukansomboolele mihayo milebe iyo uli nayo. U wei nshilikale, munhu ntungilija na wa logohano kuli Mulungu; ni lihanga lya Bayudaya likankaanilaga giko."
Huna ubeegeleja bingila mu kaya, ulenda nabo. A ha ntondo yaho ubuuka uja nabo, hamo na badugu bangi ba kufuma Yopa.
Buukashika i Kaisalia ku ntondo yaho hangi. U Kolinelio oli abalindiilile, niyo oli olaalika na badugu bakwe, hamo na banwani biye.
U Petelo aho alingila, u Kolinelio ung'wanukula, kunu alingwila mu magulu giki anamye.
Aliyo u Petelo ungungumula ung'wila, "Buukaga; nu nene nali munhu duhu giti bebe."
Aho wamala u kuyomba nanghwe, wingila u mu kaya usanga balimo moi bingi bibilingaga.

Ubawila, "A bing'we mumanile giki itazuniligije u munhu u Nyudaya kwisangija na banhu ba mahanga gangi, nuulu kubageniha; aliyo u nene wanilemegije u Mulungu natizung'witana munhu nuulu umo giki wa sagala nuulu nsoso.
H'i nguno yene aho nawilwa natahalalilile, niza duhu; nose luulu i haha nalibuja, himba ng'wanitanilaga mhayo ki?"
U Kolinelio uhaya giki, "Jabitaga shiku ine, naali mu ng'wane ng'wenumu nalombaga makanza giti genaya ga sa kenda, kuhayimanila munhu wimiila ku butongi bone, azwalile myenda yape.
Uhaya, 'Kolinelio, u kulomba kwako kwigwiwe, na a manongho gako gizukililwe u kuli Mulungu.
Ali luulu, tumaga banhu baje Yopa, bakang'witane Simoni, lina lingi Petelo; aliho alendile ha kaya ya ng'wa Simoni nkomi wa makunza, ili haho na nyanza.'

Na nghana haho na haho nutuma banhu kwiza u kuli bebe, wabeeja no u kwiza. Niyo luulu, a bise tuliho aha, pye a bose tuli ku butongi bo ng'wa Mulungu, twalindaga kwigwa duhu iyo ulagililwe kufuma kuli Seeba."
Huna u Petelo wandya u kubasomboolela alihaya giki, "Gashinaga nghana u Mulungu ati na busolanhya,
aliyo pyi u mu mahanga akanukulaga buli munhu ulu ubiza ntungilija.
U gwenuyu hu mhayo uyo akabatumila Baisilaeli, ubenhela bulomeeji bo mhayo gwa mhola mu nzila ya ng'wa Yesu Kilisto, uyo ali Seeba wa bose.
A bing'we mugumanile u mhayo uyo gukilonga mu Buyudaya, gusambaala hose pye u mu si yeniyo kwandija Galilaya, aho bobita u bubatiija ubo Yohana wabulomeelaga.
U Mulungu wali ang'witiilile Moyo Ng'wela na budula u Yesu wa Nazaleti, uyo wajaga hose-hose akubeejaga yawiza na kubapija pye abo bali mu buhedekwa bo ng'wa Shetani, iki u Mulungu wali hamo nanghwe.
A bise tuli bakaaniji bayo pyi iyo wabeejaga u mu si ya Bayudaya ni Yelusalemu; u munhu ng'wenuyo bakamulaga bo kunungeleja ha linti.
Aliyo u Mulungu unjuucha ha lushiku lwa kadatu lwaho, ung'oolecha hape;
kwike iti ku banhu bose, aliyo ku bakaaniji duhu, abo Mulungu abasolile. H'a bise abo twalyaga na kung'wa hamo nanghwe u mu shiku ja giki wajuukile kufuma mu bafu.
A bise hu bene abo akatulagila kuja tulibalomeela a banhu, na kufunya bukaaniji giki u ng'wenuyu huna ng'wene uyo ahelilwe na Mulungu kubiza Namuji wa bapanga na a bafu.
Hu ng'wene uyo bankaanilile pye a bahangi, hama hu ng'wene uyo bulekejiwa bo shibi shose budugije kwanukulwa mu nzila ya lina lyakwe."
U Petelo aho ataali wisomboola i yeniyo, u Moyo Ng'wela ubikiila pye abo bakagwigwa u mhayo.

A Bayudaya Shiyunani: Basaalilwe. U mu shandikwa buli hene aho balihayiwa basaalilwe, nuulu ba nhungwa ja kusaalwa, numho balihayiwa Bayudaya.' abo baali biza nu Petelo bukumya, nguno na a banhu ba mahanga bakitiilwa u Moyo Ng'wela uyo ali shakwinhwa.
Bubigwa baliyomba mu ndimi jingi, hamo na kunkumilija Mulungu. Huna u Petelo uhaya giki,
"Nani uyo adugije kulemeja minzi batizubatiijiwa a banhu aba, aliyo nabo bang'wanukula u Moyo Ng'wela git'umo bise tukang'wanukulila?"
Ulagila babatiijiwe mu lina lya ng'wa Yesu Kilisto. Huna bunomba ikale hamo nabo ikanza lya shiku bulebe.
A batung'wa na a badugu ba mu si ya Buyudaya i yose, bakigwa nabo i giki na a banhu ba mahanga bagwanukulile u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu.
Kwike u Petelo aho waja i Yelusalemu, buukashikila kunyogeela abo basendamilile mhayo gwa kusaalwa.
Buhaya giki, "U bebe wajile ku banhu batasaalilwe, niyo uukalya na kulya hamo nabo!"
Nanghwe u Petelo wandya kubasomboolela chiza mu kwihela, uhaya giki,

"U nene naali mu nzengo gwa Yopa naalombaga, nahayimanila nahweelwa, nubona koolechiwa kwa shikolo sha kubiza giti nguto gwa ng'wenda ntaale gulichiwa ha si kufuma ng'wigulu, gudimililwe ku mhembeelo jago ine, gulenhwa aho nali.
Nahayulola u mu gati, nubona mo shiinu ja mu mapoolu: ja magulu ane na ja kwigwesa ha si, na noni ja kulala.
Niigwa n'ilaka lilihaya giki, 'Buukaga Petelo usinze, ulye.'
Nane nuhaya, 'Yaya Seeba, nguno u mu nomo gwane shitaali kwingila shikolo shose-shose sha sagala nuulu shisoso!'
I lilaka lyushosha lo kabili kufuma ng'wigulu lilihaya, 'Isho wamalaga kusheeja Mulungu utashitanage u bebe giki shisoso.'
U mhayo gwenuyo gukashokeelwa nghangala idatu, huna pyi i shose shushoshiwa ng'wigulu hangi.
Kuhayimanila banhu badatu bimiila a hanze ya numba iyo naali nashikilile; baali baatung'wa kufuma ku ng'wa Kolinelio, kwiza kuli nene.
Huna u Moyo uniwila kuja nabo, natizususanya nuulu hado. A badugu a batandatu aba nabo bakiza hamo nane, tuukingila u mu numba yakwe u munhu ng'wenuyo.
Utuwila umo akamonela u malaika wimiilaga mu kaya yakwe; ung'wila giki, 'Tumaga banhu kuja Yopa bakang'witane Simoni uyo akitanagwa Petelo.
Akwiza akuwile mihayo iyo ikukwinha bupiji u bebe na a ba mu ng'wako.'
Huna u nene aho nandya u kuyomba, u Moyo Ng'wela ubikiila nabo git'umo akatwikiila duhu a bise a ha kwandya na kwandya.
A henaho nuyizukwa i mihayo ya ng'wa Seeba umo akahayila giki, 'U Yohana wabatiijaga na minzi, aliyo a bing'we mukubatiijiwa na Moyo Ng'wela.'
I gisi luulu iki u Mulungu akabinha i shakwinha isho akatwinha na a bise abo tunzunije u Seeba Yesu Kilisto, u nene nali nani nose nanghangije u Mulungu?"
Aho biyigwa i yeniyo bufulika sele; banoga bandya kunkumilija Mulungu balihaya giki, "Hu kuhaya u Mulungu wabinhaga kugaluka nabo a banhu ba mahanga, bingile mu bupanga."
Huna luulu, abo bakasambaala nguno ya buluhiwa ubo bukilonga kulwa ng'wa Stefano, bakaja buukashika Foenike na Kupulo na Antiokia; kwike batagulomeelile u mhayo ulu iti ku Bayudaya duhu.
Aliyo baaliho bamo babo, baali bana Kupulo na Kilene; a benabo aho bashika i Antiokia, bujisomboola i nghulu ja ng'wa Seeba Yesu na ku Bayudaya ba Shiyunani.
U nkono go ng'wa Seeba gwali hamo nabo, banhu bingi buzunya, bungalukila Seeba.
U mhayo gwenuyo gwahayushika u mu matu ga banhu ba Yelusalemu, buntuma Balinaba kuja i Antiokia.
Aho washika ko uyega no u kushibona i shigongo sha ng'wa Seeba. Huna ubakomeleja pye a bose giki badimane na Seeba mu moyo gumo.
Niyo iki u wei wali munhu wawiza, na okalile Moyo Ng'wela na kuzunya, banhu bingi biza u kuli Seeba; lyukula i libita.
Akiita uja Taso kujunkooba Saulo.
Aho wampandika wiza nanghwe i Antiokia; bumala ng'waka ngima u mu kanisa bakulangaga ibita itaale lya banhu. Niyo i Antiokia h'uko a bahemba bakandija kwitanwa giki Bakilisto.
U mu shiku jenijo biza bahangi i Antiokia kufuma Yelusalemu.
Umo wabo, witanagwa Gabata, huna wimiila uhanga mu nguzu ja ng'wa Moyo giki nzala nhaale ili hihi kwilonga hose pyi u mu si; (na nghana ikilonga mu shiku ja ng'wa Kilaudio).
Huna pye a bahemba bizunilija, giki buli ng'wene uyo wali na budula asooge sha kubagunaana a badugu ba mu si ya Buyudaya.
Na nghana bushikilija, bubatwalila banamhala ba kwene mu makono ga ng'wa Balinaba na Saulo.
U ng'wikanza lyenilo, u ntemi Helode ubalogeja nkono gokwe a banhu ba mu kanisa; ubiitila yabubi bamo babo.
Umulaga na lilushu u Yakobo, u ng'wanong'wawe wa ng'wa Yohana.
Aho wabona giki a Bayudaya bayega, ongeja ho; undima nu Petelo, (lyali ikanza lya shigukulu sha migati iti na shibimbya.)
Huna luulu aho wandima umponya mu jeela, untuula ha silili ya ndiima ine ja balanghani, buli ludiima balanghani bane. Wali n'iganiko lya kunfunya ulu yubita i pasaka.
Hu kuhaya u Petelo ubiza watuulwa mu jeela giki alanghanwe; aliyo i kanisa yanombelaga mu welwa-ngholo u kuli Mulungu.

U bujiku bo giki u Helode akunfunya ha ntondo yaho, u Petelo wali alaalile ha gati-gati ya bashilikale babili, hama atungilwe na minyololo ibili, na balanghani babili balanghanaga a ha nyango gwa jeela.
Kuhayimanila wiza malaika o ng'wa Seeba; heela pe u mu jeela, ushika unkuumya ha lubazu u Petelo. Umisha aling'wila giki, "Buukaga wangu." Yulagala i minyololo iyo wali atungilwe u mu makono gakwe.
U malaika ung'wila, "Itungage, uzwale ni shilatu shako." Wita chene nghana. Hama ung'wila, "Yigumiilage i kache-mbeho yako unilondeele."
Huna bufuma hanze alinondeela, aliyo wali atamanaga giki iyo yitagwa nu malaika yeniyo yali ya nghana; u ng'wene wiganikaga alibona sha koolechiwa duhu.

Bubabita a balanghani a ba kwandya, na a ba kabili. Gwaliho mita gwa chuma gwa kubita ujile mu nzengo; aho bashika ho gubalugukila goyi duhu, bubita bajile buukashika kwibbalabbala limo; kwitulwa u malaika waneka.

Huna u Petelo witegeleja; uhaya, "I haha luulu namana giki, gashinaga i gete u Seeba wantumaga malaika wakwe, kwiza kunitungula kwinga u mu makono ga ng'wa Helode, kuninja u mu kwisagilwa kose kwa Bayudaya."
Aho witegeleja giko, uja ku numba ya ng'wa Malia, nina wa ng'wa Yohana uyo witanagwa Maliko; hu uko baali bibilinga bingi bakulombaga.
Ushika utula hoodi a ha nyango gwa ku butongi, wiza ng'waniki ntumami lina lyakwe Loda, giki adegeleke.
Ulimana i lilaka lya ng'wa Petelo, uyega no; kwike atalugulile, ushoka alibawila giki; "U Petelo ali hanze wimiilaga."
Nabo bung'wila, "Bebe hamo osala shi!" Aliyo u wei ongeja u kuhaya giki hu ng'wene; nose buhaya, "Numho malaika okwe duhu u ng'wenuyo!"
Nanghwe u Petelo ongeja u kutula i hoodi a ha nyango. Aho balugula bumona, bakakumya no!

Ubahungija nkono bahuumule, huna wandya u kubasomboolela umo Seeba akanfunija u mu jeela. Hanuma ubawila balang'winhe nu Yakobo i mhola jenijo, pye na a badugu a bangi. U wei ufuma, winga; uja ipandi lingi.
Aho wela a bashilikale bakazwangana no, nguno baali batamanile iyo yali yang'wilongela u Petelo.
U Helode aho wankooba, ubagisilija na a bashilikale ungayiwa, ulagila babulagwe! U wei winga i Buyudaya uja Kaisalia; uukalenda kwenuko ikanza lya shiku ndebe.

Kwimanila makanza malebe u Helode wabapelanila banhu ba Tulo na Sidoni; huna luulu a boi bizunilija kwiza u kuli we. Waliho ntumami ntaale wa ha ng'wa ntemi, witanagwa Bulasto, bushika bung'wikumbilija, giki u mhayo gwenuyo guhoyelwe ituulwe ho mhola; nguno i si jabo japandikaga i shiliwa kufuma mu si yakwe u ntemi.
Huna lusolwa lushiku, u ntemi uzwalila myenda y'ikujo, ya nyatemi. Wigasha h'isumbi lya butemi, aho pye a bose badugije kumona, huna wandya kubaloma!
A banhu buyunkumilija n'ilaka balihaya giki, "I lyenilo ilaka lya ng'wa mulungu, liti lya ng'wa munhu yaya!"
I likanza lyenilo malaika wa ng'wa Seeba untula, nguno atang'winhile ikujo u Mulungu; ulyiwa ngino ucha!
Aliyo u mhayo go ng'wa Seeba gongeja kubiza na nguzu na kusambaala pye a hose.
U Balinaba nu Saulo aho bamala u nimo uyo gwali gwabatwala i Yelusalemu, bushoka; biza nanghwe u Yohana uyo witanagwa Maliko.
U mu kanisa ya Antiokia baaliho bahangi na balangi: ba Balinaba, Simioni uyo witanagwa ng'wilabuzu, Lukio muna Kilene, Manaeni ng'wanong'wawe na Helode mu kulelwa, na Saulo.
Makanza malebe baali bafungile, lwise lumo aho balinamya Seeba, u Moyo Ng'wela ubawila giki, "Nikomanijagi u Balinaba nu Saulo kulwa nimo uyo naabitanila."
Aho bamala u kufunga, bulomba, bubatuulila makono, huna bubatuma.
Aho baatung'wa nu Moyo Ng'wela, bakaja buukashika Seleukia; u kwinga a henaho, bubuga nyanza bajile Kupulo.
Bahayushika Salami bandya kugulomeela u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu, u mu masinagogi ga Bayudaya; baali nanghwe nu Yohana, wajaga akubagunaanaga.
Bubita pye a hose u ng'wijinga buukashika Pafo, bumona Nyudaya nebe, wali nogi na nghangi nomolomo; lina lyakwe Bali-yesu.
Wali hamo na Seligio Paulo, munhu o masala; nuwe oli nsugi. U munhu ng'wenuyo akabitana a ba Balinaba nu Saulo, nguno wali atogilwe kugwigwa u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu.
Kwike u nogi u Elima (h'a makulu ga lina lyakwe) akabalemeja, nguno wali atogilwe kunghangija u nsugi atizuzunya.
Aliyo u Saulo, uyo witanagwa na lina lya Paulo, unkalalila u munhu ng'wenuyo, kunu okalaga nguzu ja ng'wa Moyo Ng'wela.
Huna ung'wila giki, "Bebe ng'wana wa ng'wa Shetani na ng'wanishi wa butungilija bose, uyo okalile buliganya na bubi wa buli mbika, utudula u kuleka u kujichaamya i nzila ja ng'wa Seeba i ngololoku?

Managa giki i haha u nkono go ng'wa Seeba guli higulya yako, ukubbokula ooye u kulibona i liimi ikanza ho." Haho na haho ugwilwa wiija na giiti, wandya kuja alibbabbasha na nkono, akukoobaga batongeeji.
U nsugi aho wagubona u mhayo gwenuyo ubiza nzunya, u bulangi bo ng'wa Seeba ubukumya no.
Huna u Paulo na a biye binga i Pafo, bulinhya itanga bubuuka bajile buukashika Peliga ya Pamfulia. U Yohana ubaleka ushoka Yelusalemu.
Aliyo a boi bubita mo u mu Peliga buja buukashika Antiokia ya Pisidia; u lushiku lo sabato bingila ng'wisinagogi bigasha.
Aho shamala kusong'wa shilagilo na shitabo sha bahangi, a bataale b'isinagogi bubatumila nhung'wa bubawila, "Bababa ulu muli na mhayo gwa kuganikila banhu, somboolagi!"
Ubuuka u Paulo ubahungija nkono; huna uhaya giki, "Bababa Baisilaeli na a bing'we abo mung'ogohile Mulungu; degelekagi.

U Mulungu wa banhu benaba, a Baisilaeli, akabasola a bakulugenji bise. Buukikala mu si ya Misili giti bageni; aho bali kwenuko a banhu benabo ubagunguhya, huna ubafunya u mu si yeniyo alibatongeela na nkono gwa budula butaale.
Bumala ikanza lya myaka ya kushika makumi ane bali ku matogolo, nanghwe ali hamo nabo mu kwiyumilija.
Aho wamala kuginja mahanga mpungati u mu si ya Kanaani, ubinha bene i si yeniyo kubiza wingiji wabo.
Bahayikala mo ikanza giti lya myaka magana ane na makumi atano, ubinha balamuji, kushisha ikanza lya nghangi Sang'weli.
Huna u ng'wikanza lyenilo bulomba ntemi; u Mulungu ubinha Saulo ng'witunja o ng'wa Kishi, munhu wa luganda lo ng'wa Benjamini, ubasuga ikanza lya myaka makumi ane.

Aho wang'winja u ng'wenuyo ubabuukija Daudi kubiza ntemi wabo; uyo akankaanila alihaya giki, 'Naapandikile munhu uyo ali ha ngholo yane, Daudi ng'witunja wa ng'wa Yese, h'uyo akushikilija pyi iyo nitogilwe.'
Nghana lyushika nose i likanza, u Mulungu ugushikilija u mhayo uyo wali wang'wisagija u Daudi. U kufuma u mu luganda lokwe ubenhela a Baisilaeli Mpija, ng'wene Yesu.
Aho ataali u kushika u ng'wenuyo, Yohana wandya kubalomeela pye a Baisilaeli mihayo ya bubatiijiwa na kugaluka.

U Yohana aho wegeela kumala u nimo gokwe ubawila giki, 'A bing'we muliganika u nene hu nali ng'wene? Nati ng'wene u nene, aliyo managi giki a ha numa yane aliza u wei. U nene natigeleelilwe nuulu kutaligula shilatu ku mhambala jakwe u wei.'
"Bababa, badugu bane, ba luganda lo ng'wa Abulahamu, na a bing'we abo mung'ogohile Mulungu, u mhayo gwa bupiji wenubu gwatumilwe kulwa nguno yise.
Nguno a banhu ba Yelusalemu na a batongeeji babo baali batang'witegelegije u munhu ng'wenuyu, aliyo aho banamula, bubiza bishikilija iyo ihayiwe na bahangi abo bakasomagwa buli sabato.
Nguno nuulu iki batapandikile mhayo gose-gose gwa kung'wenheleja kucha u Yesu, aliyo nahene bakangaagaanila u Pilato giki anamule nsango gwa kubulagwa.
Aho bamala-maja pyi iyo yandikilwe kulwakwe, bung'wicha a ha linti, bunaaja mu shigila.
Kwike u Mulungu akanjuucha kufuma u mu bafu.
Wiyoolecha ikanza lya shiku ningi u ku banhu abo wali wiza nabo Yelusalemu kufuma Galilaya; abo bakunkaanilaga ku banhu i haha.
A bise nise tulimulomeela giki, u kwisagijiwa uyo bakinhwa bakulugenji bise kwashikilijiwe.
Nguno u Mulungu watushikiligigije a bise baana, unjuucha u Yesu, git'umo gwandikilwe mu Zabuli ya kabili; giki, 'U bebe uli Ng'wana wane, i lelo yeniyi naakubyalaga.'
Nguno wanjuukije kufuma mu bafu atiko kushoka hangi mu bukenaaguku, git'umo guhayiwe giki, 'Nakukwinha bebe i shikolo sha ng'wa Daudi, isho shili sheela na sha nghana.'
H'i nguno yene alihaya n'ipandi lingi giki, 'Utunekanija u Ng'wela wako ashike mu bukenaaguku.'
Nguno ili hape giki u Daudi aho wamala u nimo u mu shibyalilwe shakwe, akacha git'umo kali kahelele ka ng'wa Mulungu, ujikwa, ulaala hamo na bakulugenji bakwe, ubola.
Aliyo uyo wajuuchiwe na Mulungu, u ng'wene atakubonile u kubola.
Ali luulu bababa badugu bise, managi giki u muli munhu ng'wenuyu u Yesu, mulilomeelwa mihayo ya bulekejiwa bo shibi.
Niyo buli ng'wene uyo unzunya u munhu ng'wenuyu, akubalilwa butungilija nu mu yingi iyo mutadugije kubalilwa butungilija mu nzila ya kudima shilagilo sha ng'wa Musa.
Nose hu kuhaya ilanghanagi gutizung'wiziila uyo guhayiwe na bahangi giki,
'Bing'we badalahi lolagi, na mukumye kushisha muche, nguno u mu shiku jing'we nalibeeja nimo, nimo uyo mutuguzunya nuulu munhu umuwila.' "
Huna aho bafuma u ng'wisinagogi, a banhu bubalomba babasomboolele hangi i mihayo yeniyo na ha sabato yingi.

Lyahayushila i libilinga, Bayudaya bingi na bahembekwa abo baali bakomeezu mu kulamya, bubalondeela a ba Paulo nu Balinaba. Bakabahugula na kubakomeleja giki bikale mo u mu shigongo sha ng'wa Mulungu.
A ha sabato i yingi, hihi pyi u nzengo gwikuminga kwiza kudegeleka mhayo go ng'wa Seeba.
A Bayudaya aho bagabona a mabita bakokala wilu, bandya kung'wihalalija u Paulo, na kwisondagula iyo wihayaga.

Aliyo a ba Paulo nu Balinaba buyomba na bugimu butaale giki, "U mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu gwali gwigelile gwenhwe ku bing'we tame; kwike i haha iki muliguponya, twabagalukila banhu ba mahanga. Bing'we benekili mulibala giki mutigeleelilwe kuwanukula u bupanga bo welelo na welelo.
Hu gwene u mhayo uyo atulagilile u Seeba; nguno alihaya giki, 'Nakutuulile kubiza isana ku mahanga, ubize wa kutwala bupiji hose-hose, kushisha ku ngelelo ya si.' "
A banhu ba mahanga aho bigwa giko bakayega bugukuja u mhayo go ng'wa Seeba. Pye a bose abo baali babalililwe bupanga bo welelo bakazunya.
U mhayo go ng'wa Seeba gusambaala pye a hose u mu si yeniyo.

Aliyo a Bayudaya bakabahumbuula bakima balebe, baali bakujiwa na bakomeezu mu kulamya, hamo na bagosha abo baali batongeeji ba mu nzengo; bubabuukija buluhiwa a ba Paulo nu Balinaba, hanuma bubapeeja u mu si yabo.
Nabo binga nghana, niyo bulukung'unha nu lubuubu ulo lwali ku mhambala jabo; buja buukashika Ikonio.
Aliyo a bahemba bakokala buyegi na Moyo Ng'wela.
Aho bali Ikonio, bakingila bubili wabo ng'wisinagogi lya Bayudaya bulomeela, kushisha ibita itaale lya Bayudaya na Bayunani buzunya.
Kwike a Bayudaya abo baali batazunije bubabipya maganiko a banhu ba mahanga, bubasoba giki babakolwe a badugu.

Aliyo nahene a ba Paulo nu Balinaba bakashinga mo ikanza ilihu kulwa ng'wa Seeba, bakulomeelaga mu kwisandaala, u Seeba nanghwe akugukaanilaga u mhayo gwa shigongo shakwe; akubinhaga budula bo kwita shimanikijo na mihayo ya kukumya mu nzila ya makono gabo.
A banhu ba mu nzengo gwenuyo bugabanika, bangi budimana na Bayudaya, aliyo bamo budimana nabo a batung'wa.
Aho gwandya nsambo, a banhu ba mahanga na a Bayudaya na a batongeeji babo, buyukooba nzila ya kubiitila yabubi a batung'wa, na kubaponda mawe.
Aliyo bugudeeba u mhayo gwenuyo; bunyenyeka, bupeelela Lukaonia, ku mizengo ya Lustila na Delibe, na mapandi gangi ayo gaali hihi-hihi;
buja bakulomeelaga Nghulu Jawiza kwenuko.
U mu Lustila waliho munhu wikalaga igashije, nguno wali nemehazu u mu mhambala jakwe kufuma mu nda ya ng'wa nina, na luulu wali ataali kushimiza nuulu hado kufuma kubyalwa kwakwe.
U munhu ng'wenuyo wali wandegeleka u Paulo aho akulomeelaga; u Paulo aho wanola chiza, umona ali na kusanya giki adugije kupijiwa.
Huna ung'wila n'ilaka itaale giki, "Buukaga wimiile na magulu gako!" Wikindika, wandya na kushimiza.
A banhu aho bagubona uyo akagwita u Paulo, bandya kwihamukila mu lulimi lwabo lwa Shilukaonia; balihaya giki, "Bamulungu batugenihile mu suso ja banhu!"
U Balinaba bung'witana Zeu, lelo u Paulo bung'witana Helime, nguno h'uyo wali ntongeeji u mu kuyomba.

U ngabiji wa ng'wa Zeu wikalaga hihi u mu nzengo ng'wenumo, wiza na nzagamba ya ng'ombe, n'ibbipi lya mabonji gahelilwe chiza gutunganyiwa hamo; i shenisho ushenha ha mita gwa nzengo, giki u wei na a banhu bafunye shitambo.
Aliyo a batung'wa, a ba Balinaba nu Paulo aho bagudeeba u mhayo gwenuyo, butandula shizwalo shabo; bupeela bajile u kwibita lya banhu, kunu balihamuka n'ilaka itaale

balihaya giki, "Bing'we bababa, nibuli muliita giko? A bise nise tuli banhu duhu giti bing'we. Tulimulomeela giki mulekane nayo i mihayo ya dalali giti yeniyi, mungalukile Mulungu mpanga, u Meeja w'igulu na si na manyanza, ni shose isho shilimo!
Shibyalilwe na shibyalilwe isho shamala kubita wali wagaleka a mahanga ga banhu bashimizile mu nzila jabo ja benekili git'umo batogelilwe.
Kwike nahene atalekile u kwikaanila wei ng'wenekili, uyutwitila yawiza mu kutwinha mbula kufuma ng'wilunde, na makanza ga kupandika matwajo; giki atwinhe shiliwa, jiyege i ngholo jise!"
Nuulu iki bakahaya mihayo ili giko, nahene bakakoya no; ahene nose bakabahangija ku kale a banhu u kubafunija i shitambo.
Aliyo bahayiza Bayudaya ba kufuma Antiokia na Ikonio, bubahumbuula a banhu, bumponda mawe u Paulo; huna bundutanja bantwalile hanze ya nzengo baliganika wachaaga!
Aliyo a bahemba aho bibilinga bumpindya ha gati, ubuuka wingila hangi u mu nzengo. Ha ntondo yaho winga mo nu Balinaba, buja Delibe.
Aho balomeela u mu nzengo gwenuyo, bupandika bahemba bingi, huna bubuuka bashokile Lustila na Ikonio na Antiokia.
Baja bakubatimbyaga ngholo a bahemba, bakubakomelejaga bikale bahandatilile u mu kuzunya; na kubawila giki, "Shiigelile twingile u mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu mu nzila ya buluhi butaale."
Buli mu kanisa yene babizaga ulu bamala kubasolela banamhala na kulomba mu kufunga, babatuulaga mu bulanghani bo ng'wa Seeba uyo banzunije.
Bahayumala kubita u mu Pisidia, buja buukashika Pamfulia.
Huna aho bamala kugulomeela u mhayo mu Peliga buja Atalia.
Kufuma kwenuko bushikiila Antiokia, uko baali balombelwa na kutuulwa mu bulanghani bo ng'wa Mulungu, kulwa nimo uyo bakagumala gwenuyo.
Aho bashika bibilinga i kanisa, bisomboolela iyo Mulungu wajaga akubeejaga hamo nabo, ni giki a banhu ba mahanga nabo baalugulililwe u nyango gwa kuzunya.
Bakikala kwenuko ikanza ilihu bali hamo nabo a bahemba.

Aliyo kuhayimanila banhu balebe batulumenha bizile kufuma Buyudaya, aho bashika i Antiokia buyubalanga a badugu giki, "Ulu mutasaalilwe git'umo shili shimile isho tulangilwe na Musa, mutudula u kupijiwa!"

Yubuuka yombo na wihalalija butaale, kwike a ba Paulo nu Balinaba bimiila higiyi kwishokeja nabo a banhu benabo; nose yubonwa giki hambu-hambu u Paulo nu Balinaba batung'we hamo na bangi, balinhe kuja i Yelusalemu u ku batung'wa na a banamhala, kulwa nguno ya halali yeniyo.
Aho balagwa ni kanisa, bubitila Foenike na Samalia, buja bakwisomboolaga mu welwa-ngholo pyi i mihayo ya kugaluka kwa banhu ba mahanga; pye a badugu bakayega no.
Aho bashika i Yelusalemu, begelejiwa ni kanisa hamo na a batung'wa, na a banamhala; bubasomboolela iyo Mulungu wabeejaga hamo nabo.
Huna bimiila Bafalisayo, abo baali bakwanukula u kuzunya; bandya kuhaya giki, "A banhu ba mahanga shiigelile bayusaalwa na kukomelejiwa kushidima i shilagilo sha ng'wa Musa!"
A batung'wa na a banamhala bibilinga kugulola u mhayo gwenuyo.

Lyubita ikanza baliguhoyela, huna wimiila u Petelo ubawila giki, "Bababa badugu bane, a bing'we benekili mumanile umo Mulungu akasolela makanza malebe; yabizaga ka kale ho, giki a banhu ba mahanga bagwigwe u mhayo gwa Nghulu Jawiza kufuma kuli nene, bazunye.
Huna u Mulungu uyo ayimanile i myoyo, ubakaanila mu kubinha Moyo Ng'wela git'umo akatwinhila a bise.
Aho bazunya atasolanije a ha gati yise na a boi u mu kujeeja i ngholo jabo.
Hama nibuli luulu i haha mulingema u Mulungu, mu nzila ya kubatuulila ijoki idito mu nhingo a bahemba, ilo tulilemeelilwe a bise u kulibuucha, pye na a bakulugenji bise baali balilemeelilwe?
Nguno a bise tuzunije giki, tuli bapijiwa kulwa shigongo sha ng'wa Seeba Yesu, git'umo ili nu ku bene."
Huna pyi i libanza lyuhuumulija sele kubadegeleka a ba Balinaba nu Paulo; nguno bakandya kusomboola umo Mulungu wabeejaga shimanikijo na mihayo ya kukumya u ku banhu ba mahanga kubitila mubo.
Aho bamala, u Yakobo ushosha alihaya giki, "Bing'we bababa, nidegelekagi badugu bane.
U Simioni watusomboolela git'umo kufuma kale u Mulungu abizukilile a banhu ba mahanga, hama niyo wamala kwisolela banhu kulwa lina lyakwe kufuma u mubo.
U gwenuyu gwideebelile nu mhayo gwa bahangi umo gwandikililwe; giki,
'Ha numa ya mihayo yeniyi nakushoka, nizenge bupya i numba ya ng'wa Daudi iyo igwile, nakwizenga hangi, yinge u mu busagambuke wayo, nibeeje bupya yimiile hangi.
Nguno shiigelile na a banhu a bangi bankoobe u Seeba, pye a banhu ba mahanga abo bakwitanilagwa ku lina lyane; alihaya Seeba uyo akuyitaga i yeniyi,
iyo imanikile kufuma kale na kale.'
"Ali luulu, u bulamuji bone buli giki, tutizubazwanja a banhu ba mahanga abo bakungalukilaga Mulungu.
Aliyo tubandikilagi giki bikomanye nabo u busoso bo kwitongeleja ku mashiikolile, nu bujingi; hama yaya nuulu kulya ndimu ja kunigwa, na a mininga yaya.
Nguno kufuma shibyalilwe sha kale na kale, u Musa ali na bahemba bakwe hose-hose u mu mizengo; buli sabato akasomagwa u mu masinagogi."

Gukabayeja a batung'wa na a banamhala, ni kanisa i yose, gwa kubasola banhu kufuma mubo, giki babatume baje i Antiokia hamo nu Paulo nu Balinaba. Usolwa Yuda, uyo witanagwa Balisaba na Sila, bamo ba banhu bataale u ng'wigele lya badugu.
Bubinha na nyaluba ya kuja nayo; ihayile giki, "Bise badugu bing'we batung'wa, hamo na banamhala: Ku badugu bise a ba mahanga, abo bali Antiokia na Sulia, na Kilikia. Tulimugisha.
Twigwile giki bamo ba mu bise baashikile kwenuko, bumukoya na mihayo ya kumuzwanja maganiko; tutabatumile bise a benabo!
Ali luulu, a bise u kuunu tuli n'iganiko limo, twabonile ili yawiza kusola banhu tubatume bize uko muli, hamo na a batogwa bise, a ba Balinaba nu Paulo;
banhu abo bifunya bupanga wabo kulwa lina lya ng'wa Seeba wise Yesu Kilisto.
Babo kwenuko luulu ba Yuda na Sila, twabatumaga bize ko hamo nabo; bakumuwila i mihayo yeniyi git'umo ili.
Nguno yabonekanile u kuli Moyo Ng'wela hamo nu ku bise giki, itiho nguno ya kumuseseja nigo gungi gose-gose, ulu iti mihayo iyi giki:
Yaya u kulya i shitambo sha mu mawitongeleja, na a mininga, pyi ni ndimu ja kunigwa; yaya nuulu kwisanja mu mihayo ya bujingi. Ulu ng'ulekana nayo i yeniyo, mukutungilija. Ikalagi mu mhola."
Huna aho balagwa, buja buukashika i Antiokia; aho balikuminga pyi i libita, bubinha i nyaluba.
Yahayumala u kusong'wa bakayega no, hangi bulungujiwa nu bukomelejiwa wenubo.
U Yuda nu Sila bubatimbya ngholo na kubaguzuhya a badugu; nguno nabo baali bahangi.
Aho bikala nabo ikanza lya shiku ningi ho hado, bulagwa bashoke mhola u ku badugu abo baali babatuma. [
Aliyo u Sila utogwa kwikala nabo u ng'wene.]
Na a ba Paulo nu Balinaba bulenda i Antiokia, budimana na bangi bingi mu nimo gwa kulanga na kugulomeela u mhayo go ng'wa Seeba.
Aho jabita shiku ndebe u Paulo ung'wila u Balinaba giki, "Tushokage ko hangi tuje tubageniha a badugu u mu mizengo i yose, uko twagulomeelile u mhayo go ng'wa Seeba; tuje tubalola umo balijila."
U Balinaba ubona ibeelelile banjane nu Yohana, uyo witanagwa Maliko.
Aliyo u Paulo ubona ikubeelela ulu kuleka kunsola u munhu ng'wenuyo, nguno aho bali Pamfulia akabaleka, winogolelwa u kuja nabo u ku nimo.
Yu, niyo bubiza ho wizwanja butaale; kushisha nose bulekana. U Balinaba unsola u Maliko uja nanghwe Kupulo.
U Paulo u ng'wene unsola Sila; aho bamala kulombelwa shigongo sha ng'wa Seeba na a badugu,
ubuuka ajile. Ubita mu Sulia na Kilikia, uja akujiguzuhyaga i kanisa.
Huna utulumenha ajile uukashika Delibe, ulumbulila kuja Lustila; a henaho waliho nghemba umo lina lyakwe Timoteo, ng'witunja wa nkima Nyudaya nzunya, u ise wali Nyunani.
U nghemba ng'wenuyo wakaanilagwa chiza na a badugu ba Lustila, na a ba Ikonio.
U Paulo utogwa kuja nanghwe, huna unsola unsaala, kulwa nguno ya Bayudaya abo baali bazengile i mhandi jenijo, iki pye a bose baali bamanile giki u ise wali Nyunani.
Huna aho balibita hose-hose u mu mizengo, buyubinha i shilagilo isho shali shafuma ku batung'wa na banamhala ba Yelusalemu.
I kanisa jikaguzuhiwa u mu kuzunya, niyo juyongeja u kukula buli lushiku.
Aliyo u mu si ja Fulugia na Galatia bakabita mo duhu, nguno u Moyo Ng'wela wali wabalemeja u kugulomeela u mhayo u mu Asia.
Aho batumbya Musia, bugema kwingila mu Bitunia, kwike nu kwene atabazuniligije u Moyo wa ng'wa Yesu.
Huna bubita baliyikilimbija i Musia, buukashika Tiloa.
Makanza ga bujiku u Paulo umona mu koolechiwa, muna Makedonia; imiilile aling'wikumbilija alihaya giki, "Kilaga wize kuunu Makedonia utugunaane!"
Aho wakubona u koolechiwa kwenuko, haho na haho twandya kukooba kuja Makedonia, nguno akamana giki u Mulungu watwitanaga kuja koi kubalomeela Nghulu Jawiza.
Aho twinga i Tiloa tulinhya itanga, tugoloola kuja Samotilake; aho wela tushika Neapoli.
Huna u kufuma a henaho tuja tuukashika Filipi, u kwenuko tukikala ko shiku ningi. I lipandi lyenilo lyali lisugilwe na Balumi, hama u gwenuyo hu gwali nzengo gwabo ntaale.

A ha ntondo yaho yali sabato, twinga u mu nzengo tufuma hanze ya mita, nguno twali na nghumbu ja kupandika ipandi lya kulamija. Tuja tuukigasha ha nghilimva ya mongo, tulungalunga na bakima bakiza kwibilinga henaho.

Waliho umo wabo, lina lyakwe Ludia, njinja ntaale wa myenda ya langi ya nzulunge, nshike wa mu nzengo gwa Siatila, hangi munhu wa logohano kuli Mulungu. U nkima ng'wenuyo aho wigwa, u Seeba wilugula i ngholo yakwe, uyanukula iyo yahayiagwa na Paulo.
Ubatiijiwa u wei, ni kaya yakwe; huna utwikumbilija uhaya, "Ulu mulibona giki nali nsanyiwa u kuli Seeba, nzugi ng'wikale ha ng'wane." Niyo akatudayiila no u mu mhayo gwenuyo!
Lwise lumo twajaga kwilomba, tumanhya na ng'waniki nsese, wali n'isamva lya buchuuja, lyang'winhaga budula bo kubapandikila solobo nhaale a ba ise-bugonzo kulwa kuchuuja.
Huna wandya kunkuubilija u Paulo na a bise, kunu alilila uhaya giki, "A banhu benaba batumami ba ng'wa Mulungu uyo ali higulya no, baliho u ng'wenumu kulwa nguno ya kumulomeela nzila ya bupiji."
Jikakwila i shiku akugwitaga u mhayo gwenuyu, nose gunkoya u Paulo; ugaluka uliwila i lisamva giki, "Nalikulagila mu lina lya ng'wa Yesu Kilisto, nfumage!" Lyunfuma nghana i likanza lyenilo duhu.
A ba ise-bugonzo aho babona giki bajimiija u kwisagilwa kwabo kwa solobo, bubadima a ba Paulo nu Sila, bubadutanja babatwalile kwigulilu, ku butongi bo basugi.
Buukabashisha ku balamuji, buhaya giki, "A banhu benaba Bayudaya, aliyo balituyugagulila u nzengo gwise.
Bakujaga bulomeela mihayo itatwigeleelilwe a bise, iyo tutudula u kwiyanukula nuulu kwiyita, nguno tuli Balumi a bise!"
Pye a banhu bubazanzamukila. A balamuji bulagila bazuujiwe i shizwalo, batulwe mbooko.
Aho bamala kubatulagula mbooko ningi, bubaponya mu jeela; bunkomeleja u nanghani wa jeela abalanghane na witegeleja.
Nanghwe aho wamala kukomelejiwa giko ubaponya mu chumba sha mu gati ya jeela, hama ulola ubatunganija ha manti a magulu gabo.
Mu makanza ga bujiku ha gati, u Paulo nu Sila balombaga na kungongoola Mulungu mu mimbo; a batungwa bichabo badegelekile.
Kuhayimanila yadinghima nyahinga nhaale; pyi i jeela yutinginyiwa, nu nsingi gwayo. I milyango yuluguka pye, ni minyololo iyo baali batungilwe a batungwa yutaliguka.
U nanghani umisha, aho wibona i milyango ya jeela yalugukaga, usopoola lushu giki ibulage, nguno akiganika a batungwa bapeelaga.
Aliyo u Paulo uhamuka n'ilaka itaale uhaya giki, "Utiziyagaja, tuliho pye a bose!"
Ulomba yenhwe tala, huna wiza wangu-wangu kunu akudetemaga, ushika ugwa u ku butongi bo ba Paulo nu Sila.
Ubafunya hanze; huna ubabuja giki, "Bababa, niite mhayo ki napandike kupila?"
Nabo bung'wila, "Nzunyage Seeba Yesu, ukupijiwa u bebe ng'wenekili ni kaya yako!"
Bunsomboolela u mhayo go ng'wa Seeba, pye na a ba mu kaya yakwe.
I likanza lyenilo itaali bujiku giko, ubasola uukabooja a machubagukile ga butulwa, hama ubatiijiwa u wei pye na a ba mu kaya yakwe.
Ubingija mu kaya yakwe ubabeegeja shiliwa; kaya ngima yokala buyegi nguno bakanzunya Mulungu.
Aho wela, a balamuji butuma nhung'wa u ku jeela balihaya giki, "Balekelagi a bing'wana benabo."
U nanghani wa jeela ung'wila u Paulo giki, "A bataale bahaya mulekelwe; jagi mhola luulu!"

Aliyo u Paulo unshokeja alihaya giki, "Baatutulile mu butongi wa banhu liimi-nyange, hama butuponya mu jeela, nduhu nuulu kutudegeleka ng'wibanza aliyo tuli Balumi, i haha hu balihaya kutupeeja mu kwibisa-bisa duhu? Yaya i giko, ni bizage a boi benekili batufunye!"
Abo baali batung'wa aho bishisha i mihayo yeniyo u ku balamuji, bakogoha no aho bigwa giki baali Balumi.
Buja buukabagwila mu magulu; aho babafunya hanze bubiyandiila bafume u mu nzengo.
Aho bafuma u mu jeela, buja ha ng'wa Ludia; bahayumala kubatimbya ngholo a badugu, bugumha bajile.
U mu lugendo lwabo bubitila Ampifoli na Apolonia, buukashika Tesalonike, lyaliko isinagogi lya Bayudaya.
U Paulo ushisha sabato idatu akwingilaga mo wahoya nabo mihayo ya mu shandikwa, git'umo witilaga na kale.
Wabakundulilaga na kuboolekeja hape, giki yali ing'wigelile u Kilisto aluhiwe na kujuuka kufuma mu bafu. Ubawila giki, "U Yesu uyo nalimusomboolela mhola jakwe ng'wenuyu, huna ng'wene u Kilisto."
Bamo babo bakaguloleela bizunilija nabo a ba Paulo nu Sila; u mu benabo baalimo na Bayunani bingi, abo baali balamya ba ng'wa Mulungu, hamo n'iganda lya bakima bakujiwa.

Aliyo a Bayudaya bakabona wilu, busoleleja ibita lya banhu bahunga kufuma ng'wigulilu. Aho balibilinga i libita lyenilo, bandya nsambo u mu nzengo. Biza ha ng'wa Yasoni badaalulaga, balibakooba giki babafunije hanze ku banhu.
Aho babagayiwa hoi, bundutanja u Yasoni hamo na badugu bangi, bubatwala ku basugi ba nzengo; kunu baliyoganya balihaya giki, "Baashikile nu kuunu a banhu abo bakujaga buyugagula si;
u Yasoni h'uyo wabanukulile. Aliyo bashidalahile i shilagilo sha ng'wa Kaisali, bakuhayaga giki angu aliho ntemi ungi Yesu!"
Bubayuugagula a banhu na a batongeeji aho biyigwa i mihayo yeniyo.
Bumbiisha ihyu u Yasoni na a biye, huna bubalekela buja.
Haho na haho i bujiku, a badugu bubafunya a ba Paulo nu Sila, bubatwala Beloya; aho bashika ko bingila ng'wisinagogi lya Bayudaya.
A bene baali balembeezu kutinda a bana Tesalonike, bakagwanukula u mhayo na bukalalwa bose, buyushilola i shandikwa buli lushiku, babone ulu ili giko i mihayo yeniyo.
Bingi bakazunya, bamo baali bakima bakujiwa ba Shiyunani, na a bagosha nabo baali bati bagehu.
A Bayudaya ba Tesalonike aho bigwa giki u Paulo akugulomeelaga u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu ni Beloya, buja nu kwene, buukabayugagula na kubazwanja a banhu.
Aliyo haho na haho a badugu bung'winja u Paulo buja nanghwe ku ng'walo gwa nyanza, buneka u Sila nu Timoteo.
Abo bakaja nu Paulo bakajushika nanghwe Atene. Aho wamala kubalagija giki bakabawile a ba Sila nu Timoteo banguhe u kwiza u kuli we, a boi bushoka Beloya .
U Paulo aho ali mu nzengo gwa Atene abalindiilile a biye, akabona mo mbika na mbika ja shiikolile sha kulamiwa; u mhayo gwenuyo gunkoya no u mu moyo gokwe!
Uyingila ng'wisinagogi lya Bayudaya wahoya nabo, hamo na a bangi abo bizaga mo kulamya. Na kwigulilu wajaga buli lushiku wakahoya na a babo baaliko.

Baaliho na basomi bataale, bitanagwa Baepikuleo na Bastoiko; bamo babo aho bamanhya nanghwe u Paulo buyuhaya giki, "U nghalahala uyu nanghwe ni aligaagaana kuhaya ki shi?" Bangi buyuhaya giki, "Alibonekana kubiza nomeeji o mihayo ya bamulungu bageni!" Bakahaya giko nguno u Paulo wabalomeelaga nghulu ja ng'wa Yesu na ja bujuuko.
Nose banoga bundima, buntwala kwinumba lyabo lya kwibilingila litanagwa Aleo-Pago; buukamuja kwenuko giki, "Bebe a malange ayo ulilanga genaya mapya, tudugije kugamana nise?
Nguno i mihayo iyo ulitwenhela yeniyi, migeni gete u mu matu gise! Na luulu tuli na nghumbu ja kugamana a makulu gayo!"
Nguno pye a bana Atene na a bageni abo bikalaga mo baali bati na gwa kwita gungi, ulu iti kwiyinha suusu duhu, nuulu kudegeleka mihayo migeni.
Huna ubuuka u Paulo wimiila u ng'winumba lya Aleo-Pago; uhaya giki, "Bababa bana Atene, nalibona a bing'we mukalalilwe no i mihayo ya dini.

Nguno u mu kubita-bita kwane, buli kwene ulu nalola nakwibonaga i mihayo ya kalamije king'we. Naabitile na kubona wandike ha ng'walilo nebe buhayile giki, 'Kuli Mulungu uyo atamanikile.' Ali luulu, u nene nalimulanja uyo mukanamyaga mu butumana ng'wenuyo.
U Mulungu u Meeja wa si ni shose isho shilimo, atikalaga mu maduku ga kubeejiwa na makono, nguno u wei hu Seeba w'igulu na si.
Niyo atagongile kutumamilwa na makono giti giki ngayiwa, nguno hu ng'wene uyo akabinhaga pye a bose u bupanga ni myuyi, ni shikolo i shingi pyi umo shigelelile.
Huna ng'wene uyo akagabeeja pye a mahanga ga banhu kufuma muli munhu umo, giki bisambaalile pyi i si, bazenge mo. Ubatuulila na makanza, ni mbimbi: mihayo iyo ihelilwe kufuma kale kulwa wikalo wabo;
giki bayubbabbasha-bbabbasha, nose bampandike u Mulungu, nuulu iki ati kule na buli umo wise.

Nguno u muli we h'umo buli u bupanga wise, nu kuyeela-yeela kwise kuli muli we. Pyi nu bumunhu wise h'umo buli, git'umo na bamo ba bimbi bing'we bakahayilaga giki, 'Na a bise tuli shiseeng'wa shakwe.'
Nose iki tuli shiseeng'wa sha ng'wa Mulungu, tutiziganika giki u Mulungu ashikile kugelanijiwa na shikolo giti zahabu nuulu feza, nuulu mawe ga mpango ntaale ayo gakabeejiagwa na bugaliili bo banhu.
U mu makanza ga butumana, u Mulungu wali abalekile duhu a banhu, aliyo i haha alibalagila pye a banhu hose-hose giki bagaluke.

Nguno luliho lushiku alutuulile, lo kubalamula pye a banhu mu butungilija, mu nzila ya ng'wa Munhu uyo ansolile we. U Mulungu akanjuucha u Munhu ng'wenuyo kufuma mu bafu, uboolekeja hape pye a banhu giki akugushikilija u mhayo gwenuyo."
Aho bigwa mhayo gwa bujuuko wa bafu, bamo bandya kuneeneleja mu budalahi balihaya, "Yu, wigejaga luulu, tukwidegeleka n'ikanza lingi hangi i mihayo yako!"
Huna ubingila hoi u Paulo.
Aliyo bamo na bamo bakazunya budimana nanghwe; mu benabo walimo Dionisio, umo wa banhu ba mu Aleo-Pago, na nkima lina lyakwe Damali, na bangi abo baali hamo nabo.
Aho yabita i yeniyi u Paulo winga i Atene, uja Kolinto.

Wibona na Nyudaya nebe myalilwa wa Ponto, witanagwa Akula; akasangwa hu washikile makanza genayo duhu kufuma Italia, hamo na nke wakwe Piliskila. Nguno u ntemi Kilaudio akalagila giki pye a Bayudaya binge u mu nzengo gwa Lumi. Huna luulu u Paulo uja ha kaya yabo uukalenda nabo.
Buyutumama hamo, nguno baali bamanile nimo gwa mbika imo; baali babeeja ba maheema.
Kwike u wei u Paulo buli sabato wajaga ng'wisinagogi kulanga; upandika Bayudaya na Bayunani ba kwizunilija nanghwe.
A ba Sila nu Timoteo aho biza kufuma i Makedonia, bunsanga u Paulo gundadilile no u nimo gwa kugulomeela u mhayo, na kubakaanila a Bayudaya giki u Yesu hu ng'wene u Kilisto.
Aliyo aho balema buyunsondagula, akagunghumula shizwalo shakwe kunu alibawila giki, "A mininga ging'we ni gabizage ha mitwe ying'we, neelaga u nene. Kufuma haha naja ku banhu ba mahanga!"
Ubingila uja mu numba ya ng'wa Tito Yusto, yali hihi ni lisinagogi. U munhu ng'wenuyo wali namya o ng'wa Mulungu.
U ntaale w'isinagogi wali Kilispo, nanghwe unzunya Seeba pyi ni kaya yakwe; na Bakolinto bingi abo bakigwa bakanzunya u Seeba bubatiijiwa.
Lwise lumo makanza ga bujiku u Seeba ung'wila u Paulo mu koolechiwa giki, "Utogohage; u bebe yombaga duhu, yaya u kuhuumula.
U mu nzengo gwenuyu nali na banhu bingi, atiho nuulu umo wa kukuubukila na kukwitila yabubi, nguno nali hamo nangho."
Akikala mo ng'waka na myeji itandatu akubalangaga mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu.
U mu shiku jenijo Galio ubiza nsugi wa Akaya, a Bayudaya aho babona giko buniila gwinda u Paulo, bundima buntwala kwibanza.
Buukamuula balihaya, "U munhu ng'wenuyu akubalangaga a banhu giki bayunamya u Mulungu mu nzila ja hanze ya shilagilo!"
Aliyo u Paulo aho wibeeja-beeja giki andye kusomboola, u Galio ubawila a Bayudaya, "Bing'we Bayudaya, ulu ni gwali mhayo gwa bukenaaguji nuulu gwa wibonya wabubi, ni niyumilija u kumudegeleka.
Aliyo ulu ya wihalalija kulwa nguno ya mihayo na mina ga mu shilagilo shing'we duhu, i yeniyo ilonjagi bing'we benekili. U nene natatogilwe u kubiza namuji wayo i mihayo yeniyo."
Ubapeeja a h'ibanza.
Huna pye a bose bundima Sostene, uyo wali ntaale w'isinagogi; bandya kuntulagula haho butongi w'ibanza. Aliyo u mu yose yeniyo, u Galio atafumilwe ngholo nuulu hado.

U Paulo ongeja u kulenda nabo a badugu. Ha numa ya shiku ningi ubuga nyanza ajile Sulia, na a ba Piliskila nu Akula baali hamo nanghwe. Aho ali mu Kenkilia umooga u ntwe gwakwe, nguno wali mu shilahilo.
Bahayushika Efeso ulekana nabo, u wei wingila ng'wisinagogi kujuhoya na Bayudaya.
Aho banomba giki alende ikanza ilihu ho hado ulema.
Ubalaga alihaya giki, "Ulu Mulungu utogwa, nakwiza ikanza lingi u ku bing'we." Huna ubuga nyanza ajile, winga i Efeso.
Aho washika Kaisalia ulinha ngulya kuja kwigisha i kanisa, hanuma utulumenha kuja Antiokia.
Akikala ko ikanza ilebe; wanoga ubuuka hangi ajile akusingijaga mu si ja Galatia na Fulugia, alibagisha na kubaguzuhya pye a bahemba.
Nyudaya nebe nanghwe uja ko i Efeso; i lina lyakwe wali Apolo, myalilwa wa Isikandelia. Oli ngosha o budula mu kuloma na mu shandikwa.

U munhu ng'wenuyo wali alangilwe i nzila ya ng'wa Seeba, hama wali nsebu kingi nasho u mu moyo gokwe. Niyo nuulu iki wali amanile bubatiija bo ng'wa Yohana duhu, aliyo nahene wisomboolaga na budeeba i mihayo ya ng'wa Yesu.
Huna wandya kulomeela mu kwisandaala u ng'wisinagogi; a ba Piliskila nu Akula aho bang'wigwa, bunsola buukananja chiza i nzila ya ng'wa Mulungu.

Wahayubuuka kuja Akaya, a badugu buntimbya ngholo, bandika na nyaluba kuja u ku bahemba ba kwenuko giki bang'wanukule. Aho washika ko, akabagunaana no a bahemba abo baali bamala kuzunya kulwa shigongo.
Nguno akayubahehenaja kingi nasho a Bayudaya; uyubagoola hape-hape, akuboolekejaga kufuma mu shandikwa, giki u Yesu hu ng'wene u Kilisto.
U Apolo aho ali Kolinto, u Paulo wajaga akubitaga ku si ja ku magulya. Huna utulumenha ajile Efeso; usanga koi bahemba balebe.
Ubabuja, "Aho ng'wazunya mukang'wanukula u Moyo Ng'wela?" Bunshokeja balihaya, "Tutaali nuulu kwigwa giki aliho na Moyo Ng'wela!"
Ubabuja hangi giki, "Hama ng'wabatiijiwa bubatiijiwa ki luulu?" Nabo bung'wila, "Mu bubatiija bo ng'wa Yohana Matiija."
Huna u Paulo ubawila giki, "U Yohana wabatiijaga bubatiija kulwa nguno ya kugaluka; wabakomelejaga a banhu kunzunya Yesu, uyo oli giki akwiza ha numa yakwe."
Aho bigwa giko bubatiijiwa mu lina lya ng'wa Seeba Yesu.
U Paulo aho wabatuulila makono ubikiila u Moyo Ng'wela, bandya kulungalunga mu ndimi jingi, na kuhanga.
Baali bagosha giti ikumi na babili.
Akamala myeji idatu akwingilaga ng'wisinagogi walungalunga nabo mu kwisandaala, kunu akubalomeelaga na kubaduta mu mihayo ya butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu.

Aliyo bamo babo baali baganghanazu na badalahi, bandya kwisondagula i Nzila yeniyo ku butongi bo banhu. U Paulo ubaleka, ubinja a bahemba; wandya kuyubalanga buli lushiku ng'widalasa lya ng'wa Tulano.
Umala myaka ibili akugutumamaga u nimo gwenuyo, kushisha pye a bikaji ba Asia, babize Bayudaya nuulu Bayunani, bugwigwa u mhayo go ng'wa Seeba.
I shitwa isho akayubeeja u Mulungu mu nzila ya makono ga ng'wa Paulo shali sha kukumya no, shikilile kasomboolele!
